review_text: Literally the best cleaning device ever! SO much better than the original crosswave or the cordless max. After cleaning the whole house the battery still had 30% left. Wiped the floor with a paper towel after to see and it was barely even dirty. Highly recommend !!!

Works amazing for everyday cleaning of the hard floors we have! Doesn't work so great on the old laminate floors we have as they are more grooved but thats not the tinecos fault! Just crappy flooring. The clean water tank does leak UNLEES you actually push the floater down from inside the tank with something or your finger. Super annoying but still, once figured out, I can deal with it.

review_title: A wonderful device that has brought back my sanity after toddler eating sessions

   I just bought 10 months and it was not work for 2 months ago. I called for support, they ignored me. It is with  2 years warranty .

For me, this is a game changer. No more bulky vacuum and pain in the but: mop and bucket. I love this thing!!! If you have a big house you may need two of these vacuums  or be fast at vacuuming. This thing will save my back.

My problem is that if I don’t immediately clean the tank, the brush roller and the debris channel after each use, it smells awful!!! I want to be able to use it for quick clean ups and it’s definitely not quick if I have to deep clean the unit every time I use it.

Mine wouldn't work when I first got it, but customer service is very easy to work with. I love the fact that I won't be cleaning my floors on my hands and knees anymore. I've tried it on my hardwoods and linoleum,  but haven't tried it on the tile yet.
Went with this one as opposed to the Bissel. Glad I did. Good quality cleaner easy to operate, Super light weight, Easy to clean. Self cleaning mode works good. I would recommend this product.

I liked this product, but it already started to malfunction after only six months.  I did use it a lot, but now it just keeps repeating, “clean water tank,” even though I emptied it. The glitch keeps me from being able to use it.  Sad.

review_title: Beautiful floors! Wish it had a bigger DWT.
review_text: The vacuum leaves my floors looking beautiful!  The smell of the cleaner is amazing.The only thing I wish is that it could go longer without needing to run a self cleaning cycle.  I clean the Family room, front room, kitchen and hallway regularly and I can only get halfway through before having to run self cleaning cycle.  I feel I need to order more filters since the instructions say that you are supposed to use a dry clean filter when using the vacuum.

I have used this already 5 times since purchase, I really wanted to test it out but I'm really content with this product and recommend it. I have moved away from using a mop because this picks up even the littlest dirt from the follow, I currently have tile and it works perfectly.

review_title: It is still a good machine with two improvement,No Machine Will beat this machine.
review_text: This is the best machine for wet cleaning . There cannot be a better machine then this,Little improvement they can do is make the handle little longer, and suction power should be a little more so it does not leave any water on the floor otherwise it is the best machine with an excellent idea.

I’ve been wanting this vacuum/mop for a long time and am so happy with it. I absolutely dreaded mopping my floors before and now I actually enjoy it! I love knowing I’m not just pushing the dirt around like I was with my old mop. You can tell by the water, and the look of your floors, that they’re actually clean! It is so light weight and easy to use. Really an amazing product.

review_title: My floors have never been cleaner!!!
review_text: This wet mop/vacuum is amazing!! Well worth the price! My floors have never looked so clean!! I struggled to find the right wet mop to use on our hard wood floors. I’ve tried a steam mop, swifter, regular mop and bucket. This is quick and smart too!!  I’m a mom of 3 babies under 3 so this is a necessary item to have in our household.

review_title: Takes half the time to clean floors!

First of all, the worst app ever! It is an absolute nightmare to register it through the app. Took 5 tries to get it to work. Second, you can only use it on non-carpet floors! Only hardwood floors, tile, etc. There’s no regular vacuum feature for carpet areas. There’s no tools to use for hard to reach areas. You have to clean the brushes after EVERY single use. If you’re trying to do a quick floor clean and be done, it will affect its useful life to not clean the brushes. Kinda defeats the purpose of easy quick floor cleaning. Do yourself a favor and do not buy this headache.

This is so easy to use and maneuver.  Great on my LVT planks.

So happy with this purchase. I love how quiet it is and how clean it gets my floors. It takes no effort at all and cuts my clean time in half. Not only is it a time saver I feel like it does a better job than a mop and bucket. If you have more hardwood than carpet this is definitely a great buy!

Best money I have ever spent.  I have 3 dogs who drag in dirt and mud and I use this everyday to keep my floors clean.  Yes every day.  It’s lightweight and easy to use so keeping the floors clean takes very little time and effort.  I love the self cleaning feature.  Have not been happier about a housekeeping tool in my life.

I have about 1200sq.ft. of hard floors (wood laminate, luxury vinyl plank, tile). I am able to clean almost every room with one charge. Usually have to go back for one bedroom or bathroom.  Super happy with that, being that was my biggest worry with this cleaner. I also have 3 shedding cats/dogs in our home. It picks up the hair with no problem with a twice a week vacuuming.  It does not do well on my area rugs or stairs. I still use the traditional vacuum for those areas. Love that my floors are not only vacuumed, but also clean at the same time. No regrets buying this Tineco. Has saved me so much time in cleaning the house.

As a very busy mom of 2 little ones, pets, and my whole house being hardwood floors, I was SO excited to get this vacuum to cut my floor cleaning time in half. After a few short months of using it, I’ve noticed that it leaves a lot of dirt/dust behind. Also, Not even a full minute into cleaning my floors, it will inform me to set it on the charger and to run the self cleaning cycle even after Ive taken it apart and cleaned it by hand as well as replacing the filter & roller. I also never put any other solution into it besides the Tineco solution so I have no idea what could be going on with it. For what I paid for this, I expected a much better product and I truly regret purchasing it. I will just stick the good old fashioned mop and bucket!

So very glad I found this item!  So easy to use and works fabulously.  It excels on the hardwoods!  The tile in my home is textured and it does work on it, but not quite as well as on the hardwood - I run it over the tile 2-3 tiles in swipes as opposed to one swipe on the hardwood.  So very pleased though!!!

This product is great. I already have three vacuums. My friend bought this one and said it fantastic. So I give it a try. It's totally worth the money. Also it does not take much effort to clean the machine. It has auto cleaner.

I have used it everyday since I received it. 100% recommend. If it breaks I will buy another..

I have 3 senior kitties who have accidents. It was getting harder and harder to clean my floors.I was amazed at how much "junk" this pulled up the first time.  Dirt and grime i didn't know was there.I am so glad i got it and now it's an easy thing to clean up after them.

Then the item continued saying to change the water when the water was clean and I had just put the water. Once it finally charged I started using it again on the floor. After I was done with the hardwood floor I noticed streaks on the floor from what appeared to be the wheels on the vacuum. I went over the floor again only to see the same streaks again. Needless to say I am not impressed with this item.

review_title: Does the Job - Easy to Use
review_text: I have only had this for a week, and I don't know how I lived without it. Such a time saver, easy to use and my floors look great-I have mostly Harwood in my house. I live in a beach town and there is always sand and every day I had to vacuum and use the wet swifter- this cleaner picks up the sand and dog hairs and shines the floor! It is easy to use and easy to clean after - I love it!!

Seriously the best thing ever!! With 4 dogs, 3 cats, 3 teenagers and a messy husband, my floors are always dirty. It use to be a daunting task sweeping and mopping all my hardwood floors. Now it’s super quick and easy. It has saved me so much time. The cleaner smells good too. Perfect for an everyday quick clean!

Let me start with a tip. Remove the cardboard from the rotary brush before use! That being said let me talk about all of the fantastic features this floor cleaner has. Yes, $400 is pricey. That is more than I spent on my carpet vacuum, but this comes with a pretty big bottle of cleaner. You only need a cap full. It comes with an installed HEPA filter and an extra. It also come with an installed brush and an extra. It also comes with a cleaning wand that has a couple uses. And, it talks to you! I really like that it doesn't soak my floors as it cleans. It doesn't spray out water. You don't even have to push or hold down a button to operate it. It just keeps the rotary brush damp and sucks up the dirty water as you push it along the floor. The whole thing is really pretty light, much lighter than my carpet vacuum. The first charge lasted long enough to clean my 10x10 kitchen floor and my master bathroom with battery to spare.

The iFloor 3 is the best on the market! Just when I thought my floors were clean, I was surprised to see my floors even cleaner and bright! The vacuum gathers the crumbs and then cleans the floor right behind it! The drying time is quick too! Another plus, it’s lightweight and cordless.I would recommend this wood/tile floor cleaner to everyone!

I LOVE THIS MACHINE! I purchased after buying a Bissell Crosswave that just wasn’t cutting it. They do not compare if you buy this model. It cleans so much better and has been a blessing for hardwood floors & 3 dogs! I have a 2,000 sqft house and it clean in one battery but I do have to dump and refill about 2 times.

Super lightweight and whisper quiet. Cleans and polishes floors nicely. There is a little bit of a learning curve when it comes to maintaining/cleaning the machine properly, but once you’ve done it a couple of times it becomes much easier than the hassle of vacuuming and then using a traditional mop.Strongly suggest either using the included cleaner or finding a floor cleanser that does not create excess foam when agitated. If you use a foamy cleanser it will fill up the dirty water tank very quickly.Overall the purchase was totally worth it and my floors have that soft glow after each use!

I have tried everything to clean our shiny laminate floors.  It has been impossible and a lot of work each week...I dreaded it.  But this floor machine is fantastic!  It is easy to set up and easy to use and easy to clean.  It is my dream machine!  The floors look beautiful and I didn’t have to spend a big portion of my day trying to make the floors look decent.  I am extremely happy with my purchase!

I will probably never mop again. I have my house cleaned professionally once per week. I use this machine for touch ups. I have mopped the entire kitchen. You do have to vacuum prior to using this mop. It’s super easy to use and I leave it filled and ready to go.

review_title: Why didn’t I get this before?

Great quality vacuum, very nice features for the price range, would recommend

My floors have never looked soo nice!!!! Super clean and easy to use!! This is the best purchase!
Just purchase it, you won't be sorry
This thing is a game changer!! I absolutely love my Tineco and I’m so glad I made the purchase!

We love this product, it has everything we like, cordless, lightweight, quiet , easy to use, self-clean function, and even the cool panel. I have a V8 for my floor, but it can only do the vacuum job. iFloor3 can do both of wet/dry job, now I left my V8 in the garage. Perfect product for the hardwood floor.

OH MY GOD!!!! Tineco where have you been my entire life! This product is the most amazing hard floor cleaner ever. The clean and dirty water tanks could be a little bigger however that doesn’t affect my opinion of this amazing product. I have 3 dogs and this bad boy took care of the hair and dirt with ease!!! If you don’t have one you are missing out!

This machine is awesome!!!! I have a dog and a cat…my dogs sheds like crazy! This has no issue picking up hairs and does a perfect job! The floors feels super clean after cleaning, the solution bottle that is included is huge! And last a long time.

review_title: A must if you have children
review_text: I absolutely LOVe this!! I use it multiple times a day. I wouldn’t say it replaces the mop but definitely awesome for spills. Would definitely buy this again.

review_title: If you own pets this is not convenient
review_text: I prefer my old crosswave. Water tank is to small and have to refill to quick and dirty water compartment has to be dumped to much. Other than it is good

review_title: Buy it.. You'll be glad you did!
review_text: I love this thing! I've never had a machine like this so I can't compare.. But I'm not sure how I ever lived without this one! Easy to operate, easy to clean! I'm definitely recommending these to my friends.

I truly love this machine. It's not great for around edges but great for hard floors in general. Completely beats having to sweep and then mop. I love the quick clean up factor of this cleaner. Would absolutely recommend.

review_title: Best purchase I've made in awhile
review_text: I use it every day. I have 6 dogs, 2 kids and a husband so I use this thing all the time! It's great for just picking up spills or for doing an everyday cleaning. It doesn't do carpet so I still have to drag out the rainbow and the steamer once a week or so but hey it's made everyday so much easier. Battery life is great I can get the majority of my house in one charge suction is pretty great for a small light weight machine and gets dog hair great.

It seems like a plastic toy but it really works.  It is not a 2 for 1.  You must sweep or vacuum before using it for mopping because it clogs easily, stops working, and creates a spilling mess.  The battery charge lasts little over 15 minutes.  I work one or two rooms at a time.  It is lightweight and easy to clean.  Loved it once I accepted the limitations.  No more mops for me.

This machine was an amazing 5 stars for the eight months that it worked. I have a large high traffic tiled area in my home that it serviced. I am providing this review after my machine died just 8 months after purchase. I am currently going through the warranty process with Tineco directly and will update upon completion. One star for now.

I have had a bissell crosswave for 1 year. In that year it has been replaced and now the replacement isn’t working. That aside the Tineco is just all around better. It self propels, shows when you need to make another pass in an area, uses less cleaner, doesn’t puddle water, and auto adjusts - all of which I had issues with when using the bissell.Do yourself a favor and buy this one.

I am in love with my vacuum mop! It's so easy to use on all my hard floors. I have 2 dogs so we have a lot of dirt and hair tracked in and out, it works so well. I love it for every day mopping but also for quick spills. So much easier than a traditional mop. Also, Tinecos customer service is amazing! I had an issue and they were quick to email me back and help solve my problem. Highly recommend!

I live this product! It has a bit of a beginners learning curve and if you have a big house you’ll find it a pain to keep emptying it and self cleaning but at least you know your floor is getting clean which I cannot believe once moving into our new home how dirty it was I think once I do my routine cleans the water won’t be as dirty but I do have two dogs so who knows lol! I live this product and the cleaning solution makes your floors smell great!

What can you say about a product that vacuums and washes your floor at the same time. We have four little kids and this makes life so much easier. We hesitated due to the price for so so long, but guess what?! I will never live with out one again.

I love the tenco. I use it daily and it's amazing. I had a hoover floor mate before and they are awful. My hoovers only lasted a few months before getting issues or the motor giving out.  The tenco has been way better. It's not as loud, so my son with autism doesn't mind it. It cleans pet hair and dirt so well. My house has never been so clean.

review_title: Quite possibly the best thing I’ve ever purchased
review_text: The videos make it look like it’s too good to be true. It’s not. It’s THAT GOOD. It works perfectly  and it’s light weight, incredibly easy to fill/empty and use. I can get it up the steps with ease and my floors are spotless in no time. Absolute 10/10. Chefs Kiss. Highly recommend.

review_title: Buy it now, you will not regret it
review_text: Love my Tineco!  Great machine. It vac mops like a champ. Lightweight, I am disabled and I can carry my Tineco up and down stairs with no problems. The only drawback is that it doesn’t catch corners or up close to walls, but that would be a drawback for any of the vac mops

review_title: App is no where to be found !
review_text: Received mine today but absolutely no where can I find the app to download. The Apple store states not found. This is very frustrating !I tried to call them but the automated stated they are not taking calls ????
Cleans without leaving a lot of water behind. Great on dog hair. I liked it so much I told my extended family and they bought one too

review_title: The best hard floor cleaner i have came across and I have used them all
review_text: Unit is lightweight as i am recovering from a mild stroke  this lets me clean with no extra help, easy to clean roller  cordless so it is very convenient to grab and use it quickly,  Good battery run time

review_title: If you're thinking about it, DO IT!
review_text: Absolutely must need. They are very easy to assemble. I set mine up within 5 minutes (including reading manual). I vacuumed my house before using the tineco just to see what all it would pick it. I was SHOCKED. It worked so amazing. It made cleaning way easier and so much faster. Definitely a must need investment!!
This is what I always wished a swiffer was.  Our entire ground floor is hardwood, and this makes cleaning it so much easier.  Worth every cent.
I absolutely love it! I can now clean my house in a fraction of the time. It cleans very well and I love the smart technology!
Love my Tineco S3 floor cleaner! I will never go back to regular mopping again! 😍
Works better then the bissell crosswave

Love this floor cleaner! I read reviews about multiple brands and decided to go with this one. I do have two dogs and although it cleans the dog hair up well i have to clean out the tank and filters very frequently per use.

Love this, cannot recommend this enough. Love the self clean cycle & how easy it is to use. There is no streaks on my hard wood floors! If I had to leave a complaint, it would be that I still have to clean about an inch away from the baseboards, it just doesn't get that close.

review_title: Do yourself a favor do not buy this vacuum
review_text: What a headache this thing is. It starts off great. But then after a couple of months things start going wrong. Maybe you just emptied the dirty water tank - well one minute in it starts telling you to clean the dirty water tank or debris channel and shuts down and there is nothing you can do. Parts don’t fit back in easily. Don’t get this vacuum. The good reviews can’t be real.

Love this thing. We have hardwood throughout the entire house ams use it every day or two with the bad weather. You have to understand that it will not get exactly to the edges with the guards. Other than that it is great
People mention streaking and I do see some of that. I'd rather have some streaks than dirt ground into the floor. The self cleaning mode seems to work well.

review_title: Works good and saves me time!
review_text: Another tik tok made me buy it, it does save me time from having to vacuum again after I have mopped!  It self cleans but does go through the water during that!  I can clean my house and only fill once.

review_title: Must have!! This is awesome and so easy
review_text: This has been well used since purchasing!! Amazing so happy to have this!! Use on ceramic, wood, carpet runners.
This has been the best and most favorite cleaning product I’ve ever bought! It’s quiet and cleans soooooooo well on my vinyl plank and tile floors. I bought my daughter one too!

review_title: Use it all the time, saved my life!
review_text: If your house is big and you have hard wood floors and your cleaning lady never returned since the Pandemic.. you need one! Get it now!

This product is worth the cost. I saw this product on a video. I finally bought it. And I love how it works, and I have 3 dogs. It is so helpful with pet hair. I would recommend it to anyone with pets.

review_title: Pet owners this is a must have!
review_text: I have done a lot of research and had finally decided on this one. I have 3 big mud loving puppies. Let me just say I’m not sorry! It practically walks itself across the floor. It’s easy to use, cleans great, and then it cleans itself! Who could ask for anything more!

review_title: Does not do well with dog hair.
review_text: I do like this vacuum however I have one dog and the vacuum gets clogged with her fur. Other than that it works great and my floors are super clean.
Bought this for my wife. She loves it. Cleans are floors very nicely. Battery life may be the only drawback.
I absolutely love this product. My floors looked amazing after using and the self cleaning is a life saver. So happy I purchased this!
This thing is incredible! It cleans very well, and is super easy to use once you get the hang of it! The most time consuming part is the clean-up, but even that is super fast! Highly recommend!!
Words cant describe how much I love this! It does everything it claims to! It just cleans up quick messes does not deep clean tho!
Favorite thing I've bought ever. Makes cleaning a breeze. And I love that it cleans itself.
It is horrible please do not waste your money. Mine is broke already and even before it was broke it kept foaming which would then shut down the mop every 3 secs and wouldn’t let you use the machine.

review_title: Power, self-clean, easy to clean and use & coreless!
review_text: Love this machine! It's so easy to use and so easy to clean and not to mention cleans my floors well. Highly recommend!

This vacuum is impossible to maintain even if you follow all the directions. It just sucks after the first month or so and they won’t do anything about it. The warranty is crap. No ones going to help you.
Does not work as good as they stated. Wanted to return but just saw I missed the window to do that...

review_title: Love this product, but the tanks are small.
review_text: I have wanted one of these for years. I am overall really happy with it. The cleaning is great, its easy to use, light weight. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is the water tank and dirty water reservoir is way to small. I have a very small house and I can only do my small living room and bathroom before it needs to be dumped. Doing the whole house I have to dump it twice. Then when it's on the cleaning cycle to clean itself I have to dump it once if not twice more. That's kinda annoying but it cleans very well. We have wood tile throughout our home.

So, I have kids and dog. This has definitely lighten my work load. Wonderfully easy to use, and clean, does an excellent job on my area rugs as well as tile, and linoleum. I agree with other reviews, its not good for that deep clean, but it makes sweeping/moping so much easier, it can be a daily task easily. Also makes quick work of those little kid (and puppy) spills and messes. Its quieter than I expected and self clean and cordless makes all the difference. Will update review as time goes on, but if your looking for a vacmop, this is one, imo

So far, this vacuum is absolutely amazing! JUST what I was hoping for. No more getting down on my hands and knees to scrub the floors! We live in a very rural part of the mountains, and dirty floors are always an issue with kids, the dog, etc. Life is messy! I really like the cordless feature. The vacuum also guides itself and is very easy to use. Quick setup upon arrival as well. I'm loving this vacuum! I sure hope it holds up, and continues to perform like it does now. I've been telling everyone I know about it. Money well spent.

   Contacting customer service AGAIN! I'm on my second machine, they replaced the first on about a year ago, and not the replamwnt one stopped working too.This does not replace a mop or steamer for real cleaning, it just good for quick cleaning and daily upkeep. I still have to mop on the weekend and steam about once a month. I have Smartcore LVP flooring with smooth texture and slight beveled edges.

I've used this twice. Yesterday, I cleaned the kitchen, living room, dining room, 2 halls, big master and BIG master bath, 2 other bathrooms, and laundry room. It took me 35 minutes. I used 3 caps full of detergent (3 clean water tanks worth). Had to empty the dirty water twice. And the floor was the cleanest ever. Mops just move stuff around sometimes. Messy to clean but worth it. Will never sweep and mop again. Hope the quality is good.. cuz I love this.

review_title: I highly recommend this product. So easy to use.
review_text: I received this as a Christmas present and just recently tried to register it. I had problems registering it. The support person for this product responded quickly but I’m old so I called my youngest daughter and she got it done for me. The support person was very nice and helpful. I used my vacuum cleaner for the first time yesterday and it was awesome. It’s easy to maneuver and very light weight and cleaned my kitchen floor better than any other cleaner I have used. It cleaned the  tough spots on my hard wood floors with ease. I would highly recommend this product.

I've only written two other reviews, which were google reviews, so it goes to show how much I like the Tineco Floor One S3. It's easy to unpackage and put together and easy to use. It's also lightweight and self propelling. It makes cleaning so much fun that my 9 and 5 year old boys are excited to keep their room clean so they can use the new vacuum/mop (of course with adult supervision because this thing isn't cheap!). Every room in my home has wood flooring. I tried the Bissell Crosswave, but it was too loud and left a lot of water on the floor after mopping, so it was returned.  With the Tineco, I can clean every room with one charge, it's fairly quiet, and doesn't leave a lot of water on the floor, which makes minimal drying time. Great product. I hope it lasts a lifetime.

   Love! This product. Easy to clean after use. At $300 it was a bit much for me to spend. But it is so nice to just run underneath the kids seat after dinner or meal time and it picks up everything!!! Leaves the floor clean. Only drawback I have is that it doesn't get right next to the baseboard. But only like a half inch of space.  If you're deep cleaning this would be great to run over top first and last. Overall, we use it everyday. Does not need a lot of solution. The battery lasts me about an hour of straight use. It does also charge pretty fast. It's not recommended to use on carpet, but it does also get up small stains. Comes with an extra filter but not an extra roller. If you plan on using it everyday I would recommend getting extra.

I believe every house w little kids deserves this product!!! It picks up all sticky and oily food my kids drop from their snacks breakfast lunch dinner etc! It’s my in-house big helper! I’m a new person since I got this tineco!! When my toddler eats messy or spills something on purpose or not I stay happy and calm, cause I got the tineco to the rescue!!! The suction power is fantastic! It takes me really fast to cover all my hardware floors!! My vaporise product!! Lifesaving!!!

review_title: BEST VACUUM EVER - WHY DID I WAIT SO LONG
review_text: The only question I'm asking myself is: Why did I wait so long to buy this??????BUY THIS NOW.  ADD TO CART. I LOVE IT.  I can't believe I am in totally head over heels for a wet/dry vac, but I seriously am.  Highlights:1.  It almost pulls itself.  My back didn't hurt ONCE and I did my entire house.2.  It's so easy to use and operate, my kids could (and WILL) do it!3.  It has amazing suction power.  AMAZING.  Dirt my vacuum missed was sucked right up.4.  You can see the results.  As a type A person, this was hugely rewarding (and also super gross)5.  It is actually quite cute and well designedCons: Nothing. It's perfect.
Not as good as people say
If you have adhd or move from task to task often I wouldn’t recommend this. It involves deep cleaning after every use.

This thing amazing!!!!! So glad I made the purchase. My floors look brand new.
Not exactly what I was hopping for but does an okay job but not worth the price tag.

review_title: It basically does everything! You don’t need a mop or broom! Highly recommended!

Love it for use on our hardwood floors.

Saves so much time way better than bissel

Takes longer to clean after use than clean my floors

There is nothing I don’t love about this product. Worth every penny!

The floor cleaner sucks up the water it puts out. Works great even on uneven floors! Quiet and lightweight.
I love this vacuum! Such a time saver. Doesn’t leave streaks and it gets really close to edges.
My floors are clean and it’s almost effortless. A total game changer at my house!

By far the best sweeper I have ever owned. So nice not to have to sweep with a broom and then mop!
Perfectly cleans hardwood floors! And I have a dog!!
Cannot get the cleaner for it!!
Exactly what I needed and expected!!
The best hard surface cleaner I have ever used!
I’m in love with this ! It makes my life so much easier ! I would 10/10 buy it again!

Most amazing cleaner ever! Love it!!!!!

Its great

Excelente lo mejor que han inventado estoy súper encantada

review_title: Putting back together is a nightmare
review_text: This machine cleans floors excellent. But trying to get the dirty water container back in the machine is a ×÷$%^@$^& nightmare! You practically have to break it to get it back in the machine. Makes me not want to use it all.
It cleans very good! But the only thing is that it runs of of battery quickly like max 25 minutes not long enough.. I have a big house so I have to charge it like 2 or 3 times.

review_title: Calling all moms!! This thing is awesome!
review_text: This will vacuum and mop at the same time! I have a cat, dog, and two young boys! It sucks up fur and crumbs and mops the floor clean all at once! You dump the schmeg water afterwards and the thing charges and cleans itself! 💥 Boom 💥 Game changer!

review_title: Helpful but has a musky smell after a few weeks that I cannot get rid of even with changing roller.
review_text: I like the quick easy cleanup it does a pretty good job I wish it got corners and edges better but after about a month of use it began to develop a musky smell even after hi use and regularly changing water and roller and filter

Y’all let’s talk. Imagine your two year old spilling tea everywhere. This amazing little thing picked it all up in a matter of 30 seconds. Which would have ended in 3 towels. Of course a load of laundry now, & mopping to prevent stickiness everywhere. This thing truly works! It is absolutely amazing and would recommend 100x over.

Great product. Cleans great. Easily cleans itself. Gets through the majority of kitchen, dining area, living room, and entry before needing to refill- depending on how many paw prints are on the floor... works great for spills.

review_title: Limpia a medias y no desinfecta
review_text: Limpia el mugre  al 70%, no sirve para mugre que lleva días y está pegada al piso, pasa la maquina sin suficiente fuerza para quitarlas. No desinfecta. Como todas las bacterias del piso están ahí en el agua, limpiar el tanque da asco. El piso queda humedo después de un tiempo porque el rodillo ya está muy mojado.

review_title: Not what I expected, esp for price.
review_text: I expected a lot more out of this, especially for the price. It doesn’t do well on hard to get up items.
I love the way that it suck the dirty water and only clean with the clean water, which leave my floor very clean every time. everything was easy to maneuver and self cleaning is the best!
By far the best vacuum/mop I have ever bought . My two yr old loves that it talks to u

review_title: Now I'll finally mop my floor regularly!
review_text: I've always hated the work involved with mopping. From digging out the mop bucket, filling it with water and solution and lugging around the bucket around while I do the job. I used to mop MAYBE once a month, now I'm running the Tineco every other day or so. This thing is so much easier and really simple to use. I especially love that I don't have to sweep the floor prior to mopping since it can also vacuum. Very well worth the time it saves.Cleaning it is a bit tedious, but still overall a much better experience than using a regular old mop. It also dries much faster since it doesn't leave as much moisture on the floor even after several passes. The dirty water tank fills up fairly quickly, so sometimes I have to dump it out before I finish cleaning all of my floor. Using this in addition to a robovac is keeping my tile floor clean all the time.

Best thing to buy with lots of kids. My husband who never cleans, uses it several times a week because we clean at the end of the day and it takes less than 15 min now!! Only complaint is it doesn’t get into the sides or corners well, and the water tank goes fast! But cleaning wise, our messy kid floors have never been as clean as they are now!

review_title: LEAKS, no customer support, unable to return
review_text: DO NOT BUY!!!! this mop leaks dirty water all over the place. I have had if for six weeks and can no longer use it. The return window has closed. I have called, live charred and emailed the product support line with no response so I have a $400 mop that makes a huge mess. Beware, if you invest money in this product there is no customer support  whatsoever so think hard before you take a $400 risk.

I got this after days of going back and forth with Bissel and hoover. I laid my hard wood floor back in 1999 or so. I went out and got the big bucket and cotton mop and light wet mopped my floors once a week sometime 2 weeks depending on how busy my life was at the time. I decided on the Tineco floor one S3.I was both amazed and disgusted of the dirty water tank that came from my floors. If you think your floors are clean after years of using a mop and bucket, they are not! This thing works and is worth the money is spent ($279). Installing the tanks takes practice but overall, I give it a 5. I will check back in after I've had it a few months to see how it holds up material wise.

Makes doing the floors much faster with the same level of cleanliness! This gave me back 4 hrs/mo of free time. It used to take me 3hrs to mop/dry my apartment’s hardwood floors from start to finish. With this cleaner, I can do the same job in an hour. The only drawback is you don’t get that freshly cleaned pine sol smell like with the mop. But that’s probably better for my lungs anyway. Can’t comment on deep cleaning as my place wasn’t nasty to begin with. Overall I’m happy with the performance of this cleaner. Wholeheartedly recommend.

review_title: Cleans great but customer service is AWFUL!
review_text: I absolutely love my tineco machine it works great! I’ve had for over a year now. BUT, All of sudden it stopped working and will no longer suck up water. I called and emailed customer service. I’ve done this so many times I’ve lost count. It’s been 3 weeks and I still haven’t got a replacement or anything to help get this resolved. I have never seen a company not send out a new product immediately if it’s still under warranty. The fact it only lasted a year is very worrisome for the price you pay for it.

review_title: Not able to get close to the crevasses
review_text: This machine is wonderful, and the only bad review I’d have to say is that it doesn’t get close to the wall or furniture. I wish they made a tool you could use to get the crevasses. Also, the water tank and dirty water tank get some use to putting themBack into there compartments. Other than that it’s an amazing machine and cleans beautifully.

The Tineco IFloor 3 was much better than the Bissell we had but the Tinecos water pump broke after 8 months of use. There is no one who will work on the unit and the company wants you to ship it back for repairs which does not work for me since we use it constantly. I did order another unit after I tossed this one in the trash but if this one does not last more than a year I would not recommend their products.

I love not having to sweep before I mop. This does a great job and gets the floors really clean.  My only complaints are there is a bit of a gap between the wall and where mopping ends and the water reservoir is on the smaller side and sometimes needs to be changed mid mop. It does a great job cleaning up after a malamute and keeping all the dog hair off the floor. Overall l, I love it and it cuts my cleaning time in half.

review_title: Just know that whatever it cleans up, you have to clean up!
review_text: I am so pleased with this little machine! Yes, I have to refill it often but that's why it's so light, and I'm able to mop my stairs.  Yes, I have to clear the debris channel and empty the dirty water tank often so I'm careful about what it sucks up.  Whenever possible, I vacuum first and it is just is such a pleasure to use!  I would never use it to mop us dirty spills, wipe it up first or you will have to clean the many parts of the machine.5 Stars compared to other electric mops I've used.  So pleased with my purchase!!!!
Made my life so much easier this is a quality piece of machine
Easy to use. Compact. Very easy to clean and maintain. Have recommended to many but unfortunately its no longer available. Great product
