   I thought my other mop was good enough, until I got this. Zero streaks, and look what it’s picked up in just 3 days and one room (I have 2 big dogs that run around the grassy backyard a lot, it’s not a mud pit). I have heart  issues that make it impossible to vacuum the house and then go back and mop it, which until now meant I was always behind on the dog hair and dirt. While I wish this guy had a bigger water tank and better battery life, boy does it make up for it in what it picks up and to be able to do both vacuuming and mopping in one step instead of two, means I can actually keep up on the maintenance. It’s super easy to clean and maintain, and the video speaks for itself. Buy this!!!

I absolutely love this product. I hated mopping and sweeping. Since I’ve gotten this thing, I’m mopping and sweeping about three times a week! My whole house! I 100% recommend.I couldn’t hook up the the Bluetooth but I’m also not sure what benefit that is. I’m alittle suspicious of the blue to red ring screen on the top. It picks the oddest times to be red for dirty and then sometimes when I feel like it should be red dirty, it isn’t. But either way it works greatbattery life is good.Self clean is greatI don’t feel like I need to refill the water or empty the dirty water often. When on max power it uses more water so both tanks WILL fill up quickly but I keep mine on auto.

review_title: Lasted 3 uses (: don't waste your money
review_text: I used it 3 times then it stopped sucking the water appropriately and it just gushed through the bottom
Easy to use on hardwood floors.

review_title: If you’re mom you need to get this
review_text: I love this so much!!!!!!!!!!

review_title: Read the booklet and follow instruction.
review_text: Cleaning my Tile Floor and hardwood floor.  Very good.
I will never go back to regular mopping!! I love this mom toy so much!!! Haha Just overall a great product
Returned after 1 room. The water tank is insanely small & I had to stop twice to fill it for the kitchen. Didn't seem to "mop" well at all.

review_title: Simplemente resuelve mucho en el hogar
review_text: Simplifica la limpiezaAhora solo hago un paso y  obtengoUn excelente resultado
Love it! Nearly eliminates the need to scrub. It does the work for you, other than a tough spot on rare occasion.
Amazing! Not sure how I ever lived without having one before!  Cleans my floors like no mop (disposable or otherwise) ever could.
It has thw worst suction ever. It takes a ling time to clean hardwood floors. You have to go iver them serveral times. It would take you fkrever to get a deep clean. Very disappointed.

This is an excellent machine for cleaning hard floors. We have had many floor scrubbers and we like this one the best. We raise dogs for a living so we use it multiple times a day. The problem is with the electrical supply. One of the units burned out the contacts. The second one we have now has stopped charging. They were very good to work with but I really want one that stays working. The cheaper model works very well as well and has had less issues. We prefer this one as it is stronger and better made but will probably go back to the cheaper model.

Stopped suctioning after 1 use!! Called Customer service. Will update after their responseCustomer service was very good with responding and sending me a replacement. The first replacement was another model which also didn’t work properly (telling me to clean the brush roll very 5 min ) and they replaced that one with the correct model. The new replacement works great! I love the ergonomics - very easy to use for someone with a back pain. Cleans very well and easy to clean! The unit actually tells you when to empty the dirty water tank and when to refill the clean water tank. The cleaning solution is streak less and very effective. I asked for an extended warranty Because of my concerns about reliability ( the unit comes with a 2 year warranty) and customer service agreed but they keep replying that the extended warranty is 2 years. Not sure if that is a language barrier problem. Love the unit for it’s streamlined look and self cleaning features. Much easier to clean then my daughter’s Bissell Crosswave.

I love my tineco. Three kids, a big dog and a house with nothing but wood floors. Swiffer wetjet just pushes the mess around and you have to vacuum separately first. So let's talk about the downsides....-You will go through a lot of cleaning solution even just using a cap's worth per fill.  I use my tineco once every two days on average and I went through three bottles in six months. You can't get this through amazon because it's back-ordered so you have to order from their website and pay shipping.-Mine stopped working out of nowhere a few weeks ago the process to get a new one under their warranty has been HORRIBLE.  I had to send them a video with super strict size requirements showing them that their machine truly was broken.  I had to download a special app to make a video that demonstrated I had tried everything they required but would keep the video size small enough. Then they sent me a label and said ship it back and when we get it we will give you a new one.  Except they didn't send packaging materials.  $27 later I had the right size box and packaging that met their label's requirement. Customer service will not take your call you have to communicate strictly via email.  It took me a whole month to get the replacement and lots of emails from their "customer care" in broken English.-It stinks! If you don't clean out the catch bin really good every time and constantly change the filter it gets an odor to it.I love the machine, it's great for muddy, sticky messes but customer care needs an overhaul.

review_title: Best christmas present I’ve ever bought myself!
review_text: Tineco FloorOne S3. This thing kicks major ass, IMO. I have a very large floor plan with a mix of engineered hardwoods and ceramic tiles (I believe. Maybe porcelain). I have 3 small kids and lose my mind on a daily basis trying to sweep up debris and clean spills/splatters multiple times every day. Especially around mealtime.I had been considering a Bissell, but heard a couple things that made me hesitant.  Well, I heard about this, and saw a couple comparison videos. Then it went on sale. Instead of my usual analysis paralysis, I pulled the trigger and am so glad I did!  Between all the hair my 3 girls and I shed, and all the hair and fur their dolls and ponies shed I wasn’t sure this would get the job done. But it does!  It’s lightweight. Has good forward pull. Puts down just enough fluid, but not too much. And picks up every damn crumb.I have used it every day for almost a month now. Having my sweeping and mopping done in one step is almost freaking giddily orgasmic. Now I don’t fear serving rice for dinner or giving my kids chips. Nor do I have to threaten them with the iron maiden if they make a mess. In fact, it’s so easy to use that my 5yr old can manage it too. I can get about 1800sqft of space done and still be at around 30% power left. Depending on how dirty the floors are I can get everything done without having to refill or empty the tanks. The cleaning solution that comes with it smells so dang good, but not overbearingly so (I get migraines from strong scents). And my floors FEEL cleaner afterwards. My husband even noticed they feel different and he generally never notices anything having to do with cleaning.Also, mine S3 appears to charge very quickly. I use it several times a day and never have had an issue.Please note, as awesome as this is, you may still need to sweep/wipe out tight corners. My half bath has a space between the toilet and the wall that is too narrow for this to fit. It does have suction that helps with lint/hair/fur at the baseboard edges, but for heavier stuff you may still need to sweep it out a bit. It’s never been a big issue for me though.  I am SUPER anal about my floors and this machine leaves me super satisfied.Also note, this will NOT scrub grout. Nothing will. Not even this. It will clean it, but not scrub it.

The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
        
    
    

   Coming from a momma of two and a clean house lover, I had to try this vacuum mop! I absolutely love the functionality of the product and the convenience. Truthfully, I haven’t picked the broom up, but maybe a handful of times since my purchase. It has made my everyday cleaning process so much more simple. This product is absolutely worth every penny. While we are all hoping for a miracle robot to follow us around and clean our messes at immaculate standards, let’s be real they don’t exist right now. This product is not going to deep clean, rejuvenate or steam clean your floors. However, the product does clean recent stains, dirt, hair and small object debris. I find it best to deep clean my floor once a week using my heavy duty steam mop, and my tineco for everyday use. Definitely would buy over and over again! I do wish the product had a light near the suction roller, larger tank capacities and the cleaning solution was much more accessible. But all in all, I love my tineco!

Unfortunately this was an expensive disappointment for me. Such a good idea but falls short in many ways.  Leaves streaks on my floor no matter how I use it. Get the “dirty water tank full” warning when the tank is no where near full. Can’t finish half my regular living space without doing a self clean. Doesn’t get close to the edges where all the dirt really collects. We’re hard on our floors, no doubt- with 2 dogs and lots of red clay, but for $300 I should be able to clean the entire desired area in 1 pass without streaks and without stopping to self-clean.Also, don’t expect to be able to use on rugs or carpet. There’s no where near enough suction for that.Finally, can’t find replacement brush rollers or solution in stock, ever.Will likely be returning and going back to my shark vacuum with regular mop.

Well… this has been a rollercoaster ride since receiving this floor cleaner. I was in love the first two months until the day it stopped sucking and started er.. to suck.. in the sense of “ well this sucks”The vacuum motor would not come on and it would leave the floor wet. Tried all the suggested albeit limited troubleshooting tips to correct this to no avail. Finally after sending the information via email to the factory, I received a response to take video, document it through their warranty portal. Repeat this process a couple of times and then was informed that they would be sending me a new machine but not until I packaged and sent them the malfunctioned unit. Of course they would pay shipping, but I had thrown the box out and was in the process of selling my house that had wood floors throughout the entire upper story that would need to be cleaned before closing. Needless to say , I persuaded them to send me the new and I’d send the old back when I had the box. All of the correspondence was a little tough due to the country of origin and the differing written dialect but worked out in the end. Got a new machine a week after the deal was finalized. Fast forward to now. 7 months after the second machine was received, it has also died. The fact that sucks the most is- it’s unexpected and when your floors are dirty, you grab it off the charger and turn it on then disappoint immediately sets in. It was working the last time you used it then nothing. I’m pretty disappointed with this cleaner. For $300 bucks, 2 machine failures and having to go back to the old fashioned cleaning method, I’d do it over without having discovered  this revolutionary cleaning machine and stick with the basics but unfortunately I’ve been spoiled for the last 9 months and may not be able to turn back. If you want to take the chance that you’ll receive a machine that will last forever, go for it. If not, I’d spend my money on Something else.

review_title: Broke right away, bad customer service!
review_text: I was really excited about this and I thought I worked well and was easy to use BUT after about 4 uses the motor malfunctioned and the vacuum is not fixable. It was not used roughly or with extra dirty floors or anything. I called Tineco’s customer service and they advised me to return to Amazon. They said they would offer a discount after I bought another, but I will not be doing that. I was really hoping they would replace it but they didn’t. For $300 I am extremely disappointed. If you buy this, save the box! Returning it was such a pain!UPDATE: The company emailed me back and said they were going to "replace the whole unit" but it would be at the end of the month. I was waiting and waiting and never received it. When I checked back with them they acted like this was never a thing and that I was not going to get one since I received a refund. THEY were the ones to offer to send me a new one, without any prompting from me. This whole experience has just been terrible and I wish I would have listened to the reviews that said not to buy this.

So long swifter and dirty floors! Use to clean the tile floors daily with 2-3 wet swiffer over 20 minutes and exhausted as pushing down required to clean. With iFloor - floors are clean takes 5 minutes without a drop of sweat. And it has self cleaning mode. The only thing I wish is bigger tank for both clean and dirty water. But overall 300% improvement from using swifter or wet mop.

review_title: Doesn’t live up to rave reviewed expectations
review_text: The idea of this is spot on. If it worked like the reviews I’ve seen I’d be in love with it. The price is far too high for a machine that has short battery life. It also doesn’t get edges and corners at all. It leaves about an inch of untouched space on edges. The suction power is amazing and it can take on some heavy duty messes but it will not do edges. I also feel like for the price I shouldn’t have to be changing water as often. I wanted to love this vac so much. I do love it. It just doesn’t do what I was expecting it to do. Maybe I have too high expectations based off of all the rave reviews on every social media platform. I am still deciding if I want to return it or keep it. 😔
This is worth every penny! It saves me so much time in my cleaning! I absolutely love it!

review_title: Best vacuum cleaner ever has been
review_text: I love she clean my apartment

review_title: Buy it! You won’t regret it.
review_text: Love this purchase. Had for about two months use almost daily.
This vacuum lives up to the hype. I’m super happy with it!
LOVE LOVE LOVE IT !!! Puts the bissell to shame !!
Love my tineco! Leaves my floors feeling squeaky clean.
I love my ifloor. It really gets the job done.
Best Buy in 2021

review_title: Could be better but still in love
review_text: Could use more suction power/ better cleaner for difficult to mop surfaces for the price
Oh wow wish I’d bought this sooner!

review_title: Does not reach corners or around objects...
review_text: This product does an ok job at hard surfaces but does not reach in corners or around objects. This product leaves an untouched surface of around an inch or so. This is pretty annoying since dirt and grime gets into corners most often. For the price , this should work wonders but it doesn't.  I originally bought this for my dad,  he has vinyl floors and it works ok. I used it on my stained concrete floors and it didn't seem to perform as well. I think I'll stick to my shark steam floor cleaner. The battery does stay charged for 25 mins or so . That is pretty good for having to charge 4-5 hours. I wouldn't recommend this product to anyone that wants their entire floor clean.

I love the ease of use. Very lightweight, easy to maneuver. Does an excellent job cleaning my hardwood floors. It has 2 levels of power and the lower one works just fine. I can use either plain water or a capful of the solution provided. I don't like that in order to clean the dirty water reservoir and roller you have to get your hands in it. That is the only drawback. I love that it is cordless. Would definitely recommend.

This device is a must have if you own pets, have hardwood floors, or any kind of tile or linoleum. Easy to use, easy to clean, and works fantastically! If I could give it more than five stars I would, but this product for exceeds any of its competitors from an operational stand point, Maintenance and cleaning stand point. If you have allergies or pets or just a high traffic area, or you spill something on the floor this is the product you need to keep your home and floors clean! A+++

review_title: Non stop cleaning cycle messages have this collecting dust in a corner
review_text: When it works it does it's job well. Unfortunately the machine rarely finishes a single room before needing to go through a cleaning cycle. When the cleaning cycle is done and fluids are emptied/refilled the machine frequently errs out saying it needs another cleaning cycle. We run another cycle, get the same error several times then give up in frustration. This is after sweeping the floors first to remove pet hair and debris. I will keep fighting it for a while but expect we will go back to our mop and bucket.

While I wish water capacity cup was larger overall I love the convenience of being able to clean my tile floors in literally MINUTES.  Have 2700 square feet and the entire downstairs is tile.  First time in years that I've been able to clean the floors so quickly AND so well.  Floors look best they have in years!  THANKS, love 💘 this!

review_title: A product that actually does what it says!
review_text: One of the rare moments when a product doesn’t just work, it works as well as the manufacturer said it would. Our home is mostly solid hardwood floors but also has one room with LVT and 4 with tile. On one charge and a little less than two tanks of fluid this thing did all of them. More importantly, the floors are clean. We re-vacuumed the main living area with an empty catch bin to check, snd no hair remaining from our two shedding dogs. And, a wipe check with a clean white towel got nothing.The only draw back was emptying the tank. There was, as expected, a lot of dog hair. But… I took it as evidence of success.Goodbye two step, less effective, and much harder process with vacuuming then Swiffer wet.

My husband bought me this wet vacuum and I LOVE IT. I'm pretty air-headed and can mess things up on a whim, that being said, it's easy to use.Its lightweight, quiet and cleans like a madwoman! I have used it twice this week and both times were flawless. We have a Shiba Inu and she sheds non-stop! So much gunk, funk and nastiness came out of that dirty water container. OH and I really appreciate the self cleaning mode for the roller. This baby will be a BREEZE to maintain.I am SOLD. We also bought the vacuum for carpet, can't wait for that to come in and try it. Wooh!

review_title: I can’t say enough positive things!
review_text: Amazing! The suction is very powerful and it cleans my floor so well! I have a German Shepard inside so that means A LOT of hair and I also have 3 young children so that means A LOT of messes to clean up! I use this all day during my daily cleaning and each night after the kids are down and I’m cleaning up before bed. It’s quiet enough that it does not bother anyone when I use it after bedtime but powerful enough to get the job done right! Saves me a step and gives me more time in my day. I use to have the Bissell Crosswave but the Tineco is hands down better!

I’ve had a Hoover Floormate for probably 15 years or more. I liked the idea that it sucked up the dirty water rather than just pushing it around or trusting you get it all picked up.This machine is very quiet compared to the Floormate and lighter. The water containers  are a little bit smaller but it seems to use less water too.Because it’s cordless its also very easy to maneuver not having to worry about the cord or unplug it to go into another room.I love, love, love this machine and will be telling everyone I know to get one.

review_title: It’s a nice techy Moo but it’s pricey and needs good after use cleaning
review_text: This has a lot of pros and cons some being the price point. It’s a pricey gadget. It requires cleaning after each use otherwise the debris will sit and get an ugly odor. While it does leave my floors clean! It doesn’t get into the gritty corners or edges like a mania Mop would so keep that in mind. Be sure to make sure you deep clean or scrub and air dry the roller head because it Will stink
Where has this vacuum been all my life!  I love it!!! Sweeps and deep cleans all in one sweep.  No need to dry swifter the wet swifter after that!  Totally a life saver!
I wish it suctioned better in the front of the vacuum. It’s terrible against a wall or in corners - the brush and the suction don’t reach.
This was absolutely great at first, but I have now had it 3 months and the battery charging station no longer works. I’m very upset!

It works good. Not as good as I had seen in videos! If you use it on fresh messes it’s a life saver however if you use it on stick on things that are sticky, it’s not as good! Overall love it but do wish it worked better on sticky messes considering I have kids!

This cleans so well! We have three dogs and lots of dog hair on the floor. This saves the step of sweeping for real👏🏼 and even Cleans stuff stuck to the floor spills etc The only negative would be the clean water container is very small so must refill it with soap and water often

review_title: Makes cleaning floors quick and easy!!
review_text: I love this vac mop! It has made cleaning my floors so much easier! It is self propelled which makes it quick and easy to use. The charge lasts long enough to do the floors in my 1200 square foot house. I have cats and it handles the hair and litter well. It is easy to clean and does a great job at self cleaning the roller. It was quite a bit cheaper than the Bissell cordless vac mop. I would definitely recommend this vac mop.

I recommend this to everyone that come to my house. Because it’s so awesome it mops and vacuum at the same time!! It’s great especially when I have a dog that runs in and out! It saves me so much time. Easy to install and clean. Would recommend!!

this product is exactly what I was looking for. I swiffer and mop my floors and it would seem like they were never fully clean. Since using this product my floors feel so clean and so much better. The clean and dirty water chambers are a breeze to change. It's so easy to push too. It feels self propelled. The dirt & hair I got the first use was unreal. This thing is great with dog hair! I highly recommend this!

I have 2 dogs who shed so bad so I still vacuum or sweep before because this vacuum doesn’t handle the amount of dog hair in my house the best BUT overall I still think this vacuum is amazing and as long as you keep it clean and take care of it you’re good to go. Most of my house of hardwood and I haven’t seen the floors looking this good in a long time.

This little vacuum is nothing but completely amazing! I never write reviews I felt compelled to since I’m so in love with this thing! I have wood laminate flooring throughout my whole house which I have never been able to get truly clean and straight free it is crazy how much dirt and grime this thing sucks up I have never before had Streak free flooring in my whole house! So impressed!

We love this wet dry vacuum. So easy to zoom through a mess. We have light colored floors so footsteps, spills anything is easily visible. Quick press of a button and slide it through the mess and floor stays perfectly clean. Definitely would recommend.

I seriously had some doubts buying this I have 2 dogs a cat and children (plus babysitting kids) and this made my floors look brand new I have only had it for one day but man I don't want to stop using it! The one complaint I guess I could have is the battery life but I mean if I do the full house I don't expect it to last long! I did half my house on full battery and it died just at my last little corner. I have around a 1200sqt house.

We have a new puppy, and this has been the perfect tool to help with his little accidents in a sanitary way. It a lot quieter than expected too. My younger kids (age 5 and 8) have no problem using it so they are able to help with small cleaning tasks.

Super excited about this purchase but after one use the machine decided to not charge anymore.  Reached out to Tineco customer service multiple times before getting a response.  After sending pictures, descriptions and video of the vacuum they agreed to replace the entire machine.  I am currently waiting on the replacement.  The one time I was able to use this I loved it.  It cleaned so well.  I am looking forward to getting the replacement and hopefully it will have a much longer life.

I have pets so the hair kept clogging the vacuum and I repeatedly had to tear it apart. Also i had to repeatedly go over the floor to get it cleaned.  On the linoleum flooring I had to clean the floor with a swifer before using the vacuum mop

I love this machine!!! It is a total game changer I wish I would have had this when I had children in the house! It’s so effortless and my floors are so clean! I haven’t used it on any rugs yet but I did use it on my art room floor which is basic concrete that i have never been able to get truly clean and it worked like a dream!! GET THIS NOW!!!!

I am AMAZED at this vacuum! Wow! I should have bought one years ago, if they had them! Picks up pet hair so well on my hardwood floors. I will say that I have a few rugs and it seriously got so much dirt out of them. I was really impressed. Spend the money. It’s worth not having to mop!

What i did not like was the charging port which is hard to connect  and the water container needs to be larger. The manual printed instruction is too small to read even with reading glasses. The thing does clean and drys wood floors fast

Can’t rave enough about this machine. I was very skeptical about the machine and brand which I’ve never heard of. Machine cleans floors leaving NO streaks! Went back with a wet paper towel and a dry one and there was absolutely nothing. The only thing is that it doesn’t get the corners but I get that when I’m cleaning my baseboards. Maneuvers very easily and picks up dog hair and misc trash even cleans the door mats. Very satisfied with my purchase. 30 day review used 2X week tile and wood floor.

review_title: I really wanted to love this.
review_text: I honestly love everything about this vacuum, except for one thing. The streaks! It leaves awful streaks on my vinyl flooring! I’m so bummed because I really do like everything else about it. But the streaks are so distracting, it doesn’t look fully clean! Returning.

review_title: Vacuuming and mopping at once saves so much time!
review_text: I've always done floor cleaning the old-fashioned way--vacuuming everything up, then returning with a mop/bucket (or more recently with a Bona spray mop).I wasn't prepared for how well the Floor One S3 works! Put hot water with a bit of cleaner in the clean water section, turn it on, and start to go over the (urethane) hardwood floors. It's reasonably quiet as it scrubs the floor with the roller. The majority of the water is removed by the vacuum and it quickly tries (within a minute or two).The water that came out after the first time was filthy--and this was 2-3 days after the floor had been mopped conventionally. Incredible. The tanks and roller are easy to clean, and this thing is so convenient that I mop the kitchen a couple times a week (and I don't have dogs anymore--otherwise I'd probably use it more often). If you have something dried on and gummy, you're going to have to bend over and get it off with a fingernail--but otherwise, it's really seems to get. the floor squeaky clean.Before ordering this, I was worried that it just might be an expensive gadget but I'm convinced. No complaints whatsoever--it does a great job.

First impressions: I have the original first model of the tineco in this line and I finally upgraded because I was tired of constantly cleaning the roller. This roller is a monster it will not be easily lost (the problem with my old one) the suction in this is tenfold better than my own regular vacuum. And I absolutely love the self clean cycle, this one does not hold the odor that it’s predecessor did at all.My only cons and it’s only ever so slight, is I hate the “AI” voice, I just wish she wasn’t so loud. And this has a self propeller type deal and I thought it was going to rip my arm off otherwise after getting a few cleans in I love this machine, it helps tremendously in between normal cleaning and I don’t really have a bad enough complaint to hinder a overall 5 star review

I'm still evaluating this floor cleaner. I've had some problems with attaching the water reservoir. I wanted to use it daily but it says to allow the roller to dry out before reassembling. A second roller would be helpful. I hope it lasts long enough to make the $300 purchase worthwhile.
Product did not charge on arrival.  No 24 hour customer service.

review_title: Customer service is terrible and item doesn’t work long
review_text: *Edit to add I have no found out there is motor failure in the machine, customer service is requiring that I send my unit to Canada to have it fixed and wait several weeks or months to get it back. And if I don’t package it right for the trip it can break and they won’t fix it then.* I have had this item less than 6 months, I am CONSTANTLY having issues with it. It stops in the middle of cleaning, doesn’t pickup dirt/debri very well, leaves water streaks water puddles really) all over my floor, when using the self cleaning button on the charger it fills the charging tray up with water then stops the cleaning process. No matter how much or how dirty the water gets if you leave it in the tank longer than about 12 hours it starts to stick really bad and mold inside the tank and filter. I tried getting ahold of the company to fix issues before my 30 days that I could return it to Amazon to no avail. I tried calling, and emailing and could never get a response. The website gives you no real trouble shooting options just makes you go in circles.Customer service is a joke!

review_title: A must have for dog owners
review_text: I purchased this back in March and have been trying it for awhile before reviewing. I was on a search to find a good vacuum/mop combo item and after trying two other highly recommended brands (And being left disappointed) I stumbled upon this one. I have two dogs that create a lot of hair/messes and cleaning the floors was a dreaded task since it would take hours to vacuum everywhere and then to go back and mop. This had changed that! The price of this machines is high but no more mopping for me! It makes it easy to clean my floors and picks up the dog hairs which I appreciate. I also have laminate, tile, and carpet in my house and it performs pretty well on all of them. It misses some stuff in the deeper grout lines on tiles and doesn’t always get very last piece of lint off the higher pile carpet but overall performs well for maintenance cleanings. If you have a house with full laminate then this is a MUST!

I'm very happy with this purchase. My floors are actually clean now. I didn't realize that when I was using a regular swiffer mop that I was mostly just pushing dirt around. Then I saw someone post a video of their Tineco on tiktok and I knew I had to have one. Its very easy to use and does a great job. I clean my kitchen floor, entry hall, main hall, and an 8x8 section of flooring by my back door, all on full max power and the battery never gets below 30%. My constructive criticisms are as follows:1) The dirty water tank and the clean water tank do not coincide as far as timing. For instance, my dirty water tank will need to be emptied and then about a minute or two later, my clean tank needs a refill. I've learned that when one needs my attention, it's best to just do both. I'd love for them to somehow make these match up.2) It would be great if they could somehow increase the capacity of both tanks.3) There is a small edge issue, meaning if you are trying to suck up a piece of dirt that is right at the part where the floor meets the wall, the size of the vacuum head does not allow you to get close enough to suck it up. This is where extra suction would make a huge difference.All in all, this is a great product and I feel so much better knowing that my floors are truly CLEAN!

review_title: Amazing for mopping, but not for pet hair!
review_text: I love this product regardless of my expectations. I was so excited to have a vacuum/mop combo (my first ever!), but my expectations weren't reality. I somehow thought this would be a one and done product for my kitchen and bathroom floors. It would be if I wasn't a dog fanatic with dogs that shed, so be warned to managed your expectations. This will pick up all dirt and dust while mopping and does great for mopping, but it will not pick up all your pet hair without clogging. I will still have to sweep before using, but this was still a fantastic purchase!!

1. I love self clean mode. You still have to rinse everything but I don't have to scrub the roller bar which is fantastic!2. I like that I can run it with just water or with the cleaning solution3. I do not like that it does no reach all the way to the edge. It leaves about a 1" gap around the edges of everything.4. Yes it all has to dry but it is easy to clean!Overall it's been great for simple cleaning. I can't say that it is the best at deep cleaning and getting stuck on food off the floor but for the mop/vacuum combo it's a time saver!

review_title: Daily dirt and dust is no more.
review_text: I purchased this because I hate to sweep, vacuum, then mop.  Usually, I didn't get it all done.  I have two large dogs that shed and also carry in dirt from outside daily.  They use a doggie door and dust follows them.This vacuum has made it so much easier to have truly clean floors!I will say cleaning the tank is disgusting as it captures so much that it is like pouring out mud instead of water.  That is also a positive as you can visualize the amount of dirt on a floor.  Also, you may have to clean the tank a couple times during your vacuuming use.  I know mine gets clogged with lots of fine dog hair.I only have hardwood and the self propelled part of this vacuum makes it a breeze.  It glides easily while providing a strong suction.I would definitely purchase again.

review_title: Worth the price tag. Only one tiny tiny thing....
review_text: This is the greatest product ever. Simple, powerful and efficient. But it, you won’t regret it.My only nit-pick about it, is design. I’m always pressing the “self-cleaning” button by accident grabbing the handle, then the blinking icon is on the whole time. Nothing serious, just my two cents :)

I bought the bissell crosswave a year ago and it was awful. A big pain in the... It didn’t clean well and was a hassle to keep clean. This vacuum is easy to clean, has so much power behind it and vacuums up everything my three small children drop on the floor. So happy I made the upgrade!

This cleaner is allot better then the bissell I just returned..All you need is a cap full of solution and doesn't leave any streaks plus picks up all the dog hair with out clogging..The only con so far is that I wish the solution and suction containers were larger

Seriously the best thing I ever bought for myself. I am a busy mom of four and my dark hardwood floors get messy. a lot. Makes for mopping my floors the least of my worries. My baby can fling his food all he wants, for this sucks up everything from Cheerios, cracker crumbs to sticky Ramon!  I could care less what falls on the floor with this tineco  mop. Its quick, easy to use and literally a game changer! You don’t have to vacuum first so it cuts your time in half (cleaning floors!)If you have lots of flooring...You need this. I promise. You’ll have no regrets.

review_title: Buy it, you won’t regret it!
review_text: Buy this. You won’t regret it. I couldn’t be happier with this purchase. You think you’re floors are clean until you use this mop. Game changer and it’s so satisfying seeing all the dirty water. I now can’t wait to wash my floors and I do it now everyday because of this machine. I can’t speak any more highly about this product than I am. I already had 3 of my friends buy this because they saw how well it works at my house and now, they love it too!

review_title: I recommend to all my friends
review_text: I have had this product for four months now and absolutely love it. My whole home is hard flooring and mopping before was terrible. I have to change it a couple times to do everything but honestly I am so happy with my product. I have referred multiple people to tineco.

review_title: BUY IT if you want to be amazed but disgusted
review_text:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
        
    
    

   First let me start by saying I never write reviews, but this one needs to be written. I vacuum/mop my floors weekly so I always thought they were clean. This vacmop blew my mind. You can watch the video and see why. The video is what came up from my kitchen, living room rug, and hallway carpet. It doesn’t say to use it on carpet but we did and it worked great. We have a potty training 2 year old so accidents + carpet = not good results. My floors literally FEEL different to walk on. My son is scared of the vacuum sound and he is unbothered by this because it’s so much quieter. 10/10 recommend.

Absolutely love mine iFloor3! I just mopped on Wednesday and got my iFloor3 today (Friday) and I’m so disgusted! 🤮 I can’t believe that my floors were this gross after only 2 days!Only thing that would make it slightly better is the ability to use it corded or cordless. I have a big downstairs that has all hard floor and it died before I was done.

review_title: My floors have never been this clean...
review_text: There is absolutely nothing I dislike about this product. It does everything and it’s so easy to use. I have a toddler and a puppy and my floors have never been more clean. Less expensive than the bissel cross wave but BETTER. The bissel isn’t even cordless. The tineco is!

I have very good house cleaners and when I turned this on, the blue was showing that the floors were "clean" with a few areas red. So I cleaned over the floors again and the dirty water came out BLACK, and that's with floors that were considered fairly "clean"! Makes life so easy and tells you what you need to do next!
Works well AND cleans close to the edges!

I’m not one to leave reviews. BUT this product deserves 1.  Just buy it!!!  It’s a game changer for cleaning tile.  Hardwood. Concrete floors.  Holy Moly I’m blown away.  Super easy cleanup also.  My only dislike wld be battery life runs about 18-20min then it’s got to go back on charge. However it does charge quick.
I love this thing. Wow. It’s cleans well and in a fraction of the time. A must for hard floors. It’s self propelled and self cleaning, too.

review_title: Great product! A bit pricey but gets the job done and saves time!!
review_text: Happy with it so far. It’s works great with 2 cats and a toddler. And my back doesn’t hurt like with a manual mop. Recommend!
I love this it’s so nice cleaning my hardwood and tile floors!! Only thing is I wish it got onto the edges a little better but other than that it’s great

review_title: Solution is always out of stock.
review_text: The machine itself does a decent job.- not great but it’s quick and easy. Cannot get close to walls probably 1-2 inches away  The biggest issue is the cleaning solution is never available and the company does not recommend using anything else.  So- I have a $350 machine that can’t be used.  Should’ve bought the Crosswave
I finally found the best way to clean my floors I’ve tried SO many mops/steamers etc. this is it. In love. Order it. You need it.

I am abit if a "neat freak" so cleaning tools are my jam. I was smiling the whole time cleaning my vinyl plank and tile floors. This might just be my favorite cleaning aid I have ever owned! It self propels making it alittle easier and sweeps/mops at the same time, such a time saver! My only small complaint is the battery life, but with a cordless that is to be expected! LOVE LOVE LOVE

I have hardwood floors downstairs, three kids, dogs, cats and high traffic since it’s the main area for the family. This does really well with keeping the floors clean. Only complaint is the dirty water tank and clean water tank are tiny. The battery will last long enough to clean my entire downstairs, so that’s a plus. I enjoy the self cleaning capability as well.

review_title: Super awesome - don't know why we didn't buy sooner!
review_text: This is such a fantastic tool.  We have six dogs and all hardwood floors.  This cleans up everything so easily.  I would recommend to everyone!

DID WE JUST BECOME BEST FRIENDS?! I just tried my new vac tonight, it came a day early so I had vacuumed the day before. Low and behold it got up my smooth coat bordercollies dog hair. Like an insane amount of it came up. I am so excited to continue using this and I cant wait to tackle the hardwood floors upstairs.

I really wanted to love this! But sadly it didn’t do the job - it left roller streak marks which means that I had to go over with a micro fiber mop - second it was to much to clean up - you can’t just do the self clean you have to remove all the parts and have them dry - nice concept but no go for the price it went back today
I love this product! I actually had purchased the tineco ifloor and loved it so much I purchased this one!! Easy to use and I love the app too.

Why did I wait so long to get this??  It’s amazing.  Super light weight.  Way quieter than the Hoover I had.  The self clean feature is awesome, and sort of gratifying to watch!  I’m very pleased with it.
This is totally amazing product for cleaning in one go.The only problem which I face is deep cleaning of corners ,other than that it cleans so fast and smooth on my hardwood floor.☺️👍🏻

review_title: Some stains can’t remove but everything else is good. I like it
review_text: I like it . But some stains can’t remove from wood floor. So everything else is good!

We have all hardwood and tile in our house, and this thing cleans like a dream. Picks up dog hair, crumbs, dust, dirt, all while mopping and making your floors look and feel super clean. I'm so happy I finally ordered!
Best thing I've bought in a long time... I had been researching floor machines and this one always was top rated. Wish I had purchased this earlier, as it has cut my cleaning time in half.

I was nervous about spending the money, but a friend of mine had one and loved it.  It's such a great purchase! I HATE to clean my floors.  Not with this little wonder.  It's so easy to use and does a great job! Highly recommend.
This product keeps turning off and saying the dirty tank is full even after just cleaning it out something is wrong w sensors

Love this product!!!  Read so many reviews and comparisons and I have to say the tineco definitely lived up to the claims!  This is great for a quick clean up or a dep clean.  It always amazes me how dirty my floors are!  Highly recommended
A but of a learning curve about running the cleaning cycle after use but the clean is worth it.  Takes up even stuck on spots.  Works effortlessly.  I love it and even bought one for my Mom.

Very inconvenient. One minute it will say you have to remove the dirty water. Once you do that it will tell you it needs self cleaning, but the self cleaning never finishes because either the dirty water is too "full"  or the clean water is empty. I can never get anythinh done with this thing that requires maintenance every 2 minutes or so. Do not recommend

review_title: Our new “Go To” machine for floors
review_text: We have actually bought one for all of our kids homes. I can not say enough good things about this machine If my wife had to make a choice between me or this machine I would probably be in trouble

review_title: Best investment ever! Especially with kids.
review_text: I’ve had this for over a month now and amcoming back to write this review which I NEVER do. I have toddler twin boys who spill things, track mud or dirt and I have absolutely LOVED having this to easily clean up their messes. I use it several times a day, it’s SO easy to clean and use. No hassle. My only regret is not buying it sooner. I just ordered the cordless stick vacuum for this brand because I love how simple it is to use and so efficient. It really does make cleaning so quick! I would highly recommend this product. Especially if you have messy kids! ;)

review_title: Best hardwood floor cleaner I’ve ever owned.
review_text: Goodbye 2 step vacuum and mop! Attaching the photo of it on its base, so you guys can see it’s slightly slanted (I thought it would be straight up). Not a huge deal.

Likes- the floors look amazing after I clean it, the suction is pretty good, I have a dog and a cat and it gets the dog hair well.Dislike- it does need to self clean a lot, depending on how often you clean your floors, if you go a couple days without cleaning it’s going to need to self clean multiple times. It takes awhile to charge, but the battery does last long enough to clean my whole house.

review_title: Freaking incredible cordless hard surface cleaner
review_text: I can’t stress you guys enough on how amazing this little machine is. My floors have never looked cleaner. I will never go back to the old map and bucket. I loved it so much I recorded myself and sent it out to my friends and family. Who now six of my family members bought it for  themselves. This is a game changer when it comes to cleaning your floors. Absolutely a game changer 1 out of 10 I give it 1000%. It’s a must try*Vivian

review_title: Like the ease of two in one
review_text: It is simple to use, seems to clean okay.  Not better than a vacuum then a mop, but the ease of one machine is great for those quick cleans is great.  Cleaning out the dirty water tank, yuck...

review_title: A must for indoor pet households
review_text: This tool changed my life.  My short haired dog sheds and his paws always leave prints on my dark hard wood floors.  I use it everyday. The floor is white glove clean.

   I'm ready to start selling this vacuum. This is the best investment I've ever made.
This machine works great on my hardwood and tile floors. I use my dust mop first only because I want less filth when I use the wet mop machine. Floors come out shiny and beautiful and fresh smelling.

   I'm happy about how well it worked on our kitchen floor. My husband always spilled some wine or juice on the ground. I don't have to bend my knee to wipe the stain with wet towel anymore.Wireless vacuum cleaner is a time saving. I highly recommend it if you have a wood floor and a kitchen floor like ours.

This machine is the best thing ever. I highly recommend! I have 2,500 sq feet of laminate flooring. I used to sweep with a broom and then mop.  Took forever. Now I do all in one and takes me very little time and it cleans great.  Nice shiny floors. Easy to use. I will definitely be purchasing for my daughter’s!

Not worth the time or money if you have an animal that sheds a lot. The canisters for both the clean water/solution and the dirty water is really tiny. I only have a 1100 Sq ft house and I have to clean and dump the canister 6 or more times. Oh and it dies really fast!

I love this product. I would have given it a 5 but only negatives is the dirty water tank and clean water tank are not big enough. I messaged the customer service a few days ago and no response. If there were an ability to get a larger one for each it would be totally amazing. I don't mind the added weight etc. This item is much better than the bissell crosswave.
I have a lot of plank flooring, 3500 sq.ft. This cleans them very well . Its light and easy to use and the customer service is outstanding!!!

review_title: Buy it it's worth every penny
review_text: Do I use this thing everyday  Yes Yes I do do I think you should buy this product Yes I do you don't know how dirty your floors are until you buy this product I have made it a challenge to make the water run clear but I have 2 kids so it will probably be a while

Ran perfect for the first 15 mins. After that it just floods the floor without suctioning. Absolutely nothing blocking anything for it to be doing this. Absolutely disappointed in a $325 product not even making it a full 30 mins without working.

I love this product. It makes mopping a breeze and with a new puppy it's been a lot of help keeping your house clean. I only wish they had a bigger model for days when I want to clean the whole house as it can take a while to charge between 2-25 minute sessions.
This is the best purchase I’ve made in a long time

I was torn between the Bissell Crosswave and Tineco. After reading many reviews, I decided on the Tineco. I am so glad I did! I use it daily and really appreciate the self cleaning feature.
Gets our vinyl floors sparkling clean
I love this wet/dry vacuum! It was exactly as it described and is amazing with a messy toddler in the house! Great power it practically propels itself!

Buy it!The only thing I wish was better was the amount of water it holds. I have to refill often. But otherwise I love it!

Broke after less than 1 year. Tineco now making me jump through hoops to get a replacement, including my paying $50 for a box at my cost to ship the broken vacuum back. Absolutely awful customer service.
Love this efficient and effective way to clean floors.

review_text: This has so simplified my life!  Roller cleans and buffs at the same time, leaving very little water.  No longer just pushing the dirt around!
Amazing product!!!!!!!!!! I don’t know what I was doing with my life before this product. Lol amazing!!!!!

review_title: Very easy to use and clean
review_text: I love it this is the best. Thanks 🙏🙏
I despise doing floors,  but this makes it so much easier to do them! It’s easy to use and effective. I love that it cut my floor time in half.
Tried to vacuum my rug and was barely picking up anything. It got clogged up immediately. Water dish I could never install.
Wonderful product and quality.
I have stone floors with grout……so far, so good.  Will be better qualified to rate it once I am more familiar with it.
This is the best money I have ever spent. Saves SO much time. My home has been SO much cleaner since I bought this because it is so easy to clean now!
Great unit-when it works. The unit I have shuts down with 79% charging left. Unit was returned for warranty repair but no luck- same failure mode.

Best for deep cleaning
works great.. so good you have to empty dirty water often.

review_title: Great on tile and hardwood floor
review_text: It’s a great product overall

review_title: Most efficient and best thing ever
review_text: This is an absolute must!

review_title: Perfect for pet owners with hardwood floors
review_text: Battery power is a little light.

I love this machine! I was surprised to learn that it has self-drive which makes mopping so much easier. Got this because our home has all tile floors. Our regular mop and cleaners were leaving a residue and the floor never really looked clean and my shoes would make a sticky noise walking through the house. Put the Tineco to the test as soon as I got it. Floors look clean and you can no longer see any residue. And my shoes don’t make the sticky noise anymore! I love that it tells you what it is doing or what it needs you to do. And the spill/mess detector does work. You can see the ring turn to red, it kicks in to high mode, and you can watch it go to blue as you focus on that area. Would like bigger tanks for clean and dirty water so I can do the whole house without having to refill or dump, but those steps are really easy. And the self cleaning works really well on the roller.

I heard about vacuum/floor washers from an ad from Bissell.  I was looking into purchasing it, but the customer reviews did not sound promising.  The machine was not inexpensive.  So I gave up, until I saw something about this Tineco machine.  Every rating was 4 star and the reviews were promising.  I really love it.  It is easy to maneuver and simple to operate.  Customer service is excellent; although I have not had to use it, they reached out several times after my purchase to see if I needed any support.  The machine is also more affordable than the Bissell.  I recommended it to my son-in-law, and he really loves it!  He uses it almost every day and has nothing but positive things to say about it.  I absolutely recommend it.

BUY IT NOW. I’ve been waiting since before Christmas for it to be in stock again. It just came in yesterday. I charged it and got to work and it is life changing. It’s so quick, easy and fairly quiet so I don’t wake my light sleeping kids upstairs. The main downfall is the small water tanks for the clean and dirty water as well as the battery life. But as long as you use and clean your floors regularly, there’s no reason you can’t clean 1,000sqft house in the amount of time of the battery life. It’s so convenient compared to sweeping and then mopping and does a much better, as well as quicker, job. It’s worth every single penny and cleans amazingly.

review_title: My floors have never been cleaner!
review_text: This product exceeded my expectations! My floors have always felt and looked dirty, streaked up,and hazy with other floor cleaners. But after using the Tineco One S3, they look as clean as the day they were brand new! It takes a few, initial cleanings to get there. But each time you use it, you can immediately see that the dirty water tank gets cleaner and cleaner, after each use. When our wooden floors were finally to the point of CLEAN, keeping them in a clean state has been EASY and effective.  I highly recommend this unit for cleaning wooden floors.

I waited awhile after I used this a couple times to write my review. This by far is the best cleaner I have had! My floors are all ceramic tile and I’ve went through about every cleaner there is including the crosswave. Very little assembly and very easy to operate! The only complaint I have about this product is the water tank is kind of small so you have to stop to refill often but worth every penny! If your thinking about a purchase let me make your mind up because I am a picky person with OCD and this passed all my tests!

I was so nervous when trying to choose which mop/vac to get. I read tons of reviews and articles and took the plunge and ordered this one. I was not disappointed at all! I seriously love this thing. It cleans well, it's convenient, I am able to do most of my house on one battery charge, I love that it is cordless and self cleaning. I would buy this thing again with no hesitation. Since purchasing mine, my mom and sister have both also bought one and rave all the time about how much they love it.

review_title: Love it! But not great on grouted tile
review_text: If you have tile that has a little space between the tile and the grout, the unevenness makes the machine not clean as well. If it's a straight surface, you are fine. But if it has to "skip" over to another tile just a little bit, the water will skip over too and the roller. So that's a little aggravating.

review_title: Machine Broke in less than 6 months
review_text: I was thrilled when I first reviewed my Tineco iFloor 3. However, it stopped working after about 4.5 months. When I reached out to customer service, they were responsive, but it slightly annoying having to convince them over 3-4 emails that the machine was definitely broken, not just user error. You can’t call them, only email - so these exchanges took a week or two. Once I made it clear it was broken, they very quick to send me a return label to send back my machine and said I would get a replacement in return. It has been a month since my return machine was received by Tineco. I reached out to find the status of my replacement machine and I got the response that they see a request for return has been sent, but they had no shipping status. That was two weeks ago. I’ve since sent three more emails asking for a status and they have simply stopped replying. Since you can’t call them, I have no choice but to keep emailing and hope for a response, otherwise this has been a waste of money. A machine at this cost should not break with normal use after just a few short months.

I got this to map up areas in times when I didn’t want to get the whole mop and bucket out.  I figured for spot cleaning and touch ups it would be great. I haven’t had to get the mop bucket out since buying this.  It does a great job, doesn’t use a lot of water, and cleans it’s self after use.  The buttons can be a little finicky at times, being a touch screen. But really that’s a minor complaint compared to the benefits of this.

This wonderful machine has come into my life and I love it. It’s self propelled, uses a perfect amount of water to clean but not soak my wood floor , and the computer lady talks to me with directions to empty dirty water or fill more cleaning water. Then the machine actually cleans itself on it’s charging station. This has cut my work time by 75%. I am so grateful to have found a way to help me clean because at 75 years old it’s getting harder every day. This is a game changer.

review_title: Great appliance you will love it!
review_text: This thing is amazing!!! Worth every penny I got it for 400 bucks and it literally can clean every floor in our house in 10 minutes and then a 5-7 min clean time depending on how bad the floor was when we started! Buy it you will love it! She even talks to you so you know what needs cleaned and when to do it!

My floors have never looked so good!!  The battery last for me to do the whole house! Where has this been all my life! I run it every day!  Amazed how much dirt and pet hair it gets up.  You will not be disappointed!!
Love it, can’t say enough good things. Good battery life, cleans hard floors really well. Wish I had gotten it years ago!
I have sealed concrete floors and this works great and my favorite. Have had for about 3 months now and no problems! Worth the money!

review_title: Self cleans more then it cleans
review_text: I can’t even clean one full room before it asks to be put on charger and self clean. This vacuum wants to self clean more then clean the floor. Leaves lots of water on floor. I will be returning this vacuum.
I like how simple it is to clean my floors!

I love this product and use it all the time. But started noticing after two months of owning it’s not wanting to suck up liquids. Sloshes spill and the water from the tineco all over the floor it was such a mess.. I am very disappointed. As long as it is a dry surface it is a good product. But doesn’t hold to what it is supposed to do which is upsetting.
This machine is heavenly. If you’ve been on the fence about buying it, JUST DO IT! Cleans my floors SO WELL! 100% worth the money.
I like this floor cleaner it’s just what I wanted it sweeps up n mops at the same time the suction is perfect for a light or deep cleaning it’s maneuvering is great

This purchase was worth every penny and I would recommend it to anyone with non-carpet flooring. We have dark colored wood-like tile that always looks dirty. I was able to clean two living rooms, during room, kitchen, and hallway with one charge in about 30-45 minutes (including cleaning and refilling tanks).

review_title: The WiFi signal it gives off is annoying
review_text: I wish I would have bought one without this feature and I tell people not to get it for this reason. My kids iPad, our home phone and our personal phones are constantly trying to connect to my damn mop. I can’t figure out how to get rid of it either. Mid video my toddlers iPad will stop working because it’s trying to connect to my mop. Constantly. I’ve even tried to click on “forget” but I can’t get rid of it

What I like about it is it's easy to use, charge, refill, take apart and store. What I don't like about it is even with cleaning the filters and the rollers it's still starts to smell which is very difficult to get rid of. It also I don't think sucks up as much liquid as it should. This model is much better than the model below it which we had for about 4 months and it stopped working and timeco will not honor its warranty and replace it.

Great for about six weeks then wouldn't finish the self cleaning cycle and water ran out all over. Reached out, I had to send it back to them, which was a pain. They said they weren't able to fix it so they offered me a new one. After being without it for a month, the box I purchased for the return was delivered today with MY BROKEN VACUUM! I tried to call but they aren't taking calls because the call volume is too high. This would be a great product if it had worked. Very disappointed and frustrated.

review_title: BEST WET Floor Vacuum HANDS DOWN!
review_text: I really enjoy using this. It works extremely well cleaning my wood floors & ceramic stone floors. It picked up all the small to medium debris. I have 3 dogs & they ALWAYS leave law mess after walks especially during snow/rain days. The Tineco cleans it up quick with no Problem. Cleaning the dirty water tank & refilling is a breeze too! Highly recommend it. Go do yourself a favor & save time. Pick this bad boy up!! A++

review_title: Good for light cleaning, not deep cleaning
review_text: I do like it and think I will keep it but it’s not as life changing as all the reviews claim. I would say it’s good for light cleaning daily but not for stuck on tough dirt or spills. If something is left there to harden it’s not coming off easily with this guy and it takes many many passes to make the floors clean. I used it on smooth tile for reference. It is good at vacuuming but didnt grab big chunks (like dog food kibble). So i think I will still steam mop to get the deep clean and then maintain with this guy during the week

review_title: if you hate mopping and can afford this, buy it
review_text: It did a great job cleaning my hardwood. The unit appears to be designed pretty well for both effective cleaning and easy maintenance. The tanks are small, but unless your floors are coated in something sticky, it will clean the floors fine with a few quick passes and it's very water efficient so they last a while. It even sucked up the dog hair no problem (I have a husky) and it gets caught on a trap in the dirty tank. The little charging base/self cleaning tray is great, too.The only real negative I have is that I would have like a corded option that was a little bit cheaper.

I was on the search for one of these and finally they came back in stock. I love mine. I use the Bissell floor solution because of the smell. This cleans very well and I know this because I used a white bath towel to dry up my hardwood floors ( not necessary but husband insisted) and the towel was perfectly white. I was amazed because usually when I mop the floors then dry up with the towel its dirty...not anymore. I use this on tile and hardwood with no trouble. I def recommend you empty it out and self clean it and dry out the roller after each use to keep the roller nice and fresh...def don't want it souring. Highly recommend this product!

review_title: Not bad for our first purchase
review_text: The dirty water cannister is always telling us to run a clean cycle, not even ten minutes in. There's no light guide on the vacuum so it can be hard to see if the floor is actually being cleaned.  But, overall,  it's a nice product. It cleans easily and it's 100% better than dusting and mopping.

It's been 6 weeks and the vaccum clean up will not hold water because a plastic part in the bottom came off.  This part is inaccessible and I can't return the vaccum as Amazon has 30 day policy.  The warranty from the manufacturer is just 90 days.  You have better options for this price out there so keep looking and don't opt for this one.  This product has to improve a lot more before the price point makes sense12/10:  Tineco replaced my vaccum cleaner and I'm enjoying it every day.  It cuts my cleaning time by half and their customer service is really good.  They were very responsive and followed up many times to ensure things were working well on my end

I really enjoyed using the easy to use mop! It was light weight and mobile due to being cordless. However, there were a few things that made this product not worth it for me. 1. Didn’t erase dog slobber stains on the hardwood floors (my dog isn’t a heavy slobberer) 2. The clean water tank is pretty small and needs to be refilled quite frequently, even after just 5 minutes of usage 3. The dirty water tank is larger but requires dumping once the tank is filled about 1/4 of the way. 4. To get the battery back to a full charge even after 5-10 minutes of use takes 45 min to an hourOverall, I tested for one day and found it wasn’t worth it for my family.

The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
        
    
    

   This product works great to quickly clean my tile floors, however it is not the end of mopping and vacuuming. For $300 I’d like it to clean all the way to the wall and the corners. I’ve used it maybe 3 times. I like that I don’t really have to dry the floor. It leaves very little moisture behind. The cleaning solution is potent and smells fresh. I have a hard time getting the roller brush dry after cleaning. We’ll see... if it can become part of my daily routine with 2 kids, husband, and a dog. It does pick up the dog hair wonderfully!

I have some nasty faux wood laminate flooring that’s 12 years old. It shows up all the smudges and dirt. We’ve mopped, we’ve used a robot mop, we have got on our hands and knees and scrubbed. Still, if you rubbed a moist paper towel on the floor, DIRTY. Not anymore. I’ve cleaned all the floors in my house in the past two days since it arrived, and these bad boys are finally clean. We are very tidy people, two adults, one cat. We are constantly dusting and cleaning up in the house (we are those people), so when we are barefoot all day and we look at our feet, we were disgusted with he muck on our feet. No matter how often or what we used, mucky floors. You would think we didn’t clean at all!!!! This machine makes it easy. It self propels, it lets you know where the dirt is and when it’s clean again, it self cleans and OMG, the first time you empty that dirty water compartment….well, don’t do it on a full stomach. Wish the battery was longer, but heck, you can’t have it all. It is a pain to empty the compartments and fill up the reservoir, but then again, you are getting a fantastic scrubbing floor cleaner and every time you use it, it is clean and ready. After cleaning the kitchen floor (we are major cooks, so it’s the dirtiest floor), we did the moist paper towel rub test and it was CLEAN! I’d never get someone in to clean my house, so the money I won’t spend on that is a fraction of the cost of this machine.

First off, the OCD in me was coming out when I saw it doesn’t stand straight when docked. I thought mine was defective when I saw it leaning that far forward. Just don’t understand the reasoning for it.Battery life is awful, and I’m constantly either refilling the water or emptying the bin even on regular settings opposed to max settings.Be sure to have your manual handy bc all the icons that start flashing are so confusing and hard to distinguish what each one could mean without looking it up. The icons they chose just doesn’t make it easy to know what it’s trying to tell you in my opinion.Self cleaning option was great in theory. But you can’t use it if the battery is low even when docked and you need to fill the water bin. Doesn’t really do much bc everything still needs to be taken apart, rinsed and set out to dry for 24 hours before you can use it again after every single use or you’ll be smelling it 100% after just one use.With all that being said, it does perform well as a vacuum and mop overall. But- Corners are hard to get and can’t go too low underneath furniture before it starts to lift up off the ground.

review_title: Is this thing for real??!! It's like something out of the future!
review_text:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
        
    
    

   I was skeptical about buying this, because I manually mop and vaccum every week, but listen people, BUY THIS. It's an incredible investment. I have two weenies dogs and a messy 12 year old.  I was absolutely shocked when I seen what came off my living room floor. Best $400 I've ever spent! The self cleaning is also amazing, it's like something out of the Jetsons lol.  Definitely give it an A+!

review_title: Leaves floors shiny, but lacks suction and is costly, however I would buy again!
review_text: I like this overall. It leaves my laminate floors shining and with a fresh, light scent. I use it several times a week. It picks up dirt, pet hair and whatever happens to be on the floor. I am amazed at how dirty the water gets.I love the self-cleaning and charging function. It is convenient. Don't forget to pop the roller out and clean it occassionally.Do NOT forget to empty the dirty water tank, though. You will regret it. It doesn't hold a lot of cleaning solution so you have to change it a time or two when doing multiple rooms.It is somewhat costly for what you get, but I like it much better than mopping.

This product can be absolute junk when it wants to be but can also be great too. Tells me to clean dirty water tank or debris channel and contact customer service when nothing is in the dirty water tank or the debris channel. Trying to get ahold of Tineco is terrible, they don’t respond for days over email and by telephone you cannot get ahold of them because the influx of phone calls. Probably for this same problem I am having. I have company coming and my floor mop is spewing water all over my floor and won’t suck anything up. I’ll stick it back on to charge and when it reaches 100% charge it will just magically fix itself and decide to work again. Going back to my good old handy dandy mr. clean spin mop from the dollar general which was 20$ That’s better than spending 400$ + warranty on this thing. Just one HONEST review.

review_title: Highly recommend both the product and company!
review_text: First of all, the product is fantastic. It really cuts down our cleaning time. As an example, my one year old nephew enjoyed his birthday smash cake in our kitchen. Normally the resulting mess would have been a multi-step process, but with the Tineco we were able to clean the floor fast and easy!Second, Tineco’s customer service is equally awesome. I was very sad to see the price drop significantly on this product a week after we had purchased it. As per Amazon’s policy, they would not adjust the price. I contacted Tineco directly and they gave me a credit to their online store. I was able to stock up on the cleaning solution so I wasn’t out the price difference. I was very impressed with their service!

review_title: Tanks are on the smaller side
review_text: So far I like it. It has gotten some stuck in stuff but has a hard time with others but I just scrap that off the floor and suck it up with it (mainly gummies from my toddler that she’s stepped on 🙄) my floors definitely look better then they would with my spray mop! The floor drys pretty fast afterwards as well. 4 stars because I wish the tanks were larger but I can live with it for how good my floors look 🤷🏻‍♀️….. almost a year later and I’m thinking about going back to a normal mop! No matter how much I clean this by hand (not just self clean) it smells dirty and musty when ran some times. I still like using it for spills and dog mess but I’m considering following it up with a mop afterwards because of the smell it puts off!

Every house needs this machine. So I hate to mop. LOATHE mopping. I hate the bucket, I hate getting my hands wet wringing it, I hate having to keep dipping it in the new water and I hate cleaning it all when I’m done. This is a game changer for me as it vacuums AND mops (two birds one stone) and it self cleans. All I have to do when I’m done it hit the button, dump and rinse the attachments and set them out to dry. Mine is drying now in my photo. It picks up and mops everything well. I imagine when winter comes I’ll be using it even more as now when people trample in snow, salt and mud I’ll just use this to get it up instead of always having to have towels and wash them too!

review_title: The best foor care purchase I ever made
review_text: Spending $400 on anything is way out of my price bracket but I was looking for something that would help make it easier clean the floors with my toddler, 2 teenagers and 2 dogs. I loved this machine but after about 4 months the suction would barely pick up the dirty water and in self cleaning mode the water would shoot out over the charging base until finally 2 months later the voice prompt told me to reset the unit and contact customer service. Tineco has a excellent warranty & customer service! I lefr a voice mail and the called me back the next day to troubleshoot and concluded it migbt be a motor problem so it would need to be sent back for repairs and emailed a prepaid shipping label. It took about 2 weeks and they sent me a new machine because the old one couldn't be repaired. They kept in contact with me the whole time letting me know the status of my machine and was always very polite. I'd recommend Tineco to anyone who asked my opinion.

review_title: Easy to use , easy to clean the machine just awesome!!!
review_text: It is light and very easy to use… cleaning the machine is 1,2,3 👍 leaves the floor clean and fresh looking .
Absolutely love this vacuum!! I couldn’t believe what my $2500 rainbow was leaving behind
Best money Ive ever spent!!!
Honestly it was pretty underwhelming. I had high hopes but it did not clean my floor well at all. Had to go back over with a swiffer mop. Works decent at picking up large debris but that’s about it.
I debated on buying this for months. I finally broke down and done it. It is amazing!
I really love this. Best investment ever. Wish battery life can be longer but I love it
Easy to use, does a great job.

review_title: Great vacuum love it replaced the need to sweep and mop / swiffer love it!
review_text: Love it!!
Great for my LVP floors.
It cleaned my EVP flooring very well and also got muddy dog prints out of the carpet!
Obsessed!!! I will never look back. Tineco is the way to go!
love it
Absolutely game changing. I have a toddler and 4 animals and I didn't have to pre-vacuum or sweep. This thing is amazing.
LOVE THIS VACUUM. Must have with a toddler!!! My only complaint is that it doesn’t get close to edges/corners
It is amazing! Best part of it is that there are no streaks on my laminate floors.
I’m a mother to a beautiful toddler but as a mom we know spills messes all kinds of yuck are on our floors this has completely changed my cleaning game has actually made my life a lot easier
I have used it 3 times in three weeks. It uses little water but cleans very well. The best part is it shortens my mopping time by 2/3! A life saver. I am loving it.
This works so good, my wife made me buy 2 of them. Cleans just like it says. Super easy to use.
I love this so much. My floors finally feel lile they are getting clean. Super easy to use and clean. Im in love

review_title: The head isn’t heavy enough to actually scrub the floor
review_text: I do feel like this thing is powerful it doesn’t last long enough to clean my floors my issue is the front doesn’t say heavy enough to put pressure on the floor to get a decline clean

If you plan on purchasing this item on the website DONT! I ordered mine through the direct website and let me tell you customer service is horrible and it cost me less on Amazon. My moms I purchased through here and Amazon is quick and straight forward. I got to use Hers and love it. If you’re thinking about getting it for the holidays remember choose Amazon. Makes cleaning a lot easier for busy bodies.

This exceeded my expectations! It does a phenomenal job on hardwood and our house is primarily hardwood. I wasn't as impressed on the tile, as it doesn't get into the grout well but overall the tile is still very clean! It's so light and easy to take apart to clean. I couldn't be happier with this purchase!

It will move forward itself, just need hold it and follow it. Super light weight for cleaning the floor. My husband keep saying I bought the right stuff this time! Save lots of time and water to clean the floor! Like it and recommended!

I absolutely love this! I did the wipe test on my floors that rarely ever seemed clean and it was perfect! I was afraid to use it in the room that my dog is usually in but tried it and was amazed! It picked up sooo much hair and my floors came sooo clean!

I'm way too cheap to buy an expensive cleaner but I bit the bullet and bought this one. I've tried so many and they're more work to clean the machine than the floors they are supposed to clean. This machine vacuums and mops at the same time. It sounds hard to believe but it does. I have all tile and hardwood floors. I can do my 2500 square foot house in one charge if I focus on high traffic areas. It talks to you and tells you everything you need to know so clean up is easy. I love it.

I absolutely love it! It works great, it swivels and moves around easily, it even self propels which is really nice. It’s also very easy to clean the ifloor3. I accidentally dripped some egg on the floor while cooking breakfast, and as great as it worked cleaning my floors, the dried egg didn’t clean up. All in all, I love it!

I have bought two of this  one for me one for a gift It is actually a very good product to have when you don’t want to Vaccum then mop You could kill two birds with one stone and I love that the only thing is it does can’t do very deep cleaning so I would recommend to do your mop once a month and in between once a week you could actually use this vacuum it works really really well and very time saving

review_title: Pet messes are no longer a problem
review_text: Unfortunately, my cat has a very sensitive stomach and vomits frequently. Cleaning it up has always been a pain - not only the time and effort involved but also the "gross" aspect. With the floor one S3, cleaning it up takes about 5 seconds with zero effort. Absolutely worth the money for my use. Takes care of the job effortlessly. General cleaning of the floors is quick and easy too.
It's a great product and saves time.  Im just giving it four stars because it leaves too much on the side.  Can't get up to the walls.  Eventually you will have a streak if you don't follow up
The girlfriend found it as a much cheaper option to a name brand. Figure it couldnt hurt, very surprised! Its quite, light, and does an amazing job.
I am really enjoying my tineco wet mop! I have two kids under 4 so my floors are often covered in mystery sticky stuff, this mop gets it right up. It’s so light and easy to use too!
Purchased this for a daughter with 3 dogs, great at cleaning up after muddy feet and accidents.
