This has to be hans down the best investment I have made in household tools!! It kill my back to mop so the self drive of the ifloor3 is amazing. The self cleaning mode is a wonderful feature as well!! Very pleased with my purchase.
Love it...takes more time cleaning the machine than the machine does cleaning the mess on the floor
Love it. I wish it got closer to the wall. You have to go around with a wet towel after.

Is it possible to give negative stars? We bought this mop and took it out of the package let it charge for 24 hours to ensure the battery was fully charged. Went to use it and within 15 seconds it kept turning off showing max. Turned it off and turned it back on within 15 seconds max again. Looked at the paperwork again to see if we were doing something wrong. Nothing. Now the machine doesn’t even turn on. Literally just sitting in the other room on the charger and it’s dead. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT.

review_title: This was great--until it completely stopped working.
review_text: I loved this cleaner! It was great on all my hardwood floors. It changed everything! Then it completely stopped working a few days after the return date. No response from Tineco. I am out 300 dollars. I would like this replaced!

I love this product. I can’t stop talking it up to friends and family. So easy to use, and as you can see from the photo, works like a charm. There’s something bizarrely satisfying about starting with the clean water and ending up with nasty dirty water. Why did I mess around with hand washing and conventional mops for so long?It’s lightweight (maybe 12lbs?) so easy to get up the stairs. I go over a mark in the floor maybe twice and it’s gone like magic. You can eat off my floors. Wish the charge lasted longer but that’s just me nitpicking. Highly recommend!

I have had the bissel floor cleaning for a couple years and I wasn’t very thrilled with it. I saw this one and was hesitant because of the price but I decided to buy this and am very pleased I did. It’s so amazing how dirty my floors were and I clean them weekly. Sometimes twice a week. With 3 dogs it gets pretty dirty. This picks up hair and debris and doesn’t leave a lot of water behind like the bissel did. Love that this is self cleaning. So far works great!

Stated off the first few weeks well. Did a nice job sucking up all of the debris on our hard floors and moping up the grime in our kitchen. After a few uses the self cleaning function stopped working. We made sure the water bin was sufficiently full and waste bin was empty but the self cleaning just doesn’t activate when the bottom is pressed. Now the machine smells as it doesn’t have the ability to clean itself. Pretty bummed with this machine.

I love this vacuum/mop. I have two cats and a bloodhound and the animal hair is real. Our entire house is hardwood, so it's almost impossible to keep the floors clean. Our home is about 1500 square feet and I can do an entire floor on one charge, probably part of both floors but I haven't tried yet. I do wish the tanks were bigger, but it's super quick and easy to empty/fill them, so that's not a big pain. If you have major spills right against the edge of the floor, you might have to spot clean by hand but otherwise it's perfect. I highly recommend this.

review_title: Doesn't clean. Just wets the floor.
review_text: I didn't expect this to deep clean or scrub the floor, but I was hoping for a better replacement for a swiffer for in between actual mopping.It basically slightly wets the floor and sucks up the water. If you have little kids constantly dropping cereal, maybe it's worth it, but just for general cleaning, it's not worth the money.

This worked great for about 7 months, then it all of a sudden stopped recognizing the dirty water tank, so it won't run for more than a few seconds and leaves a puddle on the floor. Waste of money. Buy a Bissell.

review_title: One of those products you’ll wish you bought sooner
review_text: I have hardwood floors, two small children, and a dog. Every meal ends up on the floor one way or another. Between sweeping, vacuuming, and mopping, it WAS a nightmare trying to keep my floors clean. Thankfully, that’s all in the past!! This machine is absolutely incredible. I’m able to clean 1000 ft.² in under 20 minutes with one tank of solution. My floors look better with this machine then anything I’ve ever used before. I seriously wish I bought this sooner. Doesn’t matter how big of a mess the kids make anymore, this machine will make light work out of the chaos. It’s not complicated to put together or to use.

Love my Tineco. Easy to use. Does a great job cleaning. I had a steam mop previously and thought it did a good job. Imagine how surprised I was that my floors were not that clean with using it. The Tineco does so much better. I like how it vacuums and cleans at the same time. Don't be surprised that you may have to dump the dirty water bin sooner than expected. It doesn't happen as quickly after the first time. That just tells me how dirty my floors were even though I was using a steam mop.
100000/10 recommend!! Love the self cleaning! Cuts more than half the time then sweeping & mopping! I’m absolutely in love!
Sucks took it back because it kept saying dirty water full but wasn’t even close to 1/4 full. Don’t buy.
I was a little nervous paying so much but this thing is amazing. I use it all the time.
Works great! Cleaned our wood floors and made them shine.
I highly recommend if you have pets!!
I love it!
Mopping just got a whole lot easier.
I love that it is cordless however the battery only lasts 30 mins. Not enough for me.
I love how shiny my floors look after using. My floors are clean and smell good.
In love with this product! I completely recommend. 100% worth the money! It passed the white glove test!
Liked everything about it, used it for everything

review_title: If you’re thinking about it, get it!
review_text: Absolutely the greatest invention for floor care yet! I spent the extra for the ‘top of the line’ in this brand and I’m so glad I did!

review_title: The best vac system we've owned!
review_text: I own a hardwood floor marketing company. I absolutely recommend this product!
Suction power is great! Good for deep cleaning, just a great buy overall!
Does pick up alot and the filth. Even if you think you already cleaned.
Great purchase!! My floors have never looked so clean! Highly recommend this product!! Definitely worth the money!
Makes cleaning floors easy!
This is the best thing I’ve bought in a while. I have a puppy and this makes easy to clean up accidents.
Very light and easy to maneuver , excellent job of cleaning !!!
Love love love

review_title: How did I live without this?
review_text: I love this! My apartment has never been cleaner, and I can get it done in a shorter amount of time. My children are 6 & 3 and needless to say, there are crumbs and spills everywhere every day, and specially so while working from home and virtual school. This makes cleaning painless and quick. Best purchase of the year!
So easy to use and did a great job!  Used this in our small veterinary hospital to help keep the floors clean as possible. They dry very quickly. Very pleased so far.

Best thing since sliced bread. If you are even thinking about it, just do it! So much easier than vacuuming and then mopping. Easy to clean and the cleaner it comes with smells great. I love this thing!

I never write reviews, but this product is so outstanding I had to write one.  It does a phenomenal job of cleaning my wood floors.  I have three dogs so I am constantly cleaning up tracks and spills. I have tried many other floor cleaners but this one is the only one that left the floors looking this good.  The solution does not leave a dulling film. Highly recommended!

The only thing I can tell you is BUY IT!!!!!! If you have pets, toddlers, messy teens or just over sweeping and mopping....then what are you waiting for?! I have a toddler and as any little one he throws food off to the ground form his high chair and I had to clean and mop every day it was such a headache. This cleans everything and leaves no mess I love it. Best investment. Merry Christmas to me 😌

review_title: Best Purchase in a Long Time!!
review_text: This is the best purchase I have made in a very long time. I HATE to mop! This is the best invention EVER. It mops and vacuums at the same time. My floors have never been cleaner. I have not used it on huge messes or spills, but 15 minutes, and VOILA, my floors are clean. I never thought they were that dirty...but I was amazed at the dirty water that the Tineco picked up the first time I used it!
This item is the best thing invented since sliced bread! Really has the power for deep cleaning & easy to maneuver. Takes a little time to clean the debris out of tank & brush. Love it!!!!!
I liked how light weight and easy to maneuver it was but I spent more time charging and cleaning it than I did my floors. I ended up returning it!

Minimal water on floor, no risk of damage or warping.  Love the divider that catches and separates hair from liquid so dirty water is easily flushed down toilet and never has to be in a sink. I thought my floors were clean until I saw the black water.  Pushes itself.  Long battery.  Love it!
Lightweight, easy too use and clean longer battery life would be nice. Refreshing to find a product that's better than expected and at a good price!
Broke after 4 months of use. Barely used would not recommend to anyone. Don't waste your time save money

i love that this mops up messes on the floor and it’s perfect for toddlers. the bin does fill up very quickly so if you do daily cleanings, it can get annoying how fast you need to change and clean it out.i also love the self cleaning option! overall great and glad i have a cordless wet vac. no more swiffer that just pushes items around.

truly does the work of a vacuum and a mop in a quarter of the time.leaves very little water behind, dries quickly.can't get into small spaces.having to clean the filters every time is a downside, but really works well otherwise.
Works pretty good, the clean water tank is to small have to fill up so often! Does leave water behind sometimes, doesn’t do to good on textured flooring. Can’t get super close to edges
This broke within 6 months.  They want to replace with used one. So I suggest buying a used one to begin with

With 2 dog and 2 cats, we swept and mopped constantly!  This combines the efforts and cuts the time in half.  The floors are clean (we used it after we did mop and bucket and it still pulled some nasty water.  We won't be going back to mop and bucket.

review_title: Im not sure how people are giving this 4 stars
review_text: I unfortunately had to give it an undeserved 1 star!From day one it has been giving me issues. At first, I thought I was doing something wrong I followed the directions and always pre- vacuumed my floors but after reading some of the reviews it sounds like we all have a similar problem.The vacuum runs for 3 second and then cuts off saying  "clean the debris channel or call customer service." Unfortunately, they don't answer the phone and you're asked to leave a message. I have left 2 messages and have yet to get a phone call back. I wish Amazon would take this product off their shelves so no one else would screwed paying $400 for a piece of junk.

Does AB amazing job cleaning floors! I have the vinyl life proof flooring it’s great! However the containers for the cleaning solution and the dirty water are WAY too small. I can’t even get my whole house done without emptying/refilling them at least 3 times. But it does do a great job so I’m very happy with the purchase!
I can't tell you how much I love this thing! Lightweight, great suction, easy to clean, definitely worth the money! You know you're old when a vacuum brings this much joy to your life!

I can't say enough about this product. I just love it. It cleans my hardwood floor with very little effort. I can't believe that I didn't have ne of these years ago. I can clean up my puppy mess and it vacuums at the same time. Great product!!!!!@

BUY IT NOW! DON'T EVEN hesitate! I do not write reviews even though I read them for things I buy but for this! It is a MUST! I do use the cleaner made for the machine. It is fresh and makes my floor squeaky clean! I love that it vacuums and mops. I have two dogs and two kids. I do a pre vacuum just so I don't fill this thing up with hair but if you had minimal dog hair It would be just fine to not do a pre vacuum. I don't think it cleans rugs I haven't tried anyway but the talking function is amazing, the self clean, it holds a great charge. SOOO easy to use and repels itself you just have to hold it. No cord. I absolutely love it!

review_title: Terrible Customer Service - product did not last longer than 7 months
review_text: I loved the product but it stopped working after 7 months. Customer service has been terrible and not timely. They told me I was eligible to get a new one due to failing troubleshooting help but they have not sent the return label nor have they responded to me about just getting a refund and I’ll order another on here faster than they would get me one. Again, I love their product but with the price you pay I would expect it to hold up longer. I also am very frustrated and disappointed with their customer service who I have spent emailing all week about it and we have not resolved anything yet. They also will not take calls 😑

review_title: Great product. Much better then my old Bissell
review_text: I had BISSELL CrossWave Pet Pro Multi-Surface Wet Dry Vac for 3 years. Old, Wired Model. Actually It was good and did a job. No complain. But my new one "Tineco Floor One S3" is absolutely awesome. Main thing - it is wireless. So much "Freedom"!Also is is VERY, very quiet - comparing with my old Bissell. Cleaning quality is better too. Also water suction is much better - so dirt pickup is better and floor dries much faster.  I like voice guidance - helps to remember all things that need to be done for using it and maintenance.I have it just for one day. Love it. Hope I will not change my first impression in a future.

review_title: Ok. Not worth the high price point.
review_text: Had to order and return twice before it worked. Finally the third one worked. I bought it cuz it came highly recommended. I think it’s good as an overall daily floor mop. It does not deep clean. If you have tough spots the mop will not clean it. The suction is ok but it doesn’t get anything along the sides. I think it’s a good concept but has where to grow.I got it for $130 off. If I paid full price I would be very upset with the quality. It’s very expensive and doesn’t live up to its price point.Also must clean out dirty water tank and behind brush roller every day or the unit stinks!

I had hoped this would be a game changer, since my entire first floor is either hardwood or tile. But, on the kitchen floor if there is anything more than a spot it won't get it up. And let's be honest, in your kitchen there is often food that falls to the floor and gets stuck there! It also feels like a lot of trouble to completely dismantle and clean after every use, plus the self-clean light comes on after just a few minutes of use every time. I vacuum my entire floor at least 2-3 times a week, so it can't be that dirty. I think it's probably pretty good on the hardwoods. It definitely takes less physical effort than mopping, but I still find I need to mop my kitchen to truly get it clean.

After allowing some time to make a review I’m disappointed after 8 months of making this purchase to find out later how many negative reviews were accurate.Upon receiving this vacuum I was ecstatic and in love. A few details to help aide your decision making and how this product stood up against the elements.Purchased in April 2021Single individual with a baby Pomeranian living in the city of Chicago with a unit under 500 sq ft and with no kids.I’m a pretty intense cleaner and use a dyson for pre hair pickup so that the machine isn’t working so hard.The battery charging plate broke within the months so I have to hold the vacuum just right to fix it.2nd offense - the cleaning solution is forever out of stock and not local for purchase. Any other brand will absolutely ruin the solution tank which I learned the hard way. There’s no available replacement part for this.3rd offense - even after cleaning weekly the water sprays out as I vacuum causing an even bigger mess.4th offense - my water tank broke all before 8 months of owning this machine.5th offense - it can’t detach to clean in tight spots and will not clean all the way to the walls. You’ll still need to mop.Honorable mentions - do not clean up pet messes as the machine will forever smell. It’s best to pickup/wipe up and then clean with the vacuum. There’s an investment in replacing your parts regularly like the rollers so factoring that is important.Overall it was not worth the investment and lacked longevity or feeling like it was cleaning as well as it did the first month of owning it.

This is an early review -- I just received my Tineco and used it for the first time yesterday. I will update this review if anything changes over time.But as of today: AMAZING!I have a 9 y.o. son and 2 dogs so my floors are heavily used. We have hardwoods, travertine tile, and ceramic tile in our condo. This appliance is a life (and back) saver! The self-propelled nature of it means I cleaned both bathrooms and the kitchen floors yesterday and my back feels great!The only area where I see any lack is the "deep cleaning" aspect. There were areas of the floor where I still needed to get down there with a wipe and a little elbow grease.That's a very fair trade if I never have to mop again!

I love this as oppose to a mop and a broom. Its cordless and its powered to move forward so you are not having to push and pull, bend down and up causing aches after sweeping/mopping a whole house. Its an easy slight push to guide the machine. It twists and Turns and can get into small crevices. easy to figure out how to clean and add water/soap. It is not for a deep cleaning, definitely doesn’t work miracles on stains. For the everyday easy spills and sweeping needed, its great! It does have some water streaks and it does not get dirt close to the baseboards, but it does a pretty good job. Suction is great and its so easy to place it on the base when done to recharge. Definitely recommend

I am a cleaning nut. I can’t stand to have anything dusty or dirty. But I got so tired of having to vacuum and then mop all on the same day. My whole house is tile and I have two small dogs. The Tineco Floor One3 is a very powerful devise. I was so super Ed and thrilled when I saw what an amazing job it did. Picked up all the very small dog hairs and when I did the self cleaning for the roller, it got all those little hairs out. I did not expect that. I thought I would have to clean that with a brush separately. As far as streaking, I had non of that. I only used 1 capful of detergent.I should have bought this sooner. It is my favorite cleaning devise along with my steam cleaner.LOVING IT!!!

review_title: clean sensor is just a gimmick and customer service is terrible
review_text: There is no reason to buy this. The sensors have a known problem and the company does nothing about it. They sent me a label and that was it. The stated after I ship it they will complete the fix in 1-2 weeks and then ship it back. the whole process would take a month.All of this was after I had been emailing them about the faulty unit for over a month. They would request my personal information and the product SN over and over, after I provided. If I did not send it each time they requested, they would not answer my email.the product is decent except for the sensing technology. My suggestion would be to buy the cheaper model or get the much more reliable bissell crosswave vac-mop which is far more reliable, cheaper, and with great customer service.This company makes little effort after purchase, despite having some of the most expensive products on the market. So in this case, YOU DO NOT GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR
I am in love with this, my tile floors never was so clean before... I would recommend this to anyone and also I think everyone should have this in their house
it was a gift my daughter is loving it
I love this product.  It works well.  My old floor cleaner was corded and I love this one being cordless.  Makes it very easy to grab and clean up a mess.

review_title: CUTS YOUR CLEANING TIME IN HALF!!!
review_text: This floor cleaner cleans our 2,500 square foot house with hard wood floors in 15 minutes. It works just as advertised. It self cleans which makes it the very best floor cleaner. I cannot say enough great things about this product. Highly recommend!
I wish I had made this purchase sooner. It is a wonderful machine. Saves so much time and its effortless. You won't regret getting the Tineco s3.
Lloovveee it, worth every penny!
Very easy to use. Wish I would have purchased one of these a long time ago. The self cleaning feature is awesome. Everything works wonderfully and I have Zero Complaints thus far.
Excellent product

Absolutely love this vacuum I would’ve given it 5 stars but it doesn’t get those hard to reach places so I still need a broom but maybe if it had bristles on the side that would work other then that I love it
Amazing. Everyone should own one!!

review_title: Great duster not for much else.
review_text: It is great for dusting the floor, but doesn't deep clean.  Dried on anything will have to be scrubbed by hand.
Wonderful machine! Highly recommend!! It’s is smart, easy to use, and does two jobs in one.  What’s not to love.
We had a steam mop before and this thing blows it out of the water! The floors are so clean! The self clean mode is a time saver too!

review_title: ways to improve the moping part of the vaccum!
review_text: When I’m vacuuming on the edge of my walls and trim it doesn’t get the dirt/stuff that’s all the way by the wall so I guess that’s the suction power. And it cleans good it just doesn’t “scrub” things that are stuck to the floor. And sometimes it spits the dirty water out.

review_title: Did what I expected it to
review_text: This machine is great! Easy to use. Easy to clean. I love it!It has great suction power & has cut my cleaning time a lot.
It does a fantastic job on wood floors and is easy to you.
I love this vacuum it cleans my hard surface floors  so well!  I wish the clean and dirty water tanks were bigger but overall great product!

Did a comparison between this vacuum and the Bissell Crosswave Pet Pro, and this thing blew its competitor out of the water. So impressed with this product! It's completely dog/cat/toddler proof! Only downside is the battery life, but the cleaning power is insane.
Very good machine. Cleans thoroughly, quiet and charges quickly.  Easy cleanup.  But whatever you do...do not leave water in the dirty tank reservoir.  It will stink terribly.

review_title: Perfect for those with kids, pets, or husbands
review_text: My floors are clean for more then 5 minutes for the first time ever. Would buy this over and over again!!!!

I love it, when it works. I have had it for 3 months and it has not worked for a month now. I am a member of it’s fan club. Yes, I know I can call customer service number. But I’m a busy girl and why should I need to do this when I just bought it. Oh you say I can return it? Better save your box so you can send it back. Then they can send you another one that works for 2 months.

I should start with saying that this wet/dry vacuum works quite well although there is a notable difference if I vacuum before using the tineco, which defeats the purpose.... I would have given 4 stars, unfortunately unless the replacement parts {filter and brush roller) become available this is $399 down the drain.I contacted customer service who forwarded a link to unavailable parts and saying they were glad to resolve "my issue" (?}.I can understand that parts might be unavailable due to Covid/manufacturing restrictions - but is that is the case - just say so and give an estimate of when the parts might be available please.

I am just using this for the first time so I’m not sure about durability or longevity but OMG this thing is a game changer. I have wood floors and a dog and a busy house and being able to skip the step of having to vacuum first and then mop is the first WOW factor but when I saw the completely disgusting dirty water from my first use (and just from my kitchen) I was mortified and then freaking ecstatic!  This just made my efforts to keep my house/floors clean a breeze! I cannot recommend this enough. It’s lightweight and super easy to use. The only sad part is that I haven’t had one all my life.. ps I rarely write reviews and I am suspicious of reviews that are a little too excited and happy 😆 I wish I could give you my contact info so I could tell you that I’m a real customer and this is a real review

So far the only thing I don’t like is that I do you have to change the water out a few times even while doing a quick 10 min clean. If that’s my biggest complaint I won’t really complain because I am able to do my entire house in under 20 minutes vacuum and mop at the same time! I already vacuum twice a day so this has seriously helped me in so many ways. Immediately after I mopped my dogs ran through with muddy foot tracks it took two minutes to get them sparkling again with this machine.  If you clean your floors all the time yes get it. We have polished concrete and I even feel like they look buffed after.

I bought this floor cleaner. I just can’t clean my floors like I want to.  I have arthritis and find it more and more difficult to keep up like I use to.  Anyway I did a lot of looking and searching through reviews. This blew away the crosswave in reviews.  I had been eyeing that for a while.  We bought this so I can keep our floors Disinfected  and deodorized.  And it’s amazing. I can not say enough good about it.  One sweep of our kitchen floor and this is the water. It really bothers me that when our granddaughters visited, their feet were so dirty from just running around in my house. We wash that floor every week thoroughly. But I guess not doing a fantastic job. I ran this once through the kitchen and entry upstairs and this is the water..... yuck 🤢. I’m thrilled with this and it will make a huge difference in our house!

review_title: SATISFIED Mom with littles and pets
review_text: First- I looked at these in November but didn't justify the $300 price tag. I opted for the Shark VacMop for $75 instead. I found the pads for the shark were $1 each and needed at least 5 to do the whole down stairs. Don't even get me started on the pricey solution. Every time I mopped I was disappointed.I finally pulled the trigger on this Tineco after reading a lot of reviews. The first charge took awhile. I should have plugged it in yesterday and started cleaning today, but I didn't so I ended up recharging a few times today. But to be fair, I cleaned all the downstairs floors (kitchen, dining room, massage room, both living rooms and bathroom) and upstairs (our bedroom, bathroom and laundry/craft room) and the garage landing! That's a lot of floor.Coordless- the docking station is super nice. Nothing to plug in, just clip the mop in and click the self clean button. Awesome.Self propelled- does a really nice job and saves my back!Solution- only uses 1 capful per tank. Cleans well. Doesn't leave residue.Tanks- only major complaint here- small tanks! The clean  and dirty tanks are small and need refilled/emptied often. But.... considering the alternative to pushing dirty water around, absolutely worth it.

Overall, this machine is a win. I originally purchased the crosswave but it just left dirty water all over my floors. I have two Great Danes and let Me tell you, they bring in so much mud and dirt from outside with their giant paws.  This thing has worked wonders in keeping my kitchen clean. A few downsides is that it only ships with one roller, I’d recommend buying a second. It also does not get close enough to the walls so you have to spot clean the corners and about an inch around the walls. But overall, a good machine. I registered the project and hoping that if I do have issues in the future then the company stands by their product.

I cannot believe how strong this little thing is!! I’m in love! I joked and told my husband I was leaving him for my mop in which I named “Elliot” from the show magicians. My grout on my ROUGH tile which hasn’t been “deep scrubbed” (I hate getting on all fours with a scrub brush to clean the grout) in at least 2 years, was HALF way cleaned!! It will need deep cleaned in order to be completely white again, but I bet the mop would keep up with it after I did. I’m so impressed by this mop. I felt sick spending this much on something I wasn’t sure would work but I told myself “it can always be returned” but I don’t think I will EVER give this thing away unless it dies on me 🤷‍♀️

This machine does vacuum and mop in one step however it requires frequent dumping if dirty water and the clean water tank is too small. The battery also doesn't last as long as advertised. I only got 25 mins miximum out of it. Not sure if mine was a defective one or not.  It isn't as loud as I expected it to be. Overall I would like it more if the clean water tank was larger size and if the battery lasted longer or at least have an option to have a detachable battery so one could purchase an additional and extend the run time 🤷🏽‍♀️.  I haven't tried the bissell one so I have nothing to compare it to. There is also a 1 inch gap between the machine head and floor wall so it will not get the edges... For the amount of $$ you would think it would get all the floor area 🤦🏽‍♀️.

review_title: Great for perfectly flat floors, TERRIBLE if you have recessed grout lines with tile.
review_text: This would be great for hardwood or other smooth surface.  For tile with recessed grout lines, you can do five passes without even getting the grout lines wet, much less clean.  Avoid for tile with grout lines.I have over 35 wireless devices, and this is the only thing that would not connect despite repeated attempts.The Bissel has a deeper nap to the roller and it does OK with grout lines (but does not always pick up the water well in the grout lines).  The deeper nap may allow the Bissell roller to last longer as well.  Tineco returned, Bissell kept.By the way, WHY is there an "e" in the middle of Tineco if the damn letter is silent?

review_title: Short life with poor customer service
review_text: I really liked this unit and I used it once per month at most.  After a little over a year it died (engine fault).  Still on warranty but they don’t replace it (like roomba) they want you to dismantle it and pack it and ship it to them for repairs and wait. I get to look forward to having a defective machine sent back to me and if it dies again I will go through the entire process again. I had trouble with my Roomba (more expensive item) and their response was “we are sending you a new one” period. No need to even return the damaged one.  I know where I will spend my money next time and it won’t be on a Tineco product

This is the best hardwood cleaner that I've ever owned. The cleaner is easy to use and easy to keep clean. The cleaner has a self-cleaning mode which makes it easy to keep the rollers and intake clean.  The batteries last about 30 minutes which just a enough time to clean the floors if you use it daily or every other day.  If you use it less often more dirt builds up which means that you will cover less area. So far I've used just the recommended cleaner and it seems to work very well. I use it just on hardwood and tile floors. I have not used it on regular carpet but I have used on a low nap carpet. It's easy to remove the roller and just let it dry.

Yes I said it. A mop changed my life. I show this off to everyone who comes over and even make videos of me cleaning up messes my little ones make. It’s that good.Picture this. 2 year old throws milk, sticky rice, and applesauce on the floor. It effortlessly vacuums the food up and leaves a beautiful freshly mopped glow.My house has hardwood and tile. My floors are swept and mopped DAILY.Before buying this? I vacuumed. But mopped…. Very rarely.NO WAY could I keep my house up without this.Then it self cleans itself? I still take the brush apart and everything bc I want it to stay nice and perfect.JUST BUY IT. Worth every single dollar.

I REALLY wanted to love this machine as every inch of my house has hard wood floors. I was so excited when it came I immediately unboxed it and tried it out!Does this thing Vacuum!? Sure!! Does it mop? ABSOLUTELY NOT.We are an active family with 3 children, 2 dogs, and 3 cats. We love to be outside and eat together at the table so naturally our floors get DIRTY!This product could even get dried "muddy" prints off the floor, nor day old spaghetti sauce from our two year old.100% DO NOT RECOMMENDstick with the dyson vacuum and Bissell steam mop. Somethings ARE too good to be true :(

This product is amazing for our EVP/LVP and tile. It makes cleaning SOOO much easier. We vacuum constantly with little kids but used to hate mopping bc it was an extra step. Not only is it two in one so saves time, it’s just generally easier than the swifter/Bona type mopping.It’s also very light weight and the charge has never been close to running out (it’s easy to charge so it always fully charged between uses).It is important to be diligent about cleaning the dirty water tank but it’s easy to do.The only thing that is the same as typical mops is that you still have to separately scrape off anything on the floor that is sticky. The mop won’t typically be able to remove/pick it up.

review_title: Works great until it doesn't; too many hoops to jump through for warranty!!!!
review_text: I really like this vacuum. It does a very good job at cleaning floors- you can see it in the water that you empty out!However I hope that I got a dud, but it stopped working after about 10 months, and this is a very expensive item to be replacing every 1-2 years. I called customer service, and that said I was still under the 2 year warranty. Great! II went through the diagnostics over the phone, was not able to fix. I am told they will send me a new one and that I can send the old one back in the same box. So they send an email and ask for a video of it failing. I film the video and send it to them. Then I get an email back saying to try a few more things. I try those things and they don't work.Then they say they will send me a shipping label, and they never did.  I also do not have a box, so I ask for a box, and they send me a cube box that is too small for the length of the unit. Now I am stuck waiting again for both the box and shipping label.It would be nice if they would simply send the new unit and allow me to use that box to send the old unit back just like I was told. This is tiring.

review_title: Loved it… until it stopped charging
review_text: I’ve had my unit since October 2020.  It’s been pretty great and I liked it better than the Crosswave.  It has since stopped charging though…. I feel like less than 2 years isn’t good.  I’m so tired of throwaway products that are not made to last or made to be supported with aftermarket parts.  I see many others have similar issues with the charging base just stopping

The not so good...If you have a large space to clean, you will not be able to finish within one charge especially since you need to stop and run a cleaning cycle often. This is fine, but it takes long to recharge. The dirt and clean containers are too small and fill up/empty quickly. I wish these were larger. It would have been nice to have the option to plug in rather than just wait for a recharge. Even if you purchased the more expensive machine with the additional 10 minute charge time (I ordered the middle priced one), it still would not provide you enough time to finish cleaning if you had a large space. Also, it does not get into corners or tight spaces.The good....The floors you are able to get to do in fact get clean. The components are very easy to dismantle and clean. The solution they provide works well and smells nice.

We have big dust sweepers we use a few times a day (we live in the mountains and the dogs track in dirt etc on top of shedding their lovely fur). This machine is fantastic for my back because it’s self propelled. We use Swiffers regularly but this vacuum when we can see that it isn’t enough. If they bring in sap, I can just take the machine and hover over the bad spots until it’s gone. So easy to use and put away. I wish the battery could be charged separately from the machine for easier storage away from a plug but I still really like how this thing operates.Bottom line: I’d rather have dirty floors than not have my dogs. This machine is a must have to make those big mopping jobs much easier.

review_title: Where Has This Been All My Life???
review_text: I waited several months before writing a review so I could really use it and evaluate the good, bad, etc.Overall? I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS THING AND IT WAS WORTH EVERY PENNY!It has saved me Sooooo much time! No more vacuuming the floors and then going back and washing them. It works wonderful and the floors feel so clean! I spilled an entire bowl of broccoli cheese soup, complete with chunks of broccoli....and the Tineco cleaned up the whole mess like it was NOTHING!The cleaning solution is expensive, but you truly only need a cap full, and it smells wonderdul! I also have two very low-pile area rugs, and I use it on them as well. It's not the same as a full rug shampoo, but it does the job!If there are any cons at all? There is about a 1/8th - 1/4 of an inch gap between where the floor meets the wall that it doesnt reach, but I have never found a vacuum that does, so that's expected.  I'll also say, when they tell you that after every single use you need to rinse out and pull apart the dirty water tank, and brush roller assembly? Don't skip it! Like most wet/dirty things, it WILL start to stink and get musty after only a day or two.....but I have left the clean water tank filled with water and cleaner for several days at a time and it's fine.So ZERO REGRETS here so far!  Highly recommend and seriously one of THE BEST purchases I have ever made!
Works super well with minimal after care cleanup. I just wish It had a longer battery.
BROKEN AFTER THREE WEEKS. TROUBLE WITH GETTING REPLACEMENT CAN ONLY CONTACT COMPANY THRU EMAIL WILL NOT ANSWER PHONE CALLS
Love it! I have 3 small kids and a puppy so we have a lot of messes. If you’re having 2nd thoughts because of the price, I was worth every penny!
Extremely glad I purchased for our downstairs hard floors.
So easy to use.  Even my kids will Grab it and clean the floors.  We no longer have carpets on our first floor of our house so it’s great.

review_title: It’s just not worth what I paid for it.
review_text: It doesn’t spit out the water good and stops mopping without any indication other than the floor isn’t wet. It’s ok product but not worth the money I paid for it.

review_title: Make sure you’re home for delivery!
review_text: Buyer Beware!!! They deliver this in the product box wrapped in clear plastic. Make sure you are home when it is delivered unless you want it stolen off your porch.I love this product though! Does everything i want. My floors have never been this clean.
This is awesome! I’ve had quite a few floor cleaners and this is by far the best! This gets sticky spots and doesn’t leave any residue from cleaning product.  Don’t hesitate just buy it.

I love this floor cleaner!!!  I had the smaller one and it was not as impressive. I have no carpet on tile in my home. It is perfect.  The only complaint is that it does not get close to the walls or under the cabinets.
I dont know how I ever lived without this. I use it 3-4 times a day.

review_title: Takes on 2 Toddlers and 2 Dogs Like a Champ
review_text: I’m absolutely in love with this machine. My expectations were definitely exceeded. We have a 5,200 sq ft house, and it is almost all hardwood floors. We have two toddlers and two dogs. The mess is substantial...and sticky.If you are considering buying this, here are some things you may want to know:- The voice instructions are really nice. This machine will audibly tell you exactly what it needs. It is super smart, and takes the guesswork out of figuring out where there is a clog or why it isn’t working as well as usual.- The battery length is impressive. I can do my entire house (5,200 sq ft at a relatively slow pace) and still have some battery left.- This auto-propels forward. I underestimated how nice this is. Makes the effort that much less.- The auto clean cycle makes your job easy, but I do have to run it a few times during a cleaning session. Before starting a self cleaning cycle, make sure you have enough clean water in the tank and enough space in the dirty water tank otherwise it will make you start the whole cycle over again.- Run with the grain of your floor. This seems obvious to me, but there are some complaints about streaking in the reviews. Solves the problem completely. I get a beautiful shiny floor every time.- For the best clean, slow down a little bit. My husband uses this like he is racing the clock. It gives a nice clean, but when you slow down just a bit, you notice the best results.- Works on tile as well, but I think of it more as a refresh in our bathrooms. It isn’t going to get down to the grout like a mop. I still do a proper cleaning with some stronger cleaning products where we have tile.- Also works to refresh your low pile rugs. I had no expectation of this making any noticeable difference on my rugs. However, very pleasantly surprised.- It comes with a bottle of Tineco cleaning solution. It is a very light and good smell. The bottle has lasted me about 2+ months with near everyday use.- Empty the water tanks every time! It does not take long for the tank to smell musty. I think this would be the case when any similar product, but it is a pain when I’ve forgotten to empty. I run a few cleaning cycles in a row and the issue is fixed.Overall, 10/10 recommend. Our Tineco has handled some pretty significant messes. I anticipated pulling the mop and bucket out for a “real clean” at least once a week still, but it has been 2 months and I haven’t had to do it. Especially if you have kids or dogs around, this is going to make your life so much easier! Take the plunge and make the investment.

I cannot say enough wonderful things about this floor cleaner! I was so so tired of still having dirty feet after washing my floors. Now, they are truly clean. It gets all the dog hair too. I feel good about having my littles roll & play on the floor. It takes me maybe 45min or so to do 2100sq ft of LVP.  I’ve had my Tineco for almost a year and you name it, I’ve vacuumed it, but it still works as well as the day I bought it. I do not only run the self clean when it’s done, but also thoroughly hand clean the different parts before putting away including cleaning out the debris channel. It is all super easy to take apart and clean, I feel like this machine was very well thought out when created in that respect. I cannot praise this thing enough!!!!! Definitely a worthy purchase!

review_title: If you have toddlers this is a must have!
review_text: I have 2 small kids, 2yo and 5yo and they cant seem to eat meals without spilling at least half on the floor. We found ourselves constantly sweeping and mopping. I wanted a wet vac that would vac and mop at the same time and this product works great and has been a huge time saver. Its so light and easy to use that I don't mind cleaning up anymore as before it was just an arduous chore. The battery life is fine for our main level. The suction is great for a battery unit.  Our floors have never looked cleaner! My only recommendation is to have a heavy duty cleaning roller too for those hardened spills. Other than that, I love it. This is coming from the husband as my wife didn't inherit the  cleaning gene. I was considering the cheaper priced model but it was out of stock and I am so glad I bit the bullet and bought this one.

I read a ton of reviews on Amazon and other sites about the tineco and the Bissell Crosswave before purchasing this item. Because of the positive reviews I bought this tineco and I have no regrets. I have used it weekly for the past three weeks. I have a 1600 sq foot home with all tile/hard wood floors. It is just my husband and I plus our Boston Terrier. The Tineco worked wonders on our floors and picked up dog hair! It did an amazing job. There was a spot by the baseboard that was dirty and the tineco couldn’t get to it. So I took a chlorax Wipe and cleaned it. I took the clean part of the wipe and wiped a part of the kitchen tile that the tineco had cleaned (out of curiosity). The wipe was clean! There was not any dirt on it! Amazing!!! This version of the Tineco tells you what it needs. It will tell you when to fill the water tank and when to empty the dirty water tank. I was able to clean my whole house on one charge. But I read some reviews that others could not. I had a friend who asked about the cleaner and the cost. It only requires one capful for each clean water tank. So the cleaner should last quite awhile. The first clean I had to add water about 5 times. My floors were dirty! The second 3 times and today only twice!

review_title: As a vacuum collector, WORTH IT.
review_text: My partner hates me. I collect vacuums thinking the next best thing will come along and improve my life.So far, I've bought a Roomba, a Dyson  v7 stick, various other cheap stick vacuums, a shark lift away. Those are just the ones I can think of. For mops, everything from a basic mop, to a Lipman refillable/washable, a spinning one.No matter what, my routine took me hours and left me exhausted. To be quite honest, I never felt swiffer/lipman mopped my floors clean either - just pushed the gross around... We rarely walk barefoot in the house because I just cant keep up. AND I MISS WALKING BAREFOOT!We have 2 dogs, and 1 (hairless) cat. That means needing to vacuum and mop constantly, like once a day minimum. With the Roomba it should've been easier but one dog attacks it and also piddles randomly (so didn't want the Roomba freeroaming on a schedule).Enter this. Man. I knew I would be in trouble for buying it and I did get the "ANOTHER ONE?" speech... But guess what? We now use it daily. It cut my cleaning time in literal fractions. Its easy to clean and its pretty much self propelling, so its like 0 effort to use it. I will say, the first time around I wish I vacuumed first, it clogged up a lot with the dog hair, but after that it wasn't a big deal.For comparison, I feel(but may be wrong) it has better suction power than the dyson v7 stick (go figure), and definitely better floor mopping than a swiffer wetjet(or equivalent) or a bucket and mop. I have wet the floor after and whiped with a paper towel and its still super clean after using the Tineco.I have used the included cleaning solution and it smells nice. It does leave a haze, but it also cleans well. I've also tried pure water, which also works fine.I wish when I got it I did NOT peel the sticker off the LED area - I had to put the manual on my fridge so I could readily see what it was telling me it needed. Other than that, not a big deal.I did my research and bought the iFloor3. It's pretty close to the same as the One s3 without the added cost. I felt I didnt need it talking to me, and I could keep up with the lower milliamp (mAh) battery. Although I wish I waited a week (theres a discount now, and I would've gotten the One s3). However, I can quickly clean my whole house on MAX with the 3000mAh battery, for a deep clean/messes I will need to charge a few times.It's light and easy enough to use for kids, and is a bit of fun to use, if you'd like to get them involved. I'd highly recommend this all in one floor cleaner.

review_title: Does an OK job, but no replacement for my Swiffer
review_text: I have 2 cats, an extra large breed dog, a pre-teen, and a toddler. While what this machine gets off my floors is atrocious, I still need to swiffer once or twice a week. Even with the max mode, it still does not get stuck on messes off my floors. Its too large to get under my stove and leaves a wide margin around the egdes of my floors where it cannot get. The air it is kicking out from the suction blows around the pet hair instead of picking it up. Its great for mud season, but other than that I would have to pass on buying this machine again. The brush when removed never seems to dry. It also needs to self clean every other time I use it to clean my kitchen floor.

Im not a influencer. Im just some dude who is married with 2 kids and 3 dogs. My dogs are the ones that you can give a bath and they will instantly run outside and find the first dead or stinky thing they come across and roll around in it. I also feel like they think i need to see them throw up. Why they horse play outside till their hyperventilating than suck up 6 gallons of water only to throw up 4 of it up on the my floors is a complete mystery. Also they tend to have no time to finish pooping or take just a half second to get it all out before they take off running and playing. But i know they love to use my wood floors as their personal toilet paper. My kids are on the same level if not worst. So having the ability to vacuum up and mop at the same time is a freaking amazing. I have a dyson v8 and then used a swiffer. 3 hours later and some how my dogs found a mud hole in a drought. Long post but worth the money and im cheap. Good luck fellow person who is trying to find a genuine real non coerced review.

review_title: I should have bought this long ago.
review_text:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
        
    
    

   For a parent with 3 kids under 5 years old, and a dog, I should have bought this in 2019 when it first came out. I can pick up WET food in the ground - i.e. rice, noodles, cereal, eggs (cooked and raw), and basically everything under the sun. Not only does it pick up food but it actually cleans the floor. And then cleans itself.We host a weekly small group with people in our home each week and it takes 15 minutes to clean the entire dining, kitchen, and living room area. The water coming up is dirty gray water but you wouldn’t have seen that even on our light laminate floors.With little kids crawling and playing on the floor constantly, this is a MUST. The only time I’ve ran the battery dead was the day it arrived in the mail and I cleaned for around 30 min. Otherwise, I have yet to run out of battery in a cleaning. I do have to empty my dirty water tank and fill up my clean water tank once during the cleaning. I love this thing so much I had my husband build a cabinet to fit it’s the plug in cord is long so it can reach pretty far as well!

review_title: Pet hair, dust, farm dirt, or baking flour it gets it all!
review_text: SEE the picture it will pick up all your pet hair! This machine was on my mind as a purchase for a month before I actually bought one. I have many reasons to buy one. I am a farmer in Wisconsin so we experience all seasons on top of that I also bake and decorate cookies out of my home kitchen. I have a dog who sheds all year, a three year old cat and two kittens so there’s no shortage of pet hair. All rooms are faux hardwood floor and endure pets, muddy boots, and the dreaded flour/baking powder mess in the kitchen. I have spent countless hours trying to mop daily and vacuum to keep up with the sometimes daunting mess or just the pet hair. So when I saw this product I watched videos and researched the product because at $400 it better work. Vacuuming was never enough because I also would need to mop after, plus there’s nothing more satisfying than a clean floor. Dragging a vacuum and then mop which still would leave some dirt/pet hair behind was annoying. I would have to walk around and wipe up spots with a paper towel to get what the mop didn’t pick up. So I pulled the trigger on the Tineco and haven’t looked back! It does exactly what it says! It cleans amazing and gets the job done where my stick mop doesn’t. It also washes the floor so it solves the problem of having to always use a vacuum and a mop. It’s great for everyday and it’s great for deep cleaning. The slight downfall is that the machine has a small clean and dirty water tanks. If I deep clean I am changing them often as I spend more time in each room. I am doing a general cleaning I only have to change the tanks 2-3 times which for me isn’t a huge deal, I’m usually close to the kitchen anyway. The other minor issue I have is that the cleaner for the machine doesn’t have a strong clean floor smell. There’s nothing like the smell of clean crisp floors and I really miss that about using this machine. I’m a month into using the Tineco and I’m super happy with it, it’s worth the money if you want to speed up your process and not use a vacuum and a mop as well if you have a high traffic home.

review_title: Not for people with multiple dogs and overpriced
review_text: I ordered the ifloor first version and it was terrible so I returned it and upgraded to this one. I wanted so much to love this but it's way overpriced for it's subpar performance. Do not buy this if you have more than one dog. I have an Aussie and her hair clogs it fairly quick. I'm still on the fence if I'm keeping it or notPros: self cleans, easy docking station, cordless, holds a charge long enough for me to mop 3 rooms, mops and vacuums at the same ame timeCons: kind of heavier than I was expecting, I have to empty the dirty water tank 2-3 times doing 3 rooms because the dog hair clogs before it's actually full, leaves an untouched 1 inch border around everything and there's no attachment to get into those spots, too expensive for the performance you get

This should be called the magic machine ,it has awesome suction ,and leaves floors sparkling clean ,and it doesnt soak the floor so it dries very quick I definitely give this marvelous tineco floor one S3 hands down a 10 plus and its light and very easy to maneuver around😇

The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
        
    
    

   We have owned this product for less than a year and the vacuum cleaner is having some serious tech issues. It says there is a clog and so it turns on and after a few seconds it turns off again. I followed the instruction manual and cleaned everything and then let it dry for 24 hours. It still doesn’t work. It just turns on then off again. No YouTube videos help fix the issues. Whatever you do, do not buy this product.

This is a great product and I'm very happy with it! It has made cleaning so much easier. My one and only complaint is that it does not get up against the edges of the walls. It leaves about an inch that does not get cleaned. Otherwise I'm very happy with this I'm glad I made the purchase.

review_title: will never use a mop again
review_text: Mopped the floor then used this machine and the water was BLACK. I love this product. I have only been using for a few weeks now but it has been amazing. Worth the investment if you have a lot of wood/tile at home.  very easy to use and clean.
Leaks. Stopped working less than 6 months. Customer service sucks.

review_title: Got rid of my swiffer products!
review_text:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
        
    
    

   If you are a baby led weaning mom get it! If you have pets this is the one for you! The self cleaning feature is awesome. It’s so easy to take apart clean and put back together. This is a must for my house!

review_title: Did I receive a used one?
review_text: So, I just opened my "brand new" machine and the solution was already opened and used. The CWT compartment looks like it had been used as well. Didn't pay the price I did to receive something used.

This is literally the only product I’ve ever bothered to return to Amazon. It has like 20 min of run time, pain in the neck to clean/refill, not worth the hassle. I’d way rather vacuum and mop separately than deal with the hassle of this thing.

This has saved me so much time! I have white tile and 2 dogs that leave messes and hair everywhere. I felt like i was cleaning floors nonstop! It was so time consuming! Not anymore! What a genius idea! I love it!

Just buy the thing! After a few weeks of research I was hesitant to buy because at the price point, it’s quite an investment. Zero regrets here! Amazing for all the toddler messes. Crumbs and thrown drinks galore are no match.
I have used it on my luxury plank vinyl floors and it’s great although you do have to go over a few things a few times in order to pick it up.

review_title: Easy to use and clean floors.
review_text: Cleaned my hard work pod floors really good.
I love this vacuum! I hate cleaning floors but hate dirty floors. I don't have to pre clean I can grab and go. It works well on my hardwood and bathroom floors.
Total waste of money constantly gets stopped up absolutely would not reccomend
Finally found what I’ve been looking for! It’s awesome!

This was amazing on day 1. After that, we got error saying the dirty tank was full when it wasn’t. We tried over & over cleaning it everytime & we never got it to work. More of a hassle than anything.
It cleans floors squeaky clean and then cleans itself! Small and powerful. Highly recommend.
Best decision I made! I get my floors cleaned in no time at all!!
Love love loveLoveLove love this piece- it GIVES me peace of mind as a Mama of two small children, two dogs and a cat. My home is always clean now!
This cleaner is awesome, it picks up the dirty water and doesn’t just push the dirty water around. Being cordless is a huge plus
I love this product because it self cleans and I do t have to carry a mop or bucket around. Makes cleaning up after messes so much easier.
Definitely worth the money! Our entire downstairs is hardwood flooring & we’ve got four little ones plus a dog. Makes our floor feel brand new & picks up so much gunk.
Was unfamiliar with brand but after reading reviews I decided to give it a try. Have had it a few weeks now and am very happy with it so far!  Will re-post if I change my opinion.

I LOVE my tineco. Best purchase I have ever made!! Easy to assemble, work and maintain. We have wood flooring and tile. I personally like using it on my wood floors more than the tile, the way the tile is textured I feel like it doesn't clean as well as it does on my wood flooring. 10/10

review_title: Leaves the floors clean and fresh!
review_text: Totally worth buying this might vacuum cleaner! I don’t know how it picks up so much dirt off the floor. Trust me I mop with my own solution and a splash of Clorox that didn’t do the job right! This mighty Tineco collects all that dirt in its tank and let me tell the water was pretty much black and gross. Say goodbye to swifters, mops and brooms. impressed and happy with this purchase.

Has great suction power , use for daily cleaning not deep cleaning it some times struggles to get stuck on stains off but is great for fresh spills and regular cleaning.  It moves on its own very easily and turns on a dime ! I love it for my daily use ! Make sure to clean and empty tanks daily unless you want a little stagnate smell when you first run it.
I have two little kids and this thing is a lifesaver
Cleanest and shiny floors. Better than waxing.Cut my floor cleaning time in half.

This is great for everyday use or spills. But with lots of kids through here.. we do have to spot clean and/or mop better. But with said kids it is nice to do a daily cleaning without having to pull out the mop and bucket. This is easier than vacuuming.. quick and painless
Is as advertised. Should be able to be used on carpet (low thin pile) for the price

I have POTS... its an autonomic nervous system disorder. Cleaning is physically challenging to say the least. I chose this vacuum because it's lighter than its competitors, has an ergonomic handle and long battery life. Having to sweep/vacuum and then mop... I can't physically do both so this machine is a godsend! While I was still dead and in pain after using this, at least I was less dead than traditional methods, and my house was fully clean. I can't grip a broom or vacuum after a few minutes so the loop handle on this machine made it possible to push and pull it without having to grip it with my hands. The self cleaning is amazing. I used to have a wet vac and hair in the bush was impossible to remove. This clumps it all together. I have long hair, two dogs, a cat, and now a foster dog and there is a LOT of hair! I'm finally able to walk barefoot in my house. I tried to use over small rugs and it kind of works, but the brush isn't designed for carpet. It can leave hairballs on the rug. One thing I learned is to clean out the dirty water tank and let it dry. The hepa filter got moldy pretty quickly. I went through 3 tanks cleaning 4 rooms and a bathroom. It is so quick to empty and refill that I found no issue with that. When I first used it, it was not picking up anything and I thought that it couldn't get into the tile grout... then I took the cardboard off the roller and it worked just fine... Lol.

review_title: Great at first, but has issues later on
review_text: *Update 2*I still have not received my replacement and they have not contacted me back regarding this issue.*Update*It didn’t take but a couple months and my Tineco began having issues. I dealt with it for a while, but eventually contacted Tineco customer support and it has been a nightmare. I argued with them until they agreed to repair it and they sent it back with the exact same issues. I then contacted them again and had to argue with multiple agents over text message, because they won’t speak to you over the phone. They agreed to “repair” it again and I refused, so after days of fighting I was able to get them to replace the item. They have given me two days to drop it off at Fed-Ex and email them or else they will cancel my replacement. Horrible customer service. My items main body was broken, had start up issues, won’t charge or self clean properly and leaves dirty water all over my floors. It’s unfortunate, because I loved this item at first.I bought the Ifloor original, but returned it for this one and I am so glad I did! I love this thing, I haven’t swept or mopped in weeks. It cleans really well, I use it as a daily cleaner. I would recommend deep cleaning with a broom and mop every once in a while still. I don’t really have any complaints. It’s self propelled, discharges the clean water for you and the suction is great. It works on my tile, hard wood and laminate flooring throughout my house. Highly recommend this, it was a great investment for me.

review_title: Love this! Highly recommend you buy it now.
review_text: Prior to getting this masterpiece. I’ve been having to vacuum, steam mop and sweep the floors and they’ve never felt clean after all that work. I couldn’t ever wear white socks around the house because the floors still felt dirty.However now, my floors feel so nice!!!!  They don’t feel gritty anymore and my white socks stay relatively white when I walk around.  I have wood laminate and also floating wood flooring. This mop is freaking amazing.  It’s so quick and easy to do.  I got the floor one s3 and I’m able to do all my floors in my house (about 1750 sq ft) with about 20%battery left.The first couple of uses I did have to empty the dirty water tank and do a couple of self cleans after a couple rooms. However as your floors are maintained, you don’t have to do the self clean and empty the dirty water tank as much.  I think the first time I had to do stop and do the self clean like 4 or 5 times.  Now, I can get by with just emptying the dirty water tank once and save the self clean when I’m all done with the whole house.It does leave about an inch from the baseboards but I’m ok with that.  The cleaning after you’re done is quick and easy to do.  The roller you just have to take out and let air dry as the machine self cleans that.  Then just empty and rinse out the clean and dirty water tanks and wipe the bottom with a paper towel and you are done.I love this machine.  I don’t use the app as I don’t see a need to. Highly recommend this time saving machine!!!!  I can’t wait to mop my floors again. In fact I think I’ll mop right now.

review_title: An updated review for higher elevation/altitude
review_text: My daughter gifted this to me, and I am in awe!!!I have a lot of hardwood flooring that I would clean on my hand and knees....scrubbing by hand.  It took forever, and by the time I finished I was worn out.  Sore from kneeling and wringing out the rag etc.  I would clean twice a month. Using this was soooo much more efficient.  I was truly shocked at how dirty the water was with my first time using this.  I felt like my floors were pretty spotless. (We don’t wear shoes indoor etc). I could also not believe how much drier they were left....cleaner feeling and also cleaner looking.  It gets very close to the edge to clean as well.The self cleaning feature is a breeze to use.  I do leave the clean containers out to dry completely before I reassemble.I have talked this machine up so much that 5 people have ordered one, and I myself,  purchased a second one for our cabin.  I am hoping they will love their ifloor 3 as much as I do mine!I am now doing my floors weekly and just love the results.This is an update on my unit….I still LOVE this so much.  I had purchased a second one for a summer home that is situated at an elevation of 10,000. We live at the elevation of 5280 and have no problem with using the unit here .  However, not the case at the higher elevation.  It would run for approximately 10 seconds, then would shut off and the DWT (dirty water tank) would be lit to empty it.  Of course there was nothing in it, as it had only run for 10 seconds….press the start button and another 10 seconds etc. I tried everything I could think of…did I have the filter in correctly , was it fully charged etc.  I brought it back home to lower elevation and works perfectly.  Took it back up thinking that it may have been a fluke.  Same thing happens.  Bring it back home again and works well.  I then contact tineco….they told me to do a reset by doing this:I took it off the charger, with no lights on top lit up (battery bar etc). They said to remove the DWT and press and hold the self cleaning button for a total of 20 seconds.  By golly!  It worked!  My floors are finally clean.I put it on the charging base overnight and tried it out the next day….all is well. No problems!  So if you experience anything like this, give the above suggestions a try.  They have such wonderful and prompt customer service.  I’m still telling people how much I love this and they are buying them and love it too!FYI….I brought up my second unit to see if it would behave the same way up there.  It did exactly the same thing….ran for 10 seconds then shut off with DWT lit.  When I went to put it in the charging base to self clean the roller and spin it dry etc before bringing it back home, it would not do the self clean, shutting off every 10 seconds.  I had to do the reset first.

Good: my hardwood floors throughout our home look better than ever! They never looked really clean. They are a darker color so dust shows a lot and we have hardwood in the kitchen, so there are many spills. The Tineco does a good job of cleaning the dried spills, grease splatters from the stove and anything else that spills. Might have to go over several time in tough, dried on spots, or hold in place. So much easier than scrubbing and cleans much better. The battery lasts at least 30-40 minutes. The unit is easy to clean. The liquid cleaner has a slight scent that disappears when dry. It works really well at cleaning and is economical. You use very little per tank refill. The S3 is quieter than my vacuum, but I can't use it if others are sleeping upstairs. It manuvers well. Huge improvement in the look and cleanliness of my floors. I keep it handy, charged, and filled and can use it easily for small areas or large.Two things not so good: it doesn't clean well around the edges in the front and along the left side of the unit. It won't pick up a thin line of crumbs that's sometimes in front of my stove. (I just follow up with a quick sponge in that spot to get what was missed) Second, it's profile is a little high. It doesn't go go very far under my dining and kitchen chairs or the china cabinet. I have to move all the chairs to clean.That said, it cleans my floors better than anything I've tried. The dirt is gone, not just pushed around. The floors are finally clean. They look beautiful and it's so easy to use. Overall, I love it!

I waited excitedly for my vacuum to arrive. When it did I noted how heavy it was especially with the water tank on full.Here’s some flaws that other reviewers don’t mention for whatever reason:-in order to spray the water onto the floor you have to push down the spray button. Ok this seems simple enough right? I mean most devices have a button. But on this unit it’s on the back of the handle. When you place your hand on the handle, where your palm lies is where the spray button is. It was SO awkward trying to spray and vacuum at the same time. I am actually surprised no one has mentioned this.-secondly, this is pointless for corners. I ordered this to get rid of having to mop but now I still have to mop corners after using this. Instead I just purchased another swifter wet jet because at least that gets corners and has been trusty enough to work for years.-thirdly, battery life. Doesn’t last that long. They mention this so it’s not a surprise. But if you have a big area then you cannot get it all in one go. You have to keep coming back to charge.All in all the suction seemed to be very strong. I imagine with time it will weaken which is common with these wet/dry mops. I just felt like if I’m going to spend $300 on something at the very least it should be designed properly and comfortable to use.

review_title: Exactly what I needed for a house full of hard floors!
review_text: Pros: super lightweight, quiet, cleans the floors spotless. Cleaned up a disgusting, dried pile of something one of my animals hacked up and left hidden for me behind a door with it today. It took a few passes, but I did not have to touch the nasty mess with my hands! The cleaning solution only requires a tiny capful and leaves the rooms smelling fresh and clean.I don't think the battery life is any worse than my Dyson.Cons: self clean doesn't quite get ALL of my Rottweiler’s hair out of the roller and the self clean mode is a little noisy. Clean water tank is kinda small and, of course, they recommend using ONLY their brand of cleaning solution.Would definitely recommend!

review_title: Time saver but… on the fence
review_text: This product is a game changer. I am mixed on how much I actually like it vs how much I want to like it.Pro’s: vacuum and mop at the same time, which can be a time saver! It vacuums well and by the look of the dirty water, cleans well. No streaking on my floors and they feel clean!Cons: no scrubber so if something is stuck on the floor, you’ll need to scrape it off first. I also can’t believe how frequent I’m getting the alert to do a self-cleaning. I know I have a puppy and a cat, but I do sweep and mop regularly. Sometimes I am not even finishing my kitchen floor before the light flashes. Maybe I got a bad one? Also don’t expect it to clean the grout between your tiles. And it leaves about a 1-2 inch gap near the walls that are impossible to get with this machine.Overall, it is great for a quick vacuum and mopping. But I don’t think it’s worth the price that it sells for. It’s great for busy folks who are in “survival mode”. Like me, working full-time and in nursing school. Or moms with little ones who want to enjoy their time with their babies and not spend all their time cleaning floors.With that said, Moms: your cleaning can wait, don’t stress over a messy house. Your babies will grow up fast and once they’re grown, you can’t get that time back. Snuggle them, play with them. You can clean when they’re older. <3

I am in LOVE with my Tineco vacuum mop! I have a toddler, two dogs, and a cat. Need I say more? This thing rocks. I am able to sweep and mop my floor at the same time! It can clean up big messes but I basically use it to maintain a blissfully clean floor. I mean is there any better feeling than walking barefoot on your hardwood floors knowing they are spotless?I can clean about a 2000 square-foot area on one charge. A little bit less if there are some big messes involved. What I love most is that it automatically detects areas on your floor that need more attention than others! There is also an auto button you can press yourself if you feel like you want a little extra power. I’m embarrassed to post what my dirty water tank looks like after a clean but I can tell you this thing is SO worth the money! I use mine about three times a week to keep my floors sparkling clean.*bonus* they include cleaning solution inside the box and all you need is one capful in your clean water tank and you’re ready to go. I like the scent too.  It smells light and clean and definitely not overpowering.

I recently got a new to me condo that has tile or hardwood on the entire first floor.  Knowing I wanted a machine to help me clean I got this.  Yes it is a little pricey but I am very pleased with the cleaning and ease of use.  It cleans well, is easy to clean after cleaning and provides spare filter and roller.The down side.  It does not do edge cleaning.  You will have to clean about 2 inches to the baseboards all around the room.  It needs to have about 16% of the battery left to self clean.  I also recommend you empty the dirty water tank and ensure it has at least 1/2 a clean tank of solution before you self clean.  I always run the machines self clean twice.  No one wants a smelly roller.Other than that I highly recommend this to anyone worried about having excess water left on the floor.  It is easy to use, does a good job, cleans about 1800 sq feet with battery to spare, does NOT leave excessive water on the floor, it easy to clean and hopefully lasts years.
While pregnant looking for something easier to use to clean my floors this is it. Cleans very well and easy to use.
If you have a lot of hard floors in your house this is a must have! I can clean my whole house with filling the tank 2x. Takes just a few minutes to clean the parts after wards.
Works awesome on hardwood floors. I never knew how dirty my floors were, until using this!  Expensive,  but worth the price, and so easy to use!.  No more sniffers for me!

review_title: Wish I saw this long ago !
review_text: No more sweeping then mopping my hardwood floors or tile. I'm done in less half of the time with this. And no streaks left behind 👍

I ordered this after many months of debating. I couldn’t bring myself to pay the price at first but I am so glad I did. I like to think I am a clean freak but with two large dogs, it’s hard to keep my floors clean 24.7. This is a game changer. My floors are so clean and i don’t have to spend my time cleaning out the inside to keep it nice thanks to self cleaning mode.

When I first got this it was amazing but after 3 months it started to malfunction saying dirty water tank full so it would shut off but there was nothing in the dirty water tank. Even after I took everything apart cleaned it and let it dry overnight it still did the same thing. Definitely not worth the money to only have for a short period of time.
This has been my absolute favorite quarantine purchase. It cleans so good, picking up all the debris while mopping. It is a complete game changer.
Easy to clean floors.  Tile floors are much cleaner.  Easy to clean with self cleaning.  Helpful voice prompts can be turned off easily with a button any time.

review_title: Have to clean vacuum thoroughly, but the clean floors are worth it
review_text: I have tile throughout my house...wasn't sure this would work for me as I get a lot of dust....Live in desert.  Had to clean 3 times before finished...was going to return, but I really like how it cleaned the floors. Good suction. Think I'll keep.

As the owner of 2 shedding hounds, I needed something to help me out with my tile floors. We’ve had this since February, and have used it two times a week. This machine is awesome, it keeps the tile shiny without stick, and it only takes me about 30 minutes to mop the whole house. The cleaning mode is easy and quick, and I’ve never had an issue. I use the MAX MOP feature for the whole house (1800sf) and the battery lasts the whole time. 10/10
After 6 months of using it only on one floor in my home it will no longer suck up water

review_title: You have got to have this !!!
review_text: Works great Easy to use !
Love it cleans up all messes and dog hair only thing is it doesn’t reach the baseboards.. other than that freaking thing is awesome
Absolutely love this machine!!  I do wish it got edges better, but it does an amazing job cleaning my floors.

review_title: Not only does it talk it also does one hell of a good job!
review_text: My wife bought this and was instantly in love with it! Floors stay super clean and she loves using it!
Absolutely love it’s cleaning abilities. Sweeping and mopping all at once. Saves me so much time and it cleans my floors very well.
This cleans so well! Very easy to cleanse maintain after each use.

review_title: Buy it you will love it
review_text: LOVE THIS FREAKING VACUUM!!! I have purchase 3  for wedding gifts as well and everyone loves it best thing I ever bought

review_title: Has a very good vacuum feature!
review_text: I use it to clean my tile floors, also my cortex floors. I like the one and done feature!
This is the best out there

I was influenced to buy this after seeing it go viral on TikTok. I was extremely disappointed and ended up returning it. I have ceramic tile and the “mopping” feature was the worse.. however, the “vacuum” power was great. Self cleaning was the only impressive thing about this $500 machine. I will stick to my Dyson .

Game changer for keeping the main family areas clean. Easy to grab and wipe up on 3 different tiles and 2 rugs. So far, on struggled once with full water tank vacuuming up half a bag of spilled chips. Next time will make sure to pull clean water tank for dry clean up. Otherwise, love it. Floors are cleaner consistently than in years

I love this vac/mop. As a mom with a toddler and a baby our house gets messy fast and must be kept clean for the baby crawling around. We love that we can both vacuum and mop the floors at the same time — saving time and effort, and leaving our floors sparkling clean! The only drawback is needing to clean all of the parts after each use but, honestly, we’ve gotten the hang of it and it’s quite a fast process for us now. Highly recommend this vacuum!

review_title: Does everything it claims to do
