review_text: Lightweight, self propelled, string suction and no residue or streaks left behind. I saw a video of this vacuum and just had to order it and it holds up to everything it says. It picks up solid and wet messes no problem and is very quiet. I have to large dogs and this helps keep my hardwoods looking great.

I have 4 dogs, tile floors throughout my house, and I hate mopping. It took forever, and I felt like I was just spreading the dirt. A friend of mine bought this item and let me borrow it to see if I liked it. I made my purchase right away!  I have no issues with this picking up the dog hair, or the sand and dirt my mastiff brings into the house on a daily basis. It does run out of solution pretty quickly, but that’s really the only con and in the big picture, not that big of a deal.

Got this item to see what the hype was. It works well still leaves streaks on the floor when done. Overall I can deal without out. So I decided to return the item and they charge a 50%  restocking fee plus another 20% other fee. So be cautious when you buy this item.

review_title: Your wife deserves this! Get it now!
review_text: I have 2 toddlers and another one on the way. It is a time saver. So much better than the bissell version. I used the O Cedar spin mop before I used this and this just shows how dirty my floors were still. It is self-propelling and self cleaning. I used it for my kitchen and dining room and it only used up 1 bar of battery. I was not about to spend another $100 on the S3 version just for a computerized voice an extra 10 minutes. This version is the way to go!

Everything about the vacmop itself is great, but good luck finding the cleaning solution that is recommended. I recieved an email from  Tineco at 7:30am today 5-14-21saying it was in stock, by the time I seen the email at 8:20am it was sold out and wouldnt be back til the end of June which is kinda ridiculous.

We have an elderly cat. She's messy because she really doesn't give a crap anymore. So when she pees on her foot and tracks litter through the house, bam, 60 seconds of work and it's all clean.I wouldn't use this as my primary vacuum because I wouldn't want to deal with all the hair that would accumulate in the dirty water tank. I run my Roomba daily and use this as needed to get the floors clean-clean. I love walking around after using this. The floors feel so fresh.I do feel like I'm constantly filling the clean water or emptying the dirty water. But that doesn't bother me.

Purchased this so it can help with cleaning since I have three kids, it’s great for the smaller things but if there’s stains or food dries it’s a bit harder to pick up. Overall I love it, I just wish the tank was bigger since it doesn’t really last long. The charge lasts throughout the house cleaning so I don’t mind adding new water and dumping out the dirty while cleaning!
I love this wet/dry vacuum! My floors are so clean. I love not having to sweep first.

We love this. Our youngest is an infant and a very messy eater. This has made cleaning up after meals so much faster, easier, and way less aggravating. The self cleaning feature for the roller is awesome. Don’t forget to install the filter or you will think it’s horribly broken after 1 use!

I have only used it twice but really like it.  I do wish the tanks were a bit larger.  I have to refill 3 times for my whole house.  But really like how easy it is to use and am satisfied with the cleaning quality.
I’ve been wanting this for a long time. So when it was on Prime Day on sale I couldn’t pass it up. It cleans my hardwood floors and linoleum amazingly! Saves me so much time!

I love it, but started running into small problems that I didn’t really mind since they were minor but the water sprayer stop working completely making it impossible to use sadly I have contacted customer service hoping everything goes well will post an update October-2-2021
Absolutely LOVE this Vac mop!! I don’t know how I ever lived without it!!

review_title: Perfect for daily clean up, pet friendly home
review_text: Convienient, not too loud, perfect if you have pets and do daily cleanup on hard surface floors.
I like about it that it suction works really good
Works well

Wife read a lot of reviews and watched a lot videos before purchasing. Everything she said it would be is true. It’s not very big. The brush cleaning stage at end is loud af. Not able to clean up to the baseboard - design issue.But!!! It’s got a powerful sucker. It does clean itself. Easy to use and the parts of the floor that it scrubs is clean af.

The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
        
    
    

   So this was a purchase I skeptical in purchasing. I really didn’t think it would work so well. I was trying to choose between the Bissell or the Tineco. I currently own an older version of the Bissell and my floors always have a film and are still dirty. Like I clean them and if I do a wipe it still has a brown tinge to the paper towel. I used the Tineco and did a wipe test and nothing. I used a dry and a wet paper towel for the test and I was blown away. I also want to preface that this is even more amazing in my home because I have three dogs, a cat and a toddler in my house. I am constantly cleaning. I love too that it’s almost like a self propelled lawn mower it pulls itself forward so maneuvering is really easy. It doesn’t leave much of any water around. Picks up most of the fur. The self cleaning works really well. My only down fall on the product would be it doesn’t get right up against the baseboards but I haven’t really found a vacuum that does with out a tool.

With a cat, dog, and three kids we needed a better floor cleaning system than a cordless stick vacuum.  The S3 is beyond what I thought could be accomplished with a mop/vac.  It truly cleans the floors and does it with ease.  The S3 is well built, powerful, sturdy, and intelligent.  It auto senses dirtier spots and turns up the cleaning power.  My floors have never been cleaner.Before filling it up,  take a few minutes to understand how to take it apart and put it together.  That way you don't have anxiety when you have a tub of dirty water and the S3 is telling you to clean its dirt chute.  For people with long hair animals (mine is great pyrenees--he's a giant furball)  take time after every cleaning to pull up the roller and clean the chute behind it where fur collects.  Things like large pieces candy wrappers will also get stuck in this area.  It is easily cleaned out using your fingers.  I have only had one complete clog where I sectioned up a large clump of fur and it was too much fur at once for the machine to suction.  The S3 stopped and said it needed cleaning.The S3 comes with cleaning solution.  A tiny capful is all thats needed per fill up.  The floors look great!  I was hesitant to buy due to never owning a combination vac/mop and the $400 price point.  I do own an older model Tineco stick vac that still works great, so I know the company makes reliable products.If you can afford to buy the S3 I strongly recommend it.  Its such a huge improvement from regular vacuuming and the floors look much better.

I would not recommend that anyone purchase from this company.  They claim a 2 year warranty.  Well first you have to get them to answer the phone or an email.  They have live people on the phone "on occasion".  At times you get a recording.  You send an email and if you are lucky, you will get a response in 24 to 48 hours but sometimes it is a week or two.  These machines are GREAT.  Until they break!  And break they will.  It really is a shame as there is not another mop/vacuum combo that is as good as these machines but they are not made to last and when they break you have to struggle to get them repaired or replaced.  So far I sent mine in for repair.  It was sent back not repaired, in fact worse then when I sent it in.  Then I spent weeks trying to get hold of them (the whole process took 5 weeks!!) and they finally agreed to send me another machine.  Well that machine is broken.  It left big puddles all over my floors.  So now they are not talking to me again.  They sent one email to say, gee, sorry, what can we do?  I said send me a working machine and then they went silent.  I will be filing a complaint with the BBB and the Attorney general on their business practices (or lack there of).  BTY, they have an F rating with the BBB.  Their warranty is useless since they cannot fix a machine that does not work and if you have a replacement sent it may not work either.  BTY, also, the batteries after a year will be only giving you about half the life that you had when you purchased it.  So even if you machine does not break down, your battery will require you to charge it up more and more.  I would wait to purchase a machine from a company that stands behind their products.

review_title: Great, until it wasn’t! Now it’s great again!
review_text: Another update: I changed the stars to 4 stars because I love my machine.  After it was replaced I will continue to rave about this product!Update: I have a new machine! Yay! I love this machine and have recommended it to everyone I know. After a few months of back and forth they did replace my machine and I have a new one. My sister has the same machine and hers has not broke or needed any replacement parts. So it was probably just my machine. So if you’re thinking of purchasing a Tineco don’t hesitate. You won’t be sorry.I ordered this in August 2021. It no longer charges. I’ve been in communication with Tineco and they have since ghosted me. I loved this machine until it stopped charging. When I reached out to Tineco they seemed like they would help me, unfortunately they haven’t responded to any of my emails answering all of their questions. It’s very frustrating to have a company not stand behind their product. I have recommended this machine to everyone I know. I will now tell them to not spend the money for if it breaks the company will not help you.

review_title: I have changed my review Tineco once they finally contacted me were very helpful!
review_text: Update: I have recently changed my star rating to a 4. Once Tineco had contacted me via email they were very helpful. We live in a time where we want and need assistance now. But some companies still go via email. It took a little longer than I would’ve liked to get my product back but I have finally received it and it seems to be in working order. They have been more than accommodating.They have assured me that they will be changing their customer service options in the future and I hope this is true. This product has a very good potential of being great!Well I’ve had this since March 22 and I’ve absolutely loved it until today I went to clean my floors and it just spilled water all over the place. I have taken it apart I have cleaned it it has a fully charged battery there’s water in it I emptied the dirty water I have clean the brush and nothing is working I tried to contact customer service and they don’t answer. I don’t understand how you could sell $300-$400 products and not have a support to contact 24 hours or even during normal business hours. This is absolutely ridiculous and now I have to go buy a bucket and a mop and do with the old way before I wasted $350 on this thing.

Let me start by saying this vacuum is amazing when you first get it. It cleans really well and is super convenient for having kids and hardwood floors. I was blown away by how dirty my floors were and loved my vacuum so much that I talked my friends into getting them.That being said…I am on my 3rd vacuum since October 2020. We follow all manufacturers instructions for cleaning and maintenance and the vacuum has still died on us twice. The company stands by their warranty but the process for a replacement is not a smooth one. You will be asked to send multiple videos and then you will have to ship it back to them. They will not send a replacement back until they receive your broken one which will leave you without a vacuum for an extended period of time. All in all our last submission for a replacement took 3 weeks. You will not receive a new vacuum either, they are refurbished. I am honestly just riding out the warranty and will not be purchasing this brand again.PROS:Cleans wellEasy to useConvenientHolds decent chargeCONS:Motor doesn’t last longFrequent emptying of dirty waterFrequent refill of clean waterTedious, drawn out warranty process

review_title: Best all cleaner in one ever
review_text: Love the clean out without dust in my face like my Dyson

review_title: This machine is a dream for a household with animals and children!
review_text: I rarely ever mopped my floors before buying this vacuum (maybe once every few months). Ever since I've had the Tineco Floor One S3, I cannot stand for my floors to have a spot on them! It cleans so thoroughly!! I didn't realize what I was missing out on until I got this vacuum. AND no more having to use a million paper towels or old towels to clean up messes made by my 2 children or my 2 large dogs! I just whip out this guy and it's clean in just a few minutes. It's so light and SUPER easy to maneuver - it feels like I'm vacuuming with a traditional lightweight non-bulky vacuum.  It powers up so quickly that I can use it for little spills or spots really quickly without any hassle. I LOVE the self-cleaning feature. I just put the vacuum on the charger and press the self-clean function and BOOM it cleans itself! I just have to empty the dirty water tank into the sink. Maintenance is super easy too! Run self-cleaning cycle, dump and rinse out the dirty water tank, refill clean water tank with water and a capful of the cleaning solution, and once a week I take out the roller brush and filter and deep clean them by hand. However, an extra roller brush and extra filter come with the vacuum so no waiting on the other ones to dry! Plus the storage base has places to hold the extra filter and roller brush so they can air dry and be easily stored in a convenient place! Oh and don't be scared off by the 30 min battery life or the size of the tanks. I can clean my entire kitchen/back hall/laundry room/guest bath (approx 1,000 sqft) on one battery charge and only 2-3 dirty water tank emptying or clean water tank refills. Which is about the same amount times I'd have to change mop water but this way I'm not having to lift a heavy bucket. Oh did I mention the "smart" feature?! It tells you if the floor is dirty! Then it speeds up or slows down depending on the amount of dirt and it tells you when it's cleaned! Amazing!!! I am truly in love with this vacmop! It is worth EVERY PENNY. Stop guessing if you should buy it and JUST BUY IT! You won't be sorry.

review_title: Leaking and Broken Roller, STINKS - Less Than A Year Old
review_text: The roller no longer snaps in properly and now it will suck up larger things more easily which then clog the machine. It leaks water everywhere while in use. I have been fairly good about cleaning it out after each use, occasionally I won't clean it right away because i only used it for a quick spill clean up and I will be cleaning my floors later in the day. It stinks permanently now, I have even tried using lysol to wash the roller and parts but it still smells like musty water. The cleaner it comes with is okay, it smells nice but it doesn't deep clean. Also using anything except the tineco cleaner voids the warranty which is BS because like I said the machine stinks after only using the tineco cleaner because it is not strong enough.TL:DR Not worth $300, MAYBE worth $150

BEWARE: We bought this vacuum from a lightning deal on prime day for a good price. We thought the product would be new because it didn’t indicate anywhere we were buying a used product. When the package arrived, we opened it and notice it was obviously used. The vacuum itself was filthy with smudges, watermarks, hairs, & dirt. ALSO the cleaning solution bottle was placed inside a ziploc bag and was open!!!! We were unable to get the vacuum replaced (probably due to the lightning deal) so sadly, we just had to opt for the refund. Highly disappointing!!!
Works as advertised. Picked up much more dirt than expected. Definitely recommend.
Ok it won't totally replace a mop ( not really practical for stairs ) but it darn close and so much easier. I mean it's so easy I've started mopping almost everyday.

review_title: Amazing machine that mops and vacuums at the same time
review_text: This machine is amazing, I just wish the tank was a bit bigger so I didn’t have to stop and clean it out so many times in one clean

review_title: Fastest Way to a Clean Floor
review_text: This is my first time ever reviewing anything on Amazon, and it is only because of how amazing this thing is!!!! It’s easy/fast, gets my floor cleaner than anything else, and fun to use. Even my husband loves it! If you have toddlers who are messy eaters you need this!! It’s life changing!!!

Trust me...this is worth every penny! Our floors have never been cleaner. We use it on hardwood, tile and vinyl floors throughout the house. What used to be a chore that we put off is now an easy task. Even our 13 year old wants to do the floors now!

Love this! Potty training boys is HARD, but this makes clean up a breeze and so much faster and I feel like my floors are clean! Amazed at how well it picks up, easy to assemble, easy to use! Very happy Moma!

This is well worth the money! I’ve used it a few times now and it works flawlessly. The dirty water tank is a good representation of the work it’s  doing, and it surprises me every time how dirty our floors get in a week. Highly recommend!
Soooo glad I listened when people said this was better than bissell. They were right! Cleaning is a breeze, it basically drives itself. Zero regrets and I have 3 pets in my house.

I LOVE this vacuum. I previously had the Bissell pet pro and it left streaks on the floor and didn’t clean that well. The Tineco is amazing! I have 4 dogs and it helps keep my floors free of dog fur and paw prints. I would give this 6 stars if I could!

review_title: Easy to use, leaves a nice finish, stores in a small space.
review_text: I use it For hardwood and ceramic tile floors. My Entry is well lit from outside and shows every brush stroke with my old mop. The Tineco leaves a smooth, satiny finish. It is easy to use, requires very little water.

The device comes with a recharging stand/dock that sits on the floor. Ours is always in our kitchen. We have a one-year-old who loves to throw food a bit too much...After sweeping large jumps, this vacuum is great for getting up the sticky grease, grime, and leftoversThe device has two tanks. One for clean water (with some cleaning solution) and another tank where the dirty water filters out to. It is kinda gross to see how dirty the second tank becomes.  Cleaning the second tank is easy, just pull it off and pour it down the drain (with your drainer in place still). The drainer will catch large bits that should not go down the sink.This device is great and does way more than a swifter would. You really get a deep clean and can see the results in the lower tank.Good for a Dad who does not like cleaning.

This is for a home with Lite traffic and 1 to 2 short haired animals. I am a floor fanatic. I obsess over if my floors are actually clean. So I've had all the gadgets. I was super excited for this one. I've had it since Feb and at first I was impressed, but now seeing long term results not so much.First I'd like to point out if you have multiple long hair animals this is not the unit for you. I can vacuum my floors one day, and the next I have clumps of dog hair in the corners. This unit will clog if there are clumps of hair.After a few months I noticed there was a dirt ring about an inch away from my base boards. This unit does not clean to the ends of your floor. It stops about an inch from your baseboards. So you end up having to go over that area with something else.If your home is prone to mud being tracked in this unit is only good if you clean it as soon as it happens or your going to be going over and over and over it on high if it dries.Same goes for the kitchen. If something falls on the floor and you leave it there until the end of the night. It does not come up easily, and if it's sticky you can FORGET IT.I find myself going back to my steam mop if my floors are super dirty. (Usually 3 days of not being mopped) because the tineco just doesn't seem to be able to lift up set in debris. Just fresh just happened debris.The self cleaning cycle is pointless. You have to empty out the debris chamber and wash the roller and chamber by hand after every use or it will start stinking FOREVER. So you can do the self cleaning cycle but right after you have to take it apart and clean it anyways so I really don't understand that concept at all.It is amazing for lite use. So If you don't have multiple kids or animals I would definitely recommend it. If you do I'd probably save the money and get a swiffer or steam mop.
Love this vacuum! It’s amazing and really gets the job done. It cleans the floor spotless and has a powerful drive to it with its suction. Recommend highly!

Was hoping for a much better machine for 3 hundred bucks.CONS:Does not clean close to walls at all.Battery life is not great.Have go over and over and over and over sticky spots because brush does not scrub at all. (wish it had a scrub brush)Have to keep cleaning out the tank every few minutes because it gets clogged a lot.Have to totally clean machine when done.Solution leaves floor with streaks and says you can't use different solution at all.Wish it had a steam function.Vacuum suction is ok...not great.PROS:Self propel feature is nice.Picks up dog hair.Light weightNo cord.

review_title: Great for basic cleaning and cleanup of spills
review_text: With multiple kids, we were looking for something to make frequent after-meal cleanup easier. Crumbs, peas, pizza, etc are always falling from plates. We have a cordless vacuum and that helps, but isn't good for debris that isn't completely dry, like the peas and pizza. So we end up having to wipe up most of it with napkins before we can vacuum and we have to vacuum multiple times each day. Our entire first floor is bamboo and our bathroom is penny tile, so we need to keep the mess under control or the kids spread it quickly.We bought a Karcher FC25 from Costco because it was supposedly able to handle cleanup without having to pre-vacuum, but it just kicked everything around, so we still had to clean up manually and then use the Karcher to mop.My sister showed this Tineco to us when we visited her house, then I found it on sale a few weeks later and decided to try it. After a month of use almost daily, I really like it. It is must more convenient to use than the Karcher since there is no cord. Actual use is similar to the Karcher - the microfiber drum spins and picks up debris and the vac sucks it into the dirty tank. Comparing the two units, the Tineco doesn't kick stuff around at all and it handles spills better. Just today I grabbed it to clean up a yogurt spill. The Karcher seems to get the floors cleaner while leaving them drier.  With the Tineco, I have to go over the same spots over and over, or slowly, occasionally. The Karcher needed the same with certain messes, but not as often.Both devices have obnoxious clean water tanks with a small hole for the water that is not in a corner or edge so it is nearly impossible to get all the water out of them when finished.Both devices have pretty simple, 2 piece dirty water tanks, but the Karcher is is easier to rinse. The Tineco has a small, hard-plastic prefilter of sorts that either needs to be removed when rinsing or I have to pick the debris off.The stand for the Tineco is nicer since it has storage built it. Charging is easy since the vacuum rests in the stand and automatically starts charging. The battery is plenty for me to do our kitchen, eating area, hall, bathroom and more small spaces with battery remaining, maybe 700 ish square feet.Other thoughts:Handle is comfortable.Automatic roller rinsing is convenient and works well.Takes a while to charge but not slowly enough to be a problem.Edge cleaning is a disappointment. Since the roller is encased, the roller can't get as close to anything. For that reason, the Karcher makes it much easier to clean all the way to the baseboards and under the toekicks in the kitchen.I expected the suction to not be strong enough since some cordless dry vacuums have more power. However, it seems that the wet roller is very effective in picking up debris and the suction is plenty to clean the roller, so I am pleased.Overall, it was worth the money and I like using it. It is convenient, cleans rather well and is pretty easy to fill and clean.

review_title: Game changer if you have pets!!!
review_text:

   I have no carpet in my house and 2 dogs that shed a lot! It’s a full time job trying to keep al the hair up.1. Set up is very easy and it’s very easy to use2. Powerful spinning brush.  It even pulls its self forward.3. Self cleaning!4. It cleaned my huge living room and kitchen on one small tank of water.  I had absolutely no hair on my floor.  That’s a 1st!!!5. Only comes cordless. So far I’m loving that.6. Light weight and sleek design.So far I am loving this vacuum!!! I did read the limited warranty is only good if you use their cleaning product in the vacuum.My friends have a crosswave and in my opinion this performs so much better.  And it’s $100 cheeper than the crosswave pet pro

review_title: Best Purchase For House With Young Children or Pets
review_text: Ok folks, I am not going to say anything that the other people have not already said, but this this is a must if you have a young child learning how to eat...  We have a cordless vacuum that we love as well, but when you get peas on the floor or bananas that mush right into the floor instead of being vacuumed up this thing will save your life!  Now we literally wipe all the food on the high chair onto the floor while cleaning it.  Then get this thing out and go to town.  It picks up everything, while mopping the floor at the same time!Like some others have said, I think my wife loves this thing more than me.  It really is that good at doing what it is supposed to.  My one complaint is that the battery could last a bit longer for folks that have hard surfaces through out their whole house.  We can get though all of our house, but the battery starts to drop before we are done completely.  Plus is that the base charges the unit rather quickly so it is always ready to go when we need it!We caught ours on sale a while back and after using it I would say do not even wait for a sale, just get it.  You will not regret it at all!  Of course if there is a sale then certainly go for it because that is just that much better!  100% will buy one of these again should this one need replacing!

The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
            
        
    
    

   We have used the Bissell cross wave for a few years and loved it. Super timer saver. Used it daily. But it was time for a new one.We wanted a cordless wet dry vac and this one was a good price and seemed a good fit.The unboxing was worrisome. The liquid soap that comes with it spilled in the box so it took a bit of wiping down. Not the best way to start a new product.But the vacuum itself is nice. Love the cordless. It propels it self forwards which helps make vacuuming easier. Love the self clean feature. Just one button push. Self clean in Bissell was more of a chore than it needed it to be.I wish we could control the water coming out like the Bissell. Maybe I just need to get used to it but would be nice to stop water coming at times. Right now it just flows cactus Bissell that let water out when we pushed a little button.The clean water container seems small to me. Also the hole is not at very top so hard to get 100% water out. Over time I worry of junk building up there.The dirty water container is as expected. Kind of hard to explain but they have this little tray thing which helps to stop stuff reaching the air filter. In the Bissell we always clean the filter mesh since it didn’t have the little tray to prevent stuff from getting to it.It’s pretty light. Heavier than it looks though but not bad.So far so good. Just a few minor things here....oh and we love the cordless ability :)

review_title: All Accessories are out of stock and have been for a while
review_text: I bought this hoping it would last a while, and it seems like a nice, well-built mop/vacuum.  When I bought it, there were accessories like cleaning solution and extra rollers available on Amazon.  They were out of stock for a long time and now have simply been removed from the Tineco Store page.  If you go to that page, almost everything is out of stock.It seems like Tineco is closing up shop and moving on.  I would strongly consider this before making any purchase.  Hopefully I'm wrong and this stuff starts showing back up, but it's been a while since I've see it in stock.

TikTok made me buy it ...I kept seeing these “wet/dry vacuums” and their side-by-side comparisons. Wait! Hold up! There is a MOP that VACUUMS?!! Is this for real?!!!As a household with hard floors all downstairs, I kept seeing that this less expensive Tineco kept beating the Bissell time after time. Intrigued, I fell into “floor cleaning TikTok” and the satisfaction that this particular wet/dry vac was promising.It was $100 off during Prime Day so I *knew* I had to try it. And am I ever happy I did! I’ve used it 2x per day since it arrived. My floors have never been cleaner. It’s cordless and the battery lasts forever - about 30 mins. The suction is amazing. And - wait for it - IT CLEANS ITSELF!So, y’all need to seriously put this bad boy on your Black Friday Christmas list. It is worth it!
The best thing I ever bought fir cleaning floors.
This product is phenomenal!  My floors have never been cleaner! Highly recommend!
Love love love! Saves me so much time cleaning my floors
Great cleaner! Only complaint is that it suggests using only Tineco cleaning solutions and I can’t find it away. SOLD OUT everywhere.
This is the best thing since sliced bread! It's so easy to use, no more sweeping/mopping/vacuuming separately for me anymore. This does it all!
Such a great Vacuum! So worth the money!
Worked well while it lasted, machine stopped working after 6 months and Tinecosolutions haven’t been much help
Amazing deep cleaning vacuum. Floors are spotless after use.  User friendly.

review_title: It lives up to the hype!!
review_text: Love love love this wet dry vac!!! Saw it in TikTok and knew I had to have it! So simple to use and rechargeable annnd a breeze to clean up!! Best purchase to date!!
It leaves my floors very clean. Anyone that has hardwood knows it’s not easy and not everything help cleaning them. Love this machine.

Straight out of the box there was so many scuff marks all over the vacuum. Charged it until fully charged went to use it and after pressing the power button it only ran for 5 seconds then would shut off. It also wouldn’t suck up any water and just left puddles everywhere it went. Terrible product
The best tool I have ever bought,  it has made our life so much simpler and clean.  My floors have never felt this clean
Absolutely love this vacuum! So worth the money. You will be amazed at all the stuff your mop didn’t get and it saves you the sweeping time.

If you are on the fence about purchasing this, don’t be!! I Totally don’t regret getting this!  We have new tile floors and I went out and purchased a spin mop and it didn’t even clean up the dirt.  I purchased the tineco and it got EVERYTHING!!  Now I am contemplating on purchasing a vacuum and tossing out my other vacuum.  Tineco has a lifer out of me

review_title: Worth the price!!! Makes cleaning Effortless!
review_text: This a Must Have for busy parents Especially if there are pets around. You will SEE how much regular mopping doesn't clean your floor!!!

This product is wonderful for small areas but when trying to clean your whole house you have to empty the dirty water tank and fill the clean water tank WAY to often. I have a 1,000 square foot house and I’ve had to empty and refill 4 times already and run 4 self cleaning cycles. It’s a pain to have to stop in the middle of a room to keep refilling. I would suggest the bissel crosswave pet pro because it has bigger tanks

I have 3 dogs who all shed, track in mud and who knows what else and this is the perfect product to clean all of their mess up. It is a lifesaver from having to sweep then mop. I can do my kitchen and living room in about 20 mins. The only downside is how often you have to empty the dirty water tank but other than that, it was definitely worth the money!

So happy I got this, works great and I love that it cleans itself after use! Absolutely no complaints, I did just get it so we will see about durability but overall very satisfied with the product! My floors have never been so clean!
I like this a lot my only issue is the tank that holds clean water is really small
Simple, clean, powerful
The unit does a good job. Big Negative is that it does not clean all the way to wall.

review_title: This works terrible.  Leaves lines all over my hardwoods
review_text: This cleaned terrible.  left lines on my floor and didnt clean well at all.  I went to return it but I am 3 days past the refund window which is unfortunate for me.  I read reviews and chose this because it sounded awesome but its not.  So disappointed
I got mine today was so excited I put it together and did a quick vac/mop and my floors look good can't wait for it to charge and trying it later
I just received this and charged it and used it... and I am blown away how well this cleans!!!
I love this floor cleaner!  It truly made my cleaning so much faster and easier!

This was an absolute great buy. It works very well and is EASY to clean in between uses. I have 2 young kids and a shedding dog so this is used almost daily. If I had to say anything negative about it is *sometimes* I can see streaks in the floor from the cleaning solution and I wish it could get closer to the floorboards and corners BUT otherwise it's perfect perfect perfect.

We have tile flooring throughout our house and this product works great on it. It’s easy to use and comes with an extra roller. It’s been a great addition to my existing cleaning arsenal, but I’ll admit if I had seen this first I wouldn’t need anything else.
Not disappointed at all... highly recommend! Thank you Tineco.
Great mop, wouldn’t call it a vacuum. Just use it mopping once my floors are already vacuumed
I have only had it for 2 weeks but I absolutely love it!!  Money well spent!!  I will update later if issues arise.
The floor has streaks and water puddles that get left behind.
Nice vacuum and mop all in one does a great job cleaning

review_title: Best Cleaning Device I have EVER purchased
review_text: Makes cleaning floors so easy! No longer need to sweep before mopping. My floors have never been so clean. Mop is easy to use, easy to clean and cut my cleaning time by hours a month.

review_title: Love this! Makes hard floors easy to clean.
review_text: Love this for my hardwood and vinyl floors. Cleans very good, easy to maneuver.  Gets the job done fast. We have a large family and use this almost daily.

review_title: Always sold out for a reason!
review_text: This is amazing! Picks up everything and leaves little to no streaks!

Love this vacuum/hard wood floor cleaner. The only thing I wish is that the water tank was a little bit bigger and that I could get closer to the edge of the walls with it. Still, it is a great product and it saves me soooooo much time with housework. I don't know how I did without it for so long.

I have Australian Shepards, so, hair is plentiful in my home. It takes me less than 10 min a day and my floors look sparkling. It handles hair, big messes, and it has even gotten stains out of my linoleum that i didn’t think was possible. I highly recommend
So far I love it,didn't know my floors were so dirty. My negative is that the water cups are small but I'm ok with it because my house is small

Its so satisfying to see all the crap in the tank. I really am impressed. It makes mopping fun and easy. Never would have imagined looking forward to cleaning the floors. Totally worth whatever i paid. Get it.
So worth the money!! Best purchase yet!

So far so good. I did have some problems with air in the lines when I first starting using the machine. After some google searching I found out how to fix it.Love how it can clean itself but it seems to want to do a self cleaning after very little of actual floor cleaning.  Also the tray never gets clean when it’s running the self clean cycle so the dirty water just pools some.Overall it cleans the floors very well and I have totally replaced my everyday mopping.

I was a little skeptical at first. But honestly, I have 2 toddlers and they make such messes every single day. The fact that this machine can handle cleaning wet and dry messes at the same time = A+ Product.I will say, the dirty water reservoir does fill up pretty quickly & when it does, the machine stops. My floors were dirtier than I expected, I stopped 3 times during my cleaning to empty out the dirty water reservoir. Other than that, my floors feel AMAZING! Way better than I thought they would. Blew my expectations out of the water. The self cleaning is a huge plus, I thought I got the thing clean but after running the self cleaning mode there was more gunk that was pushed through. I look forward to using this every day after my boys get done making their usual messes!

Saw good and bad reviews. I absolutely love this product. It is a bit pricey though.  It is so great for a quick clean up. I hate sweeping then moping. This takes care of that in one step and saves so much time.  It’s not perfect though. There are certain spot like under cabinets and along edges that it can’t get as well so I still have to use a broom and mop occasionally but I am still in love with this product. It cuts the floor cleaning  in half

This vacuum is impressive and surely gets the floor clean after multiple rounds (and before I used it for the first time, I had just swept & mopped with a swifter wet jet). It is however pretty cumbersome. Everytime you use it you must empty the dirty water tank (expected), clean it & the roller out & dry, refill the clean water tank with cleaning solution, use the “self clean” option, and then after it done... take it all apart again, clean, and refill the clean water tank to start cleaning the floor again. It’s a lot to do when the majority of your house is hard floors. I bought this to clean my floors better AND to save time. So far, it’s not saving me time but it is cleaning the floors better.

This vacuum is exactly what I wanted for my hardwoods and tile. It does a thorough job and notifies me when the roller needs to be cleaned. This is easily and automatically done wo removing the roller. Then one continues cleaning. The only downside is the batteries last about 1/2 hr. at which time it is set in the base for recharging. If that is enough time for your home then I highly recommend it.

I love my ifloor! We recently remodeled and I have a LOT of vinyl plank flooring. I have 3 kids and Golden retrievers in my house and this thing saves my sanity with keeping the floors clean.  It does great with the dog hair also, I will say though if my dogs are shedding a lot I vacuum first so I don’t have to stop and clean out the ifloor so much. But for daily use I typically don’t have to vacuum first. Only during heavy shedding or if I haven’t vacuumed in few days.

I love it!!Cleans marvelously, better than when I mopped myself.  It leaves the floors very clean and shiny using water only!! (I have 3 dogs). OkOn the other hand;The dirty water canister is somewhat small, needing to be cleaned often.I can clean a somewhat big room at a time, because unit needs to recharge after one space area.

review_title: I loved it until it stopped working.....6 months later.
review_text: It honestly was what I thought would be the best purchase ever. It feels nice and study and it cleaned very well. However 6 months later the vacuum stopped working. I'm currently working with Tineco to see what solution they have to the problem but from the looks of it its going to be a long process. Looking back at other reviews now I see that this is a common problem. So probably not the best way to spend your money.

I ready hundreds of reviews and watched as many YouTube videos I could before I bought this. I’m really happy with my purchase. It’s great for parents with kids because it really saves you time. I love the 2 in 1 deal that it vacuums and mops. Cleanups now don’t get me frustrated and mad because of this vacuum. It picks up everything and if something is too big I just step on it and it picks it up. The only thing I kinda don’t like it cleaning the dirty water tank. It’s not hard just a little pain. It’s definitely worth it!!

Mom of 4 boys ages 2-12! As if having four kids didn’t save enough my house has 1000sq ft of hardwood in my downstairs alone even in the kitchen and baths. This thing is LIFE CHANGING! Buy it already, what are you waiting for?!

review_title: YOU CAN change the speakers language.
review_text:

   I bought one for myself and my mother in law saw it and also wanted one! So we got it! You are able to switch the voice language through the app! Mine is in English and I switched hers to Spanish as you can tell by the video. It cleans the floors super well! I love that it vacuums and mops at the same time, this saves me so much time.

I use this almost daily!! with dogs n kids in the house, it works great! Only a couple things I didn't like. 1, the water compartments are small, so if you have a bigger floor, you will have to clean and refill more often, ...which is no big deal, a minor inconvenience..2) it obviously doesn't clean all the way to the edge of your floor..close to the baseboard..which every now n then you'll have to use a regular mop or take a rag and wipe. Other than that, always clean all parts when you're done. Do not leave water especially the dirty water sit, it will make the unit and microfiber roller smell!

I’m very impressed with this product. It vacuumed up anything I went over. Even a Cheeto. Haha but the mop part could be better. It did a good job of doing a basic clean but if anything is dried on the floor, it wouldn’t clean it up. Also the clean water tank ran out quicker than I expected. But overall. It was worth my money :)

review_title: Easy to use and clean with gleaming floors in a short time.
review_text: Saw this machine in my news feed. I’ve recently moved to a new place with dark wood floors that every speck of dirt shows. My dog constantly tracks in weeds from outside too. Used my Tineco for the first time yesterday and all I can say is WOW!  The unit is super easy to use and it cleans great. I was sweeping my floor at least 5 times a day before and this morning my floors look great and clean. It was so fast to use and getting everything done in one step saves time. So happy I gave this a try.

I have 8 kids, I mop about 2-3 times a day, before I was using a steam mop, which was great but this tineco seems easier to keep clean, it picks up amazing. I don't necessarily need to sweep before i mop, i will occasionally if there are big pieces on the ground that i don't want to clog and mess this tineco up. When i would use the steam mop the pads would get so nasty, even washing them to reuse they got dirty so quickly and i would have to wait until i wash/dry the pad to reuse it. The tineco in the other hand I can clean majority of the rooms and still keep going it's that easy, I just have to clean the water tank, and sometimes the debris part but its good to go after a couple self cleaning modes and cleaning the water tank still takes way much lesser time to do.

I hate sweeping and I hate mopping, so this makes cleaning so much faster and easier! Works great with our dog’s long hair and with our new puppies “accidents” on the floor. Easy to use, easy to clean, super convenient. Lightweight, quiet, and I would recommend to anyone with hardwood floors.

I have 3 dogs and white Linoleum at the door they go outside at. I live in a very rainy state so the backyard basically turns to mud in the winters. This thing... is a life saver. I’m absolutely in love with it. The only thing I wish this model had was a larger capacity for the fluid to go into. But other than that it’s great!!!! I love the self cleaning mode too!! Best purchase you can make!! Tiktok made me buy it! 😂

review_title: It Will Not Last More Than 3 Months
review_text: Cleaned well for about 3 months. Then just stopped working. Officially a 20 pound paper weight and even talking with customer service doesn’t work. DO NOT BUY, much better products out there...

I mop my floors once a week. I vacuum regularly. I am a disgusting pig living in squalor and didn’t know until I made this purchase. That pic? AFTER CLEANING MY FLOORS THREE TIMES. You’re living in complete filth and will always be living like a wild rabid animal with no regards for cleanliness until you buy this machine.

I have very shiny, light colored tile and nothing beats this vacuum mop. I got a Hoover one from Lowe’s that scratched my floors and left streaks everywhere. The Tineco iFloor3 is absolutely worth the money and cleans extremely well. It is a time saver. My kitchen is the rough spot since it’s high traffic, and I cook all the time. The Tineco really cuts through the residue that sometimes makes the floor look greasy.

I love this so much never seen my floors this clean before! It uses less water than my cross wave but it cleans so much better than the cross wave. Only dislike about is that the clean water tank does not hold a lot of water in it I’m constantly changing out the water. But other than that I love it!!!!

I LOVE LOVE this thing! There are a few things I wish were different, I wish it would get closer to the edge against walls and baseboards, and I do wish the “clean” tank was bigger...but other than that this Tineco is amazing!! My floors feel so much cleaner after using it!

review_title: Game changer in household cleaning routine.
review_text: Was absolutely blown away by what this could do. The convenience of a cordless vacuum that allows me to sweep and scrub at the same time has cut down on my cleaning time. I am handicapped and find it easy to handle. No heavy bucket to carry around. No do doing the floor twice.

It cleans very well. My floors were dirtier than I could’ve ever imagined... the only down fall is had to say... if you don’t do a self clean after every SINGLE use, the tank stinks. You have to clean it every time!
This by far beats the cordless Bissell Crosswave hands down!

Gets the floors clean / wipe test with a white paper towel comes back clean every time.  It sort of self propels and swivels with turns so it’s easy to maneuver.  Dislike the small water tank and it doesn’t really scrub enough to remove stuck on pieces of debri.
I Love this, you still have to take it apart to clean but it’s easy
Excellent product!  I highly recommend it!
Absolutely in love with this! Glad I listened to reviews saying the Tineco is superior to the crosswave. Looking forward to clean floors with a toddler and a newborn.

review_title: Awesome for the quick clean up.
review_text: Nice little machine for cleaning up spills and everyday cleanups.

I have attempted to get a replacement or new adapter sent to me as my Tineco stopped charging after 1 month. I have yet to receive a new adapter or consistent communication to in fact fix the issue. The device itself is AH- MA-ZING!! In the event something goes wrong with it though, getting a resolution is hard to come by.

review_title: Too expensive and there are others that do better
review_text: It was not the best mop. I bought it because I had a huge area to clean 1600 ft.² of hardwood floors but it does not reach any edge so I have to clean all around not happy with it And it was very expensive around $400 there are others out there that can do the same at half the price I did not open it because we had just moved in and we were remodeling and now I cannot return my product
This is better than any bissell crosswave !!!It talks the talk and walks the walk(rolls)I had a little heart palpitation when I swiped to buy..... but this this is worthEVERYPENNY!!!!!!!!
We have pets and this machine makes clean up and regular vacuum and mopping easier and more effective. And, it cleans itself. Just add water. Cordless for ease of use
Worth it if you have small kids. I have 3 boys and I use it several times a week. Works great.

I got it for my mom for Christmas. She loves it because it will tell you if the floor is clean or dirty. It tells you when it needs cleaned and to be honest you could use different cleaning solution in it, but so far so good. I haven’t heard a complaint yet!!!

We have pretty high traffic in my house as well as a dog. This vacuum has been a life saver and keep my floors clean. The only dislike I have is that it doesn’t do well “deep cleaning” if you have anything stuck to the floor you will likely have to scrape it. However it has great suction power as it has picked up bb’s and screws that got stuck under my dining room table.
This is my favorite vacuum that I have ever owned. It does an awesome job at vacuuming and mopping at the same time. I highly recommend it, I don't hate mopping anymore!

I purchased this wet/dry vacuum on June 22,2021. It stopped charging last week. I called tineco today. They told me when you purchase this machine from Amazon the warranty is voided. It’s only under warranty for 60 days. Very disappointed in this company. I will never buy from this company again

I’m able to clean my floors with this without sweeping. Cons… the reservoir for the water (and solution) is small. It runs out before I can finish my floor and it’s always saying that I need to empty the dirty water. It’s kinda high maintenance because you have to clean it after every use. I do love it but it’s high maintenance.
It a very good vacuum and live my floors shine and clean
This vacuum has amazing power along with it doesn't streak or dull my hard wood floors
Ease of keeping my laminated floors clean.Easy clean up of the attachmentsCan clean my whole apartment on one charge with time to spare and then easy charging of the unit.

review_title: It works great !!! If you are thinking about it just get it!!!
review_text: Is the best thing I’ve bought this year ! I have two kids that are messy and make spills and it just makes everything so easy. It’s easy to use and just so convenient.
I am so happy with my investment of the Tineco S3. My only wish is it had a bigger clean water tank. Otherwise, it makes cleaning the floor so easy. I highly recommend.
Highly recommended. No more sweeping and mopping
I love this thing so much! It makes sweeping and mopping all my floors so much easier. It literallyTakes less than half the time it used to.
the best buy for my house !! i just love it and there is no way i get back to the old mop after trying the Tineco !! the floor is so clean and smooth and the batterie is enough for my whole house !!
Absolutely love it!  Highly recommend for tile or wood floors!
Too expensive

It’s a bit pricey, but It’s perfect for what I needed. Use it for vinyl floor and it works best on that surface. I use it on tile floor too but it only cleans the surface. Grout cleaning is another procedure. Dry time is quick as it doesn’t lay down a ton of water. Self cleaning feature is cool. Pretty quiet, not like other cleaners I have had. The Hoover floor mate was really loud. This is much quieter.

I’ve owned the Original Tineco for about a year and a half and was so-so on its results.  I ordered this replacement (it stopped sucking up water) on prime day for $200.  I was very impressed with the paper of this Tineco over the original.  It self propels, the roller/scrubber is a different material-somewhat like microfiber.  My floors were spotless without streaks.  Highly recommend.

review_title: If I could be on the commercial for this thing, I would. And I would do it for free.
review_text: There aren't enough words to describe how much I love this thing. A few days after I got it, my son spilled a whole cup of chocolate milk. I went and vacuumed it right up, in seconds.  Gets up anything on the floor and doesn't get clogged. I'm both disgusted and elated at what it gets up. Add it to your cart. Right now.

This is an amazing mop vacuum.  It is great for those everyday spills. No more need to pull out a full mop just to clean up the spill from kiddos or pets. Take this out clean the mess then let the mop clean itself. So easy and fast.

Within one year, I am now on my FOURTH vacuum mop.  That is right. Four in a row have stopped working for no reason at all.  This leads to me emailing back and forth for a month before getting a return label, taking the mop to fedex to drop off, then waiting two more weeks for the replacement.  This latest one stopped working and smelled like an electrical fire within three uses.  Buyer beware.  If it actual worked, it could be a great product.

review_title: work great but some can be improved
review_text: The vacuum work great, but it blow air on front. the other model ifloor dont blow air. also when there is hard food stick on floor, i spin on that spot for a while it still wont remove but easily remove with my finger scrap it off.  the customer service was awesome helper with solving my situation with filter, everything great =)

I love this machine! Having clean floors becomes a priority when you have small children. It picked up dirt that regular mopping had missed. It’s only flaw is that it does not have edge cleaning I .e. Stuff will still linger by the baseboards. However this is so trivial to me

I.absolutely loved it,only dislike was running time wasnt long so they put the tineco s3 on sale so I returned the I dloor3 I get about 12-15 more minutes battery time but I love love and did I say love the tineco the auction is unbelievable  and easy to maneuver around furniture just an awesome product

The floor in my house is old linoleum. The teneco has done a good jog removing surface dirt, deodorizing, and drying the floor. The battery life is greatly extended when you run it at a lower speed. Who has the time? Good product. I've used it twice so far.

Almost perfectPros: does a great job in cleaning the floor. Pretty light and effectiveCons:Wish the side of the roller were thinner so it would cover the side and corners of the floor.The talking is too loud and not smart.

review_title: Fail, not a total vacuum replacement, not for pets, too involved post mop process
review_text: So I started out super impressed by this little vacuum , only to end up urgently sending it back right before my 30 day cut off.Unless you want to spend as much time cleaning it out as it takes to poorly vacuum and mop this vacuum isn’t for you. It doesn’t come with a hose attachment, so right there it can’t replace your regular vacuum.Every time you vacuum you’re have to clean and dry the entire insides of the vacuum including the cloth tightly wrapped around plastic roller that is impossible to dry over a 24 hr period, so if you’re like me and want to clean daily you’ll end up with a mildew smelling roller, rolling gross water all over your house.Also hair from my one short haired cat clogged it more than once…Disappointed

review_title: Home with 2 kids and 2 cats! A product I never would have thought existed.
review_text:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
        
    
    

   I have two young children, ages 3 & 5 and two dark haired cats. I cannot count the times I wished for something that would mop and vacuum at the same time. I saw the crosswave awhile back and my plan was to get it eventually, but TikTok creators showing comparisons of this brand vs it’s competitor quickly made me look into Tineco! I mean WOW. My house is very old and has the original flooring so until we move or decide to renovate I don’t expect the floors to ever be perfectly clean and bringing up clear water but to say I am baffled seeing what each room brings up is an understatement. I can guarantee I’ll be using this bad boy every day. The floors take almost no time to dry afterward and the self cleaning is completely mesmerizing. Dreams really can come true. 😍

review_title: I wish there was a “rougher” brush
review_text: Pros:-“walks” forward by itself, therefore you won’t be killing your back too much.-the fact that removes dust and mops at the same time is objectively amazing-the self cleaning mode is not bullcrap as I thought it would be, but ACTUALLY cleans the brush.-the charging dock is veeery convenient and has holders for accessories and to place the brush to let air dry.-floors are cleaned but since they’re not smooth but rather on the rougher side, many spots could use deeper cleaning-the floor dries up super fast because not an insane amount of water is used-if you have smooth tile I highly recommendCons:-The brush is so ‘dull’ that it doesn’t work magnificently on hardwood floors (sealed 12x24 ceramic tile with rougher surface mimicking wood)-The machine demands to be placed on the dock for self-cleaning approximately every 30 sq ft (waste of time)-When on the dock for self-cleaning, the battery is not charging so the function is actually draining your battery autonomy that is already quite limited to 18 minutes (in max mode) or 25 in eco mode.-if you have long hair around your house (I shed like a German Shepard) you better use your broom/vacuum to collect them first, otherwise it’s going to be a MESS to remove them from the dirty water tank.-the repeated cleaning of the parts (tank) while trying to clean the house it’s quite a pain the back-forget about cleaning corners or getting close to the baseboards

review_title: U will have a spotless floor but it will smell FOUL.
review_text: Update: Tineco responded but never resolved my issue with the foul odor. I’ve used my machine twice and although it cleans well, that stinch is too awful for me to stand in my house. I’m going to shop for something else.This machine works well. Don’t get me wrong. It gets the job done. However, I’ve only used one time because the tank that holds the dirty water smells like stagnant foul fish water and Ive cleaned that thing so many times. It’s something to do with the plastic absorbing that dirty water and not coming out. I’ve contacted Tineco and nothing. The said I probably left the dirty water in in overnight. I told them no because I had to clean it several times to do my entire house. It was so gross. Your house will look clean but will smell like a wet dog and we have no pets in the house.

Update: Had it now over six months. I ended up vacuuming my floors before I use it ( to save on liquid cleaner and time since it wants to keep doing a self clean CONSTANTLY. I spend way more time waiting for it to self clean and filling up the clean fluid container and emptying the dirty container, even with me pre vacuuming, than actually cleaning my floors. The only good feature is the battery holds but can't say that is a good thing since it spends more time charging while self cleaning in the hub, than cleaning. My friend owns a bissel and I think I'll get that instead. If you have a tiny floor maybe. But then again a mop is faster. Don't spend the money. It's a waste. I regret it.This is my second one. The 1st one showed full battery but never turned on no matter what. This one works. After 1 use:Pros: Dry quick. Loved the fact that I didn't need to vacuum before (my main reason for getting it as I don't mind vacuum or mop but less time by cutting out one is good.) It didn't kick the dirt around. Vacuum edges decent. Had to go over areas a few times to clean certain spots that I know my Monado would've taken off immediately. It did do a good job at cleaning but takes a bit longer than mopping,  granted I double clean my floors.Cons:I only cleaned my kitchen and entry way that has marble tile (cheap ones) and I had to refill the clean canister 3 times and empty the dirty one 3 times and and it went in to self clean 3 times. Its about160 sq  feet max.  My floors were not that dirty. I still have to clean the machine, I did empty the dirty container and washed it out real well but not the brush roller yet.Even with refilling and emptying the canisters I feel it still saved some time. The canister cleaned out easier than a bucket and the floors dried easy. I will still need to do deep clean once a month or less.Is it worth the price. Mmm. Will c in the next month. Will try it on my basement laminate wood look floors. Will then update stars.Ia it worth the

review_title: Better than my Bissell Crosswave (Corded Model)
review_text: Love this Floor cleaner! I have a Bissell Crosswave corded and wanted a cordless mop vac. I was going to get the newer Bissell Crosswave cordless and after a lot of research and a good Prime Day sale, I bought the Tineco. I’ve used it only a couple times so far and have no buyers remorse.So comparisons. My corded Bissell Crosswave is extremely loud, I mean twice as loud as a standard vacuum. Yes, the cordless Bissell is much quieter, but I feel you can barely here this Tineco.My Bissell would squirt unevenly and often leave streaks. So far, the Tineco is a nice even coverage with no streaking.Weight difference - hands down the Tineco is lighter. I mean significantly lighter. Surprisingly it being battery operated you’d think it’d be heavier, not the case here. For elderly or weaker individuals, I’d definitely go with the Tineco.Cleaning the machines are both similar.I do like how the Tineco one operates better than the Bissell Crosswave. The Bissell operates like a steam cleaner. You have to push the spray button and release when you just want it to suck. The Tineco does it all on its own. Also I like when you sit it up to stop, it auto shuts off. Then starts automatically when you go to vacuum again.

review_title: Floor cleaning is much easier and better with this machine. My dark tile floors look great now!
review_text: I have dark ceramic tile thru my whole house and several pets. Before the Tineco machine, I struggled every day trying to get the tile looking clean. i used different mops and even a steam cleaner, but the dark tile looked dusty and hazy all the time. I swept or vacuumed first, but it did not help. Now, I just run the Tineco machine over the tile once and the dark brown color is shining, with no dust or haze. I don't even sweep up birdseed and dog hair before running the machine! With just one pass, the floor is perfect! The water i pour out of the machine at the end looks like mud! Very satisfying. The floor dries very quickly after, almost no waiting to walk on it. Plus, the machine is self-propelled, so I am using much less effort. Cleaning the floor is easy and gratifying now. At first, I had a problem with the battery running out before I finished all my floors (whole house is tiled), but then I read the instruction that said the battery will last longer if you run the machine on "regular" (one light bar), not "max" (two light bars) power. I tried this and was able to clean my whole house without recharging. I had extra power left after cleaning the whole house, so I could have used the "max" power part of the time, but I didn't need it.  The floor is wonderfully clean now and with a LOT less time and effort than it took to sweep and mop "the old way". I love this machine! If it keeps on running like this, I will be totally satisfied!

review_title: Bidet-level life changing, save your money and go for this model over the higher tier
review_text: You know how mopping never seems worth it because you know that after a few passes on one area you're basically just redistributing wet dirt around your floors, so you almost never mop? Since getting this, my floors are literally perfect all the time. I can get my ~1000 square feet of floor from a 9 to a 10 in about 15 minutes including emptying the tank and running a self-clean. The self clean function really works, you get to like 98% clear water and the cloth of the brush roller never develops a scent (take it out and let it stand upright to dry fully to keep it even fresher). It's thrilling to see the dark water come out of the dirty water tank. It's faster, physically easier, and degrees more effective than mopping, so you actually feel motivated to use it, and frequently. Equally effective on wood and tile. I vacuum beforehand because I'm a clean freak, but it also does pick up large particles (hair, food crumbs, etc), so in a pinch, you can use it in lieu of a dry vacuum and get your vacuuming and mopping down in one pass. Long story short, I will never live without one of these again.I own both this model and the black one with the led screen and the robot voice and the stupid internet of things features (all basically useless upgrades). They're both amazing, but they both have the same essential cleaning features. The only difference that might matter is that the higher end model has a slightly larger battery which also seems to contribute to stronger self-propulsion, but even in my biggish two bedroom, the water chambers run out long before the battery ever would, I've never run it down to lower than 70% in one whole apartment cleaning.

Left streaks all over my floor. I was able to complete about half the floor before it needed to be docked for brush cleaning - wasnt even halfway through water tank and the floors were professionally cleaned 2 days ago! (they weren't that dirty to start with!) Also hate that it doesn't completely dry the floor as advertised. The vacuum only pulled up water when you pushed it forward..well who mops without a forward and back motion?! I would have to mop the house in a continuous circle to get it to pull up the extra moisture. Not willing to compromise my wood floors being left wet.Also it's advertised as a mop AND vacuum..i mean, you aren't doing carpets with this thing..it's meant to vacuum and mop at the same time but has no functionality to ONLY vacuum. (And forget stairs. This thing is HEAVY and not meant to be used on stairs).Returning! Would rather use my steam mop and a cheap moosoo stick vacuum.
I feel like it’s more trouble than it’s worth. Of course, I have 2 pugs and the hair is a lot of work. It would take a miracle to do all it claims to do!
Great vacuum mop! Great suction power, easy to clean after using and stays charged for cleaning about 1400 sq of hardwood with rugs.
The hype is real. This things works great. Kinda gross to see how dirty your floors are with the dirty water tank. Very easy to use and does the job wuick

Very disappointing for such an expensive appliance.Update: I contacted the manufacturer again with the help of Amazon customer service and Tineco sent me a new unit once I returned my original new unit. The replacement seems to be working just fine and cleans my floors great.

This is the best purchase I have ever made. It seems expensive but it is so worth it. It’s a vacuum and mop in one. It saves my back from lugging a big mop around every time. It’s so easy to clean my entire house floors in 30 minutes. If you have kids and/or dogs this is for you. I use it on tile and vinyl plank.

I never write reviews but I just had to for this product.  I used this machine to clean a bathroom floor that hadn't been mopped in awhile.  I spent about 10 minutes using the machine and the floor is spotless! The machine is quiet and so easy to use,the voice commands are awesome. Extremely disappointed in this machine. I was looking for something that would actually clean my tile floors. It was easy to maneuver, but just didn’t get the job done. I do a better job with my spin mop. It also left puddles of water on my laminate floors. Not a good thing. Certainly NOT streak free. I expected much more for $400.
Love it! Cleans so well. I have two dogs that come In and out all day and I’m so glad to have something that makes cleaning up after them a breeze! 10/10
