   I have 3 boys, and 2 of them are toddlers so when I say this thing is LIFE CHANGING please take my word. I have never loved any cleaning appliance the way I love this sweet sweet machine. Using it is almost effortless, and the self cleaning feature makes clean up almost the same. Just empty the tanks, and all the debris after it’s finished self-cleaning and you’re good to go. I’ve added a video of it cleaning up the breakfast crumbs my boys left behind with EASE. I would pay any amount to own this, but compared to other similar vacuum/mops, this one is a STEAL!

Thinking about buying this product? Don’t read any further into reviews, ratings, nothing. Buy it. Buy it NOW. This thing is a life changer!!! I have 3 kids and work full time and this makes my house cleaning routine soooo easy! My floors are cleaner than they were with a bucket and mop... I could never get them to shine and everyone’s feet were always black with dirt from walking on the floors barefoot.... this is no longer an issue. I buy off Amazon all the time and have NEVER once written a review, except for this one. Buy this piece of witchcraft and feel like a true house wizard... life changing. I am obsessed. I could go on and on.

I have had this about about a week, and I was in love immediately. I have been looking for a quicker way to keep our vinyl plank floors clean as we are a busy family of 7 living on a farm. This has been the ticket. It is very easy to use. I feel it cleans well. It is easy maintenance. I love the self cleaning feature. I use it 2-3 times a day. When I first started using it my water was very dirty. Now when I use it the water is about half as dirty. Kids walk in with muddy boots I just run this and all clean in 30 seconds. I run it around the table and kitchen after meals. If there is a lot of big debris I will sweep, otherwise this amazing machine seems able to handle the rest.

If I could give 0 stars I would. This “vacuum” does not vacuum. It just spreads water and dirt around my floors. I can’t believe all of these positive reviews! I may have gotten a defective machine, but it is awful. Even in the self cleaning mode it did not suction! The base of the unit filled up and overflowed onto my floor. It left my floors a total mess. I am returning the item. Buyer beware!

First of all we have to say it this is for hard floor (not carpet) if you are looking for a carpet vacuum tho is not the product for you.It is futuristic broom+mop for hard floors, it detect liquids and dirt on the floor is really cool and cute for an apartment but if you have carpet you will have to have a vacuum too.I expected more power for the price thou

I used to spend 3 hours sweeping and mopping. This thing is amazing, the whole 1200 sqft house clean in 30 mins!! I have white shiny porcelain tile that shows every spec of dirt and have 4 cats and a puppy so hair is a huge issue.This thing cleaned up everything with no streaks and even cleaned up a puppy pee spot with no problem!!!!Loveee

I have laminate floors and at first i was very excited because tik tok sold this so hard on all the great things it can pick up. I love that it mops at the same time as vacuuming, but the thing just isn't what its advertised to be. in videos it picks up cereal and syrup and has no problem getting up pet hair. I used it in one moderately sized room and had to empty or declog the machine three times. I don't think it's meant to keep up with two dogs and four kids which is very disappointing considering the price I paid for it and the skyrocketing of price that keeps happening. Frankly I'm just disappointed.

review_title: Worked really well but I couldn't handle all the parts to be cleaned
review_text: I really loved how this worked it mops and vacuums at the same time which was wonderful. Then... 7 parts 7 had to be cleaned afterwards.  All the insides and filters and roller and the brush roll and the actual vacuum... I couldn't handle that part so I returned it.

Love this! It’s small but does a BIG job. It is very easy to maneuver around walls and furniture. Great that it’s cordless.  Makes cleaning the floors a pleasure and really gets them clean!  Impressive!!

I received this March 22nd and already it’s not working correctly. When I turn it on it does a really high pitched scream and doesn’t produce any cleaner from it. I’m so heartbroken over this. It was really expensive and now I’m wishing I would have looked into it more.

review_title: This cuts the time to clean floors in half
review_text: We have two dogs, a cat, three kids and two adults in our house and this machine has been great for us.  We just finished building our house and moved in before the new year and we had a hard time getting the dirt and grime off of our floors.  We vacuumed and mopped using multiple products and the floors would never get clean.  It was not until we ordered this and used it that our floors are literally squeaky clean!  We recommend this product to anyone who has hard wood, tile, or LVP flooring.

I’ve had this for five months and love it.  It’s not extremely noisy, it’s lightweight and it maneuvers nicely.  Today while using it finally occurred to me that as easy as it is to use, I am amazed at how well it cleans.  The only reason I would like the charge to last longer is because whenever I use it, I don’t want to stop.

review_title: Works great, DO NOT forget to rinse and dry out
review_text: I’ve had this for a little over a month now and it works amazing on my hardwood floors with a puppy! I thought I kept my floors clean but the tineco proved me wrong! However, DO NOT leave anything in the dirty water chamber or forget to rinse out the spinner on bottom or it will smell awful. Let dirty water container soak in bleach overnight and left spinner in bowl of mr clean cleaner and that got the god awful smell out. Not the manufacturers fault but mine for not taking the sticker seriously lol.

Used on Carpets and hard wood flooring works deep cleaning and suction to bring the dirty  water back in machine. Wished I spent a litter more to get the cordless.  Only drawback is it is very time consuming to clean the machine

I am so I love with this product. My home has a cat and a dog. I was always vacuuming but my house never felt fresh. After this I hardly  want to vacuum, I mop instead. I am loving this, and recommend it to all my girlfriend.

review_title: A must have for hard floors
review_text: Absolutely love love love!!! My god I never realized how dirty my floors were until I had this!!! It cleans so well, easy to use and I love that it self cleans. I would recommend though for those who have pets, to just use your regular vacuum before using this. The pet hair can cause a bit of a mess when cleaning out the machine and can also clog it in certain spots. My only complaint is that it doesn’t get close enough to the wall as I would like, which I knew before purchasing.10 out of 10 would recommend this to anyone with hard floors. Lol shoot I already have my boss and my mom wanting to buy them too!!

This wet/dry vacuum is better than I ever could have imagined. I was telling everyone about it and then found out that they were out of stock. Everyone I know is waiting to get one of their own. It cleans my floor so well. It vacuums up any crumbs and scrubs the floor at the same time!  To top it off you then set it in the charging station and you can then hit the button and it will clean itself. You can see it getting the "mop" clean.

I purchased the Floor One S3 to clean the 2800 sqr ft of tile in our home.  The unit takes a bit to get set up and charged and the CWT/DWT clean&dirty water tanks are fairly small requiring them to need refilling & dumping often.  Additionally the clean up process takes 15-20 mins each time the machine is used, however all of this is acceptable, as is the cleaning performance.Unfortunately the dang thing stopped working after the third use.  It will run for apprx. 3-5 secs then it stops and the power indicator flashes.  The instruction manual that came with the unit indicates that this "problem" is a "motor malfunction" contact customer support.When one calls their well hidden CS number the message over the last 4 days I've called says they are experiencing "tech" issues with their phone service and they are working on it.  If you hang in there you will actually get someone in the Philippines, once again.  The last person I spoke with this morning 5.29.20 had a dog barking in the background, which made the already difficult conversation more difficult & FRUSTRATING!!!!!WHEN it works the cleaner does a good job, but like others, I have found dealing with their customer service to be a 1/4 star at best.Buyer/s be ware.

This product was great the first time I used it, but the second time the unit wouldn’t start and I checked the app and it said motor failure. Don’t bother buying. Way too expensive for it to break on second use.

There are so many things about this product that I love and yet so many that I hate..Firstly it mops and vacuums.. how can you not love that time saving technology??Pros:Light up display for ease of useEasy to move/super lightweightSelf-cleaning roller!!CordlessCons:The dirty water bucket fills up fast and it’s not the easiest to cleanLeaks dirty water when sat upright even when the dirty water level is lowThere is about a 1/2 inch - 1 inch margin around the edge of the machine that does not reach the wall.. so anytime you clean against a wall or piece of furniture, you’re going to have to come back and clean that margin by handFor me the difficulty cleaning the dirty water tank and the margin when trying to get close to a wall were enough to send it back. I love the idea so much though that I am going to be shopping for another. I will say that this is far better than any bissell equivalent.

I got this product vacuum in October and it no longer auctions, says tank is full and it’s not. Ridiculous the money spent for the vacuum to only last a few months. Would not suggest this product. On top of that, Tineco is always sold out of the floor cleanser. Wishing I wouldof went with the bissell cross wave.

review_title: UPDATED!!! CUSTOMER SERVICE IS NOT GREAT
review_text: UPDATE: customer service reached out to let me know that the representative handling my claim quit her job and did not pass my claim off to anyone else so it sat in her inbox with nothing done for over a month and no one knew it. Whether this is true or not, I am unsure, but they made it right either way and PROMPTLY shipped me a new one to fulfill their warranty service… THANK YOU and I’m thrilled to have my mop back. With 4 dogs and 2 kids, I NEED IT! Hopefully this one holds up!!I LOVED this product until on month 7 of owning it, it threw a code and refused to work. I called customer service, as there is a 2 year warranty and she was helpful…offered a few troubleshooting solutions and when those didn’t work, she stated the motor was shot and they would send me a replacement immediately.  AWESOME! I thought…i am going on week 3 with no mop and no replacement! TINECO wont answer their phone lines and will only respond through email every few days or so.  They sent me a return label to send mine back (after 2 weeks of waiting) but i live in a rural area and the nearest fedex location that will take large packages is over an hour away… the initial customer service agent stated they would send my replacement immediately and now i am being told they will try to get it shipped once they receive the broken one back…they are not interested in helping me, despite me telling them that i have NO fedex locations within an hour drive of me.  I am out a mop, over 300.00 and countless hours dealing with this! DO BETTER TINECO!! I just want the mop that I Paid for!

I'm going to be honest here, I have 5 kids and work 3 jobs, if I can minimize my cleaning efforts I would, but I bought this device on prime day at $100 off, I thought that was a steal! It took nearly 3 weeks to come in, the clean water tank had water inside, and no cleaning solution came also the box had a cut out which I believe was from a previous send, I emailed the company about this but decided to still try the product, I charged it bit it kept showing the tangled icon, after further inspection I saw one of the clips was broken! They definitely sent me a refurbished product that wasn't even refurbished properly for $200, I sent a return through Amazon and I am hoping the new product they send me is worth $200! I hope this was an honest error and will update this review as soon as I receive the new one! Thank you

review_title: Where has this been all my life??
review_text: I didn't know I needed this mopping vacuum until I bought it on an impulse buy but now I love this thing... Is this what it means to be an adult and be excited by the most trivial things??First of all, this vacuum is QUIET!!! And I love it! And I know it's a lot to believe that a person is claiming affection for a vacuum but yes, quarantine did that to me... Don't judge me. It's easy and lightweight to push around.. Even my mother who's 65 with two bad hips was able to use it and it didn't scare my dogs either cause regular vacuums are the devil and they have to hide from those.But anyways it's been 9 months with this vacuum and we have the kitchen, living room, laundry room and hallways that are all laminate and tile and this vacuum cleans all of that on about 1 1/2 fills of water and solution.Vacuum itself glides like butter around the house happily cleaning any spills and sticky residue with no problem.It only needs a cap full or a small amount like that of the cleaning solution for each fill and doesn't leave the floor wet, just a little damp and dries in like 3 minutes. Still using the cleaning solution that came with it at this point so that's awesome.Cleaning and emptying the vacuum is super easy and I'm not exaggerating because it's seriously just press two buttons, empty dirty water and rinse.If you have any hard floors in your home and hate the single use waste or tiring arm workout of a Swiffer or regular mop then just treat yourself 2021 (or whatever year) and get one of these. It's one of the few things that are expensive and actually worth it.
I bought this vaccum due to the awesome reviews and now it’s already not working. What a waste of money. I havent even had it for 6 months

I haven't used it yet and am debating whether to return it. i realized when i was reading the instructions, Teneco recommends their cleaning product and after exchanging emails with so called customer service, other products with damage the machine and void the warranty.This is the first time where i have bought a product and the company mandates you use their cleaning product. My floor installer put a special finish on the floor and the cleaner is formulated to work with the finish. I don't want to use their cleaner and i especially don't want to be told i have to. My goodness this is America after all, not CHINA.What to do??

I purchased the AlfaBot T36 fist , after using for 2 weeks I had no issues at all and it would make me laugh, it talks and says when your done to clean dirty bin or gets stinky , lol , the only thing is it’s not self propelled and can be a bit of a work out , then tineco3 went on sale 100 off on Prime Day with its self propelling so I gave it a try , big mistake , yes I can do the hole house with out arm getting a work out but it’s issues almost had me throw it out , first does not hold enough water and it’s dirty bin constantly have to empty with only 1200 square feet , second it clogs all the time also does not clean near walls , huh what’s the point edges don’t get clean it can push dirt around , muddy dirt at front door plan on running it’s self clean a few times and sometimes it clogs doesn’t turn off then just pushes the mud around , have to clean dirty bin take the roller out clean the clog , then rewash the floor , would not use as a vacuum for it’s always clogging , third I have problem putting the water and dirty bins back in most of the time , 4 it’s computer is crazy not letting me use the self cleanings, 90% of the time I have to keep taking them back out and in till it works. Also does not clean as well , I do have a tineco vacuum I like but this was a mistake , only reason for any stars it’s self propelled though it’s computer and clogging issues almost had me throw it out , I guess if you baby it and conform to its needs then you may like it but the alphabot  puts a smile on my face every time yet this tineco3 gets me upset every time , it has an issues every time I use it , the alphabot no issues and put a smile on my face every time and anyone around that hears it talking though it is a bit heavier cause it can do more has larger bins easy to take out and put back and not self propelled was a pleasure. Wish I could return this tineco3, I threw out it’s box because of all the positive reviews and my tineco3 vacuum works great , maybe the top of the line model works better though the way the water and dirty water bins you have to click in perfect or it don’t work is enough for me to not even want to try it and the clogging issue , if you like this you don’t know any better that’s all I have to say it’s just a status symbol and a terrible one at that, I constantly have dirty water puddles on the floor from it clogging and when it cleans it shuts off after putting water on roller 5 times before it starts working water leaks all over there , this tineco3 is more work then something that just works all the time like the alphabot with a smile , it’s been about 4 months now with the tineco3 and the aggravation had me right this review ,it does not clean good a specially near wall or corners .  I know tineco can do better , it’s like they never tested it in real world just made something that looks good , the alphabot blows this away in every aspect but self propelled, it’s a bit louder for has more suction, it’s get the job done ,

This product is great.  Moved into new house with a lot of hardwood floors and makes cleaning easy.  fyi some people have said they use this product on carpets, that's not what it's for.  It doesn't dispense a lot of chemicals like a steam cleaner so carpet cleaning it will not do.  If you spill even pancake syrup on your hardwood then this machine will clean it in two passes.

I have been buying the Bissell machines for several years, and decided to try something different. I am so glad I did. I watched many, many Youtube video reviews, I had the machine in my cart for a couple of weeks and finally decided to just go for it. I love, love, love this machine, it is way better than my old Bissell.

Vacuum and mop combination is amazing.  It's a great product for daily use, saves a lot of time and keeps the house clean. My kid creates a lot of mess everyday and it's been a chore to have to clean up after until we found this awesome cleaner. If the cleaner lasts 2 years its will be worth it's price and then some. I urge the company to keep innovating and perfecting the cleaner.

Anyone who says this is high maintenance never mopped on hands and knees. This is a beast of a wet mop vac I love it it’s worth every hour I spent researching for the perfect model/brand. Get this one.

review_title: Great product but short battery life
review_text: This ifloor 3 works great and I really like it. My floors haven’t been this clean in a long time. My only complaint is the battery life. You only get around 30min. Also the clean water tank and the dirty water tank could be a little bigger. I love the self cleaning mode. Works wonders! With the battery life this is perfect for smaller jobs.

I really wanted to like this, but overall it was a waste of money. It works ok, but is such a hassle to clean and dry after using that it negates the benefit over just mopping separately. You have to completely disassemble the product after each use which is such a pain. If you want it to get up sticky messes you have to go over and over and over again on the same area. Not worth the money at all.

review_title: Does it all! No sweeping, no mopping! I love it!
review_text: I have all hardwood floors plus a dog and 2 cats, the hair was driving me crazy!!! I can take care of it all now in a matter of seconds with no streaky floors. It's quiet and holds a charge, don't hesitate this machine is worth it!

I can’t say enough about this amazing mop. We have a chocolate lab who shed like crazy!! I use it without using my normal vacuum first and it gets everything up. I also dropped a entire tub of oxiclean on my floor and in two pushes it all came up. I knew I would love this! I’ve had their normal vacuum for over a year and love it also. Also the self clean option is amazing no dog hair or smell left behind on roller

I love my tineco, BUT it has a horrible smell to it every time i use it. I’ve only had a few months and super disappointed in the smell it gives off while it’s being ran. Picks up dirt great and makes my floors look so clean.

Awesome machine! I’ve owned almost every major company’s top of the line hard floor cleaning machines and none of them compare to this one. I purchased 4 more for family members. Easy to clean, water tank is small but lasts a long time. Water comes out filthy when cleaning the first time and clean the second time so its working great! Highly recommend!
I am getting ready to donate a slightly used husband because he wouldnt allow me to bring it to bed to sleep next to. That is how much i love this thing!!!
It works well most of the time, keep the brush head clean and clean it out after using. The cleaner compartment needs refilling often
I really recommend this to anyone in the worldhappy housewife happy home！

So far this has been the best mop I’ve used. I’ve tried steam mops and the old bucket mop. This is amazing and when I test the floor after with a white paper towel it is still white! I hope it lasts as I have only had it two weeks.

I love the S3!!! It is super easy to use, cleans the floors beautifully, and is easy clean up. It’s quiet, has a long lasting charge, and great suction that leaves the floors squeaky clean. I would buy this item again!!
Love this!! One of my most favorite cleaning tool ever!
Game changer!  Works like a charm!  Huge time saver!  Don’t think twice, buy this machine.  It makes life easier.

Got for a gift for the wife I have used it a few times and I would never go back to cleaning my floors the old way this brought up dirt from the floor even after I just cleaned them absolutely love it
Doesn’t clean my tile I wanted to love this so much but I don’t my floors still look filthy
Love it!
Best thing ever, especially for someone with back pain. It cleans itself!! Worth every penny!

So glad I got the bigger one. I love this and it’s so easy to clean my floors now! Only wish the water tanks were bigger so I didn’t have to change/empty as often. But small price to pay. My mom even wants one now.
Love this floor cleaner so much.  It’s the best solution for my vinyl flooring.  No more broom and swiffer combo.  It also self cleans!

I first washed the floor in the traditional way and afterwards I used Tineco and so much dirt came out. Of course, we have a dog at home and you can't clean the coat completely from the floor. But after Tineco, I'm sure the floor is now completely clean. I immediately threw out my usual mop after it :)

To be honest this was the best purchase I have ever made. My floors have never been cleaner. instead of having to sweep everyday and mop 2 or 3 times a week I just run this everyday and it maintains perfectly!

After 3 months, the machine stopped working completely. Request a warranty and they wanted me to send it back for them to ‘fix’. Seems like they want to take the cheapest route and it’s just an inconvenience for the customer. This product is way to expensive to stop working after 3 months and for them to not be able to just replace it… it’s just too much of a hassle.
amazing product
worked okay but for $400 my expactations were high and just was worth it to me in the end so i returned it /:
Buy this vacuum! It cuts my floor cleaning time in 1/2!  And it does a great job cleaning my wood and tile.
Absolutely love this thing! I wish it got closer to the baseboards and scrubbed a little harder but other than that I love it and use it almost Daily

I just got it and used it for the first time yesterday and todayPutting it together was very easyFilling tank and start cleaning super easy.Light weight but sturdy.I was a bit worried about the vac due to living by a river and tracking sand is a alwaysIt surprised me it did good.The cleaning was good, some spots you had to go over a few times  but not bad.It didn't put to much water out on the floor it really did goodOnly 2 things so far that bothered meThe tanks are small and you have to stop cleaning to empty the dirty tank rinse refill cleaner tank.  But if it had bigger tanks it would be heavier and I like it that it was light.I bought the middle one I didn't need the voice activation but it had a longer battery lifeThe first time I only did 2 rooms but I was also learning how. today did a lot better made it to kitchen, living, long hall, and  bath, it lasted longer then it said.I will still need to clean around my base boards on hands and knees but this will help me keeping up with the sand and I sweep almost everyday and mop once or twice a week and this will work great,I hope this helps and I will keep trying to update

Added: Months later, I’ve been having issues with this mop. Randomly, it wouldn’t start. I would turn it on, it would spin and then shut off but the next time I’d try it would work. Cleaned and took care of it according to the instructions. Well, today, it did it again but this time would not turn on past that and started dumping water everywhere. I looked up the troubleshooting for it and tried for 30 or so minutes to figure it out but ultimately ended up coming on here to figure out how to fix it. I saw that I was eligible to return it, thankfully. I’m so appreciative of Amazon and their return policies. It really protects us consumers who spend a fortune on products. This mop was THE BOMB, when it was working. But I took great care of it and it’s unfortunate that it just stopped after less than 7 months with it.Returned my crosswave for this as so many others have! Worth it! This thing is amazing! I use it daily! Functional, easy, cleans well!

I don’t like to clean because sweeping take 15 minutes and mopping takes 30 minutes!!! But having this machine cut 45 minutes to 20! And lemme tell you… before trying this out, I had actually swept and mopped to see if there was any difference. The results was shocking. The water in the bottom compartment was as black as my ex-husband’s soul. I couldn’t believe my eyes. If you’re on the fence about this product, don’t wait. Check it out IMMEDIATELY! ESPECIALLY if you have kids or pets!

review_title: Nice machine But stopped working after 4 monhs
review_text: This machine is nice but it stopped working after 4 months. The water no longer comes out to mop the floors. The “warranty” process is TERRIBLE!!  I have gone round and round with them and their so called troubleshooting. They asked for a video and pictures of what the machine is doing. I’ve sent all of that for them to tell me to make sure the clean water tank is full. I’ve been messing with custom support for over two weeks. Now, I have to send my machine in and wait for them to repair it. If it’s anything like their customer service, I’m sure it will take months to get it repair. I have to find a box to pack it in and take to a FedEx drop off. Don’t waste your time with this overpriced piece of junk. Now in order to clean my floors, I have to go and get another floor cleaner while I sit and wait for then to repair it. They need to figure out a better process for the warranty on these machines. For the amount of money they are charging for these machines, customers shouldn’t have to jump through hoops to get their machines fixed and to be without machines for an extended period of time because if their slow process. A warranty on a Hoover machine is so much smoother and faster. Should’ve bought a Hoover.

Pros: vacuums and mops at the same time. Leaves floors pretty clean, gets up a lot of messes.Cons: It doesn't get to the wall/baseboard, so it leaves a dirty area (where the crumbs like to go) of about 1/2 inch around everything. Hair easily gets tangled in it. And if you don't have time to take it apart and clean it thoroughly after use, it smells HORRIBLY within a few hours and makes your entire house smell bad when you use it again.Major Con: Mine suddenly just stopped working. I contacted Tineco, they had me send it back, and it's been almost 2 months and I haven't received it back yet. They keep saying it's packed and ready to be shipped, but a label hasn't been made. I'm starting to feel like they stole it. I have no sense when it will be returned to me.

I’m a Virgo. Cleaning is my love language. I love a clean house but when it came to cleaning floors I use to DREAD it with every part of my being.My kitchen, laundry, and bathrooms on the first floor are all tile. My home office, formal dining, and living room are all hard wood hand scraped flooring.Old way of cleaning consisted of 2 hours of vacuuming every area and then another 2 hours of me mopping every surface and changing mopping pads every few rooms because they’d get soggy and gross.This Tineco is a life changer. I was able to clean every room mentioned above in 45 minutes and that was only because I got so excited I moved every bit of furniture to REALLY clean!Pros: Self Cleaning - SO EASY to use. One cap of cleaner , fill with water and go! It’s cordless and light which is every persons dream when trying to clean and move around large areas. Super easy to clean after each use. I feel good knowing I can maintain this investment because I can clean every working part quickly and without tools. I have ALOT of hair and I was concerned this wouldn’t stand up to the suction needed for my bathrooms. Not only did it get every piece of hair, it DID NOT collect on the roller (which is my major issue with a standard vacuum). It collects all debris and hair into the container and although super disgusting to clean afterwards - it was a huge indication to me that this machine means business. Lastly it uses just the right amount of water and suction depending on how dirty the floors are. The machine automatically detects this for you so all you have to do is be there to guide it as it cleans. It has some serious power so be ready to feel like you’re walking a small dog as this things GOES!Cons: it won’t last too long on a charge so be prepared to clean every room you need to at once. I share this as a tip because it takes a VERY long time to get back to full charge. I used up 70% of the battery power but was ok with that because I got everything done I needed to!The only other con I have is that you should be ready to get a hobby or something because you will definitely have ALOT of time left on your hands. So be ready to find another plan for the remainder of your day. HahahaI am beyond excited about this Tineco and hope you get this ASAP if you want a fast way to keep your hard floors clean.

The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
        
    
    

   Tineco has the absolute worst customer service.  I bought this from a recommendation but out of the box the water wasn't coming out and cleaning like it's supposed to. I have been emailing this company for 4 days trying to figure out what to do. It's ridiculous. They don't have a live chat their phone number just goes to a voice mail which cuts you off  after 10 seconds. For how expensive this product is there is no excuse. I will not be recommending, I'm sure it's a great product when it works but good luck if something goes wrong.

First let me say I absolutely LOVE my tineco. I use it multiple times a day since I do daycare and have so many little ones during the day.However the battery quit charging in November and I had just gotten it in May. I paid for the 3 year protection plan and reached out to tineco. They said the would pay for return shipping so they could fix it and send it back. They said they would reimburse me up to $25 for shipping materials. I took it to FedEx which is where the shipping label was for and the shipping materials were $27. It took a week for them to respond about my reimbursement which now they are saying they will only reimburse $10. It's been over a month since my first email with customer service and I still don't have the tineco back, nor do I have any updates on repairs or tracking for it coming back. Repairs were supposed to take 2-3 days and it's been over a week yet again.

review_title: No don't buy into the online hype!!!
review_text: I bought a tinico Floor one s3 and a bissel crosswave max – both were awful for different reasons but these have a lot more work that needs to be done before these are useful to anyone. I can’t believe the cost of these machines, they don’t work!!! Not worth it, there is so much hype online about these machines and they are a total let down.The Tinico will not get anywhere close to any edge, we are talking a full inch or more of dirty edges. Why even bother with this if you then have to get a normal mop and mop all of the edges and around everything. The Tinico does an ok job on flat open floor space but that's it!!! Who’s house doesn’t have anything to mop around? It won't get near baseboards or transition strips you can’t use it on any uneven surface. Just a total waste of money.This product must have been designed for people who never walk in their houses and don’t own anything and definitely don’t own pets or children, or a husband.The bissel crosswave max what a complete waste of money! It doesn’t’ vacuum worth a dang and all it does is spread dirt around and it cost even more than the Tinico!!! The Tinico at least cleaned nice open flat areas! The bissel doesn’t even do that!!! Just dirty nasty water everywhere a complete mess and the one they sent me wouldn’t do the self-clean cycle at all I went through all of the videos trying to figure out why it wouldn’t work the thing was defective from the very start for how much these machines cost  I expect all the features to work!!!Complete waste of money and can’t recommend these to anyone!!! TRASH just TRASH!

review_title: Beware Amazon and tineco are shady
review_text: I loved the ease of cleaning with this. It doesn’t scrub well for stuck on stuff but everyday cleaning was great. Until less than 6 months in it had a motor failure and stopped working entirely.Update - they sent me another one and it died again. Total waste of time and money. I asked for my money back from the company and they said that they can only give me a 62% return minus freight costs… It’s not my problem that their product is crap. If you Google it you will see that there are many issues now with the motor failing. Amazon says it’s Tineco’s problem. Don’t purchase you’ll be out hundreds of dollars.
So happy with this product!
Loveeee this vacuum.. so easy to use, does the job really well
This thing is all I hoped for and more!

review_title: It works okay, not as good as I expected.
review_text: It’s handy, lightweight but it doesn’t clean like the reviews and videos show.
Love it
Literally best one I’ve bought so far
Love
No
Works fantastic
Next level adulting is having a mop that vacuums too.  Best thing I have purchased in a long time

ok So last night I set this up ..no problem this morning I did 4 1/2rooms in 17 minutesWell upon testing This S3 blew away my mind the amount of cleaning in just this short of time is Amazing Bye bye Bissel Crosswave I used that for 3 months but it was big and bulky this unit is small and slim but it packs a powerful punch dont let the size you .you'll actually be happy doing the floors the clean mode works great too the rollers are completely dry no streaks on the floor and clean up a snapThe whole house will probably take around 30 minutesI will update in a monthThank you Tineco

review_title: I wanted to love my Tineco, but I’m so disappointed
review_text: As the title says, I desperately wanted to love this Tineco. I own a BISSELL crosswave so I’m familiar with using a vacuum/mop in one. I switched to a Tineco because I’ve heard so many great things about them. I wanted a cordless one and I loved that you can change the suction level from auto to max. Overall the Tineco seemed like a better made, better functioning product. For the first two weeks it worked perfectly. I had a couple issues but nothing major. When I took it out of the box and was looking over it, I realized the little rubber piece on the bottom had a cut in it. As far as I could tell it didn’t effect the way it functioned, just something I noticed. I’ve included a picture so you can see what I’m talking about. The other issue, it wouldn’t recognize the charging base. I’d have to remove the Tineco and replace it a couple times before it would connect and show that it’s charging. This randomly fixed itself after a few days. I didn’t change anything, but it started connecting immediately, no problems. Other than those few things I was obsessed with this machine. It cleaned my floors so well. It did leave them a bit more damp than the crosswave, but it cleaned much better so no big deal! I’ve been very diligent about cleaning it and routine maintenance. Suddenly a few days ago the dirty water tank started leaking. While running it, water has started to come from around the bottom of the dirty water tank. I circled this in a picture to show where it comes from. It doesn’t happen all the time, so I thought the rubber seal wasn’t connecting properly or maybe I didn’t put the tank in well enough, but nothing I’ve tried seems to change when it does or doesn’t happen. It’s also started to leave a streak of water from the left side of roller. I thought it was from the cut in the rubber, but it’s not since that’s on the opposite side. I’ve checked to make sure there’s nothing on the roller or something caught at the bottom. I just can’t figure it out. It seems to make more of a mess now, because I go back to suck up the excess water only for it to leave another streak further left. I expected more than 2 weeks worth of use for such a big price tag.

review_title: Fabulous vacuum!  Best hardwood floor vacuum!
review_text: Oh my gosh…I honestly was a little worried about spending so much, but it is worth EVERY penny.  I have used it for about a month and I am still so impressed.  It is easy to use, cleans the best of any vacuum I have ever owned.  Makes taking care of your hardwood floors so easy.  I bought the spin mop and was exhausted and it took so long…granted, it costs a lot less…but this does the sweeping and the mopping in one…really can’t say enough good things…LOVE this floor cleaner!

review_title: Battery can't be replaced.  Intentional obsolescence
review_text: Piece of crud. The battery is good for 300 charges on average. Not you clean every day then you get to use this for about a year before it craps out.The battery is intentionally made to be irreplaceable so prepare to buy another 400$ tineco after 1 yearLet's boycott companies that do this crap

At first I thought this vacuum was great, next use, not so much. I have concrete, LVP and tile. Great on concrete, LVP… not horrible, tile? I just gave up and realized I missed my return window 😤 def selling and getting another Bissell. It has zero scrub, the brush is like wiping with wet dusting with a microfiber. So if you actually wanted to mop, forget it. Now seeing you can’t replace the battery on a $400 mop vac, absolutely not. That’s beyond a fail in design.

Wow, I really appreciate my friend recommending me to buy this vacuum cleaner.I am a person who is afraid of trouble. But this thing is too good, so I still want to share this product.  Although the vacuum cleaner weighs 10 pounds.This is where I hesitate to buy it. But my friend told me not to worry about it, because it is as simple as driving.  When I received the product, it was really easy to install and use. Wet and dry mopping can solve the problem of cleaning the floor at one time. Now, I love mopping the floor because it saves time and is fast.Let my family, especially children, play on the clean floor every day. The cleaning liquid delivered by the vacuum cleaner is also very useful.

review_title: Thorough clean from a clean freak!
review_text: So I was planning to buy the Bissel Crosswave, but the Tineco iFloor3 was on sale so I sprung for it instead. And I have to say I am very happy that I bought it. I've named her Flo because she is simply amazing and deserves the honor of a name. I have vinyl plank through may whole house which is about 1900ish square feet. I do have some area rugs and the master has carpet, but other than that vinyl. I am a clean freak so I do go around the baseboards and sweep anything out from the wall to be completely sure I get everything picked up, but other than that no other sweeping or vacuuming before I use her. Flo did an amazing job of picking everything up, and there were some pretty big chunks of gravel by the back door. I have mopped for years using a shark steam mop, but my floors were so much cleaner after one use with Flo. My husband even commented that the floors looked cleaner so that is pretty huge! I will also say that this weekend my kids were playing in the mud and dirt and tracked it into my house and then left a ton of dirt and gravel in my tiled master shower floor. So I get Flo out to clean up the kitchen and bathroom floor and it donned on me that the shower floor is tiled so she can clean that too! She cleaned that shower in just a few minutes and my grout looks better than after I get down on my hands and knees and scrub it. (We have red clay in the yard, and light gray grout.) So I would say the overall use of the machine was very easy and takes a time consuming chore and cuts it literally in half. The clean cycle is very easy and requires a little bit of effort to do the maintenance properly, but isn't overwhelmingly complicated. The only thing I don't like is when my hair gets stuck in the dirty water cup and I have to pull it out, I hate touching wet hair, but I prefer this to using a traditional mop or the steam mop at this point. I will say you have to make sure you get the top back on the dirty water tank securely or it will not fit back into the vacuum properly and it took me a second to see where I did not have it lined up correctly. Other than that I haven't had any issues using it. I personally would recommend this vacuum to anyone, but I also think that you should do some research and learn about the product and the  maintenance so you have a realistic expectation since it is much different than any other mop I have used. Like any vacuum that requires maintenance for the filters and such the cleaning maintenance will have to be done after every use, which I don't find it to be hard, but I feel like the complaints that I have seen from others was due to not liking that maintenance process, or not doing it properly and having issues due to that. I would also like to add that I should really be getting commission from Tineco because I posted about Flo on my Facebook account and I have had 3 people buy one due to that post, and have had several more tell me they are planning to buy one soon!

I have used this vac/mop a lot since purchasing it. It works great and gets the floors clean, it's easy to use and lightweight. My only criticism is it gets smelly after a few uses if I don't take it apart and really give it a good cleaning. It is self cleaning and I use that feature a lot, still gets smelly after a few uses. It's fairly easy to take apart and clean and put back together. The only real complaint I have is it is made in China. If made in the U. S. I would have felt better about this purchase.

I have a lot of non carpeted areas in my house. I originally wanted the Bissel Crosswave but saw a side by side video of the two and the tineco did a better job at removing the dirt. It also gets really close to the base boards so you don't even have to pull out the broom. There is a "max" mode the seems to suck a little harder so I use that in my high traffic areas. Its so quick to just pull this out and clean up that I actually don't mind cleaning. Finally, the charging matt has attachments to sit different utensils and the filter and mop head to dry after cleaning.

review_title: Not very useful/unusable  for several reasons
review_text: I bought this based on the high reviews and the promotion (still cost $300). However, I found this vacuum not very useful if one has more than two rooms: granted it's fun to use but unusable for a moderate size house: the battery lasts only about 30 minutes, the vacuum stops and asks to do soft cleaning, to clean the dirty water tank, every 10 minutes or less even for a not so dirty room. I am not sure whether it is designed so or malfunctioning. The water tank and dirty water tank are cute but very small to do any significant work.  I am considering to return it.

Ok I bought one of these about a year ago or so. Worked great for the first few months but then it would stop hooking up to the stand up charger. After a while you would have to wiggle them to connect only for it to stop connecting. Company was good, sent another then it stopped sucking up water and leaving it mostly wet. I could not figure out why, I switched out all the parts on it to see if the plastic was leaking or if the filter was clogged, nothing worked.  The charge base on the second one is doing much the same thing on the first but not as bad. They did a light modification to the 2 points of connection but it’s not ideal. If they would just build a battery that would come out instead of this built in nonsense it would be SO MUCH BETTER. I have not bothered to contact the company again for another unit. I am in the market AGAIN for another wet vac.

This product will make you realize how nasty your floors really are!! We have luxury vinyl floors in our whole house and I can always see dirt on them. I feel like no matter how much I sweep or mop they’re dirty. Well I didn’t realize how dirty until I got this! When I dump the water out it’s pretty much black! 🤢🤢 It’s embarrassing to even admit that. But for the first time since getting this type of floor I can walk on it barefoot and it feels clean! I don’t have dirt or other things sticking to my feet! If you run it on high it uses the water pretty fast and the battery dies before I can do our whole house. On regular mode they both last a good while. I will never own a different type of product to clean my floors! Plus it’s so easy and convenient to clean up a spill when our boys spill some milk or juice. Or when our yorkie comes in from outside and leaves paw prints everywhere!

review_title: Wish I had found this earlier!
review_text: I have had the Tineco for 5 months now. I use it at least twice a week to clean my whole downstairs (around 800 sq ft). That space is split between hardwood and tile. I love this thing! As far as mopping goes, I have not been able to find better. We have 3 large dogs that are in and out of the house all day and this thing cleans up after them no problem. I do still vacuum before using this as it does not do well as a full on vacuum, not with the shedding our dogs do anyways. If I were to use it every day, it would be fine, but if I skip a day or two and there is a decent amount of dog hair, it is more work to try and use just this than it is to do a quick vacuum first. The roller will load with hair and you will have to do a "self clean" multiple times. If you don't have tumbleweeds of dog hair you need to suck up, this thing alone will do the job. I am able to clean my whole downstairs on one battery charge and I usually only have to stop to empty the dirty water canister and fill the clean water canister once during my clean. The dirt this thing picks up, I can't believe I used to push it around with a mop and think it was clean. I would definitely recommend!

Worked great…for a year. One year to the day that I ordered this product and it now has a motor failure fault. I’ve used it about 20 times over the past year and only on the downstairs portion of my home so it certainly has not been run hard. The customer service phone number will not allow you to actually speak with anyone so I’m left only writing an email, we shall see in time whether or not they respond and I will update this review according to how this is handled.For the time being, save your money. It works decently when it actually does work but for $400 it certainly should not be a disposable device with a one year life span. Go buy the Bissell equivalent from some where like Bed Bath and Beyond so you can return it to a real person should you have issues.

review_title: Handy but not the best for deep clean
review_text: Love that I can mop/vacuum in one step but there are some pros and cons. Overall, I will keep and use about once every 1-2 weeks.Pros: mop/vac at same time. Great for kitchen, especially with messy kidsLong battery life on auto setting, can easily get my whole house done (about 2000 sq ft.)Cordless so don’t have to plug/unplug a lot.Pretty easy to operate. Pushes very easily across floor.Cons: not my fave for “quick” cleans. I like my shark vac/mop for that.Runs out of clean water before even 50% battery used.Doesn’t get up to edges of walls well.A lot of work to clean tanks, rollers, filters.Doesn’t do great with cleaning really stuck on mess.Still need to deep clean with separate vacuum and mop once in a while.Sometimes leaves a little mess when stopped where the roller sits.

review_title: Floors so clean you can eat off of them
review_text: This will be the cleanest you could ever get your floors. The first time I used it I went over my kitchen very thoroughly to get a deep clean, dark dirty water came up off of it and I mopped regularly with a Norwex. The floor panels were cleaner than they would be coming out of the box from the store. I have never seen my floors that clean since moving here. I thought my floors looked clean after mopping before this, but it is a huge difference.Tips: I don’t use the chemical soap it came with because it stinks and smells toxic. I use a little bit of seventh generation dish soap and vinegar with hot water in the reservoir, I shake it just a little to get a little bit of suds, too many suds will tell you that you need more water when you don’t, though you can ignore that alert. If I want to disinfect the roller or floors I will add drops of oregano oil into the reservoir.I take the brush roller out each time and clean it good with soap before the self clean, I just want to make sure it’s super clean and doesn’t start harboring bacteria. It takes an extra minute.

I am 200% OCD. I have 2 cats and a yorkie male  I have all hardwood and laminate floors. I’m in love with this vacuum. It is perfect. I’m getting older and do not have a lot of time to clean lately due to work and the pandemic (healthcare) but this vacuum gets it all. Dust, hair, dirt and debris. It lets you know if the floor needs to be stay in a spot to for it to fully clean. It’s an all in one step. Vacuum and mop and shine and deodorize all in one. Time saver. Back saver (self propelled). My husband video called me just so he could see my face light up during the first time I used it. I’m amazed. I’m delighted I’m a huge fan. Expensive yes. But honestly to me saving my back and my sanity from always having to clean the floors and dragging out different machines and stuff to just this one is a game changer. And it talks. So I love her. She’s a great cleaning buddy. Actually the best.

does an OK job. I don't know why I would use this over a swiffer after vaccuuming. It does both at the same time but each job is done adequately.For a big home, it would take a few days with the terrible battery life and the amount of times I have to change the dirty and clean water bins.Would not recommend.

I already loved my tineco because of how well it worked, but I’m writing this review to share my customer service experience.I had only had my Tineco for a few months before the dirty water tank broke (due to my dog, not the vacuum)I was worried because I couldn’t find a replacement tank online. Within a few easy messages to their customer service team I had a replacement tank sent to me. Extremely easy to work with and very friendly.Overall I’m so happy I bought my Tineco, and I see myself continuing to buy in the future.

review_title: A must have for anyone with floors!
review_text: I was debating between the Bissell and the Tineco. We have short haired pets that shed everywhere, 3 long haired girls that shed everywhere, and a baby that is constantly throwing food on thr ground. We recently began a kitchen remodel and just got the floors done. I swept and used our swiffer mop on the floor last night. I opened my brand new Tineco this morning and went over our floors and I can't explain how disgusted I was. Goes to show that my floors where not getting cleaned with the swiffer. The self cleaning feature is rather amazing as well. I cleaned the vacuum before doing the self cleaning option and it came out just as dirty as the first time I cleaned the floors. I will be using this amazing thing everyday. I was able to get all my floors done with one charge and in half the time it would have taken me with sweeping and mopping. This is a must have for all homes!

review_title: Not worth how much I paid
review_text: I wasn’t fully impressed with this product. It does great keeping your floors clean. But for as much money as it cost, it doesn’t scrub as well as I would hope. I had to clean my floors myself with a sponge on certain places to get it clean. I’m disappointed in how big the clean/dirty water tank is. I have to empty it twice before I’m even done with just my kitchen. I do like it. I just don’t think it was worth as much as I paid.
Words can’t explain this product.. it’s made cleaning my floors a joy… amazing product. Cleans the dirtiest of floors. Better than the name brand products. Battery life is great and suction also.

Buy it. Stop wasting money on cheaper things like I did and just buy this! My floors have never been more clean! I tried the bissell crosswave and I feel like that just smeared the grime around on my floor and never actually picked anything up.  It's a must have, especially if you have kids and pets!

review_title: Quit working after less than 2 months
review_text: I loved it at first. Floors were left spotless. Now less than 2 months later it's leaving puddles of dirty water all over my floors.

We had a dark gray, stainless steel type look, LVT plank flooring installed throughout our new office, entrance and hallways and the breakroom.  The Tineco Floor One S3 is great for cleaning the LVT. It even handles the "salty" footprints that we have during our midwest winters.
This was a waste of money. It randomly  turns off on me. It leave steaks ok hard wood floor. Only thing is It's good for easy clean ups. But it doesn't  clean as well as a mop.

Waited to write a review until I'd had time to use it extensively. Picks up dust, dirt, pet hair, cat litter....does it all. Keeps hard floors like new. Super convenient - I don't have to supplement any cleaning with separate sweeping or mopping anymore. Doesn't leak like some of the name brands do. Definitely worth the money.
This thing is awesome, I thought my floors were clean. Used it to try it out and holy heck I had brown black water left in tank when I was done. Love how easy it is to use, would recommend to anybody
Listen up if you hate moping this is what you need up in your life

Perfect for everyday use! I have 2 dogs, 3 cats, 2 kids, and a husband with more tread on his boots then most people’s tires. I used it everyday/ every other day and my floors squeak when you walk on them. Passed the paper towel test with flying colors! I love it! Plus the cleaning solution smells amazing but is hard to find to buy more.
I bought this vacuum cause all of the reviews were awesome. Tried it out and honestly it’s probably the worst vacuum I’ve tried. Specially for hardwood floors. I’d rather stick with Dyson.
Really like this mop but because of the shape/size of the head it makes it difficult to get into small or oddly shaped areas.

The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
        
    
    

   This is absolutely amazing! The dirt it picks up is insane. I promise you it is worth the money.
So easy to use! Barely have to push it, cleans like crazy! No residue is left on your floors. Easy to clean. Best thing Ive ever bought on Amazon.
Works great!!! Easy to use and clean.  Keeps up with an extremely busy household.  My floors have never looked better!!
Love it. Was worth the money
It leaves some faint streaks every-other-centimeter, but it’s still far superior to what I was doing with my tile before—sweep, swiffer, and steam.
It is quiet, drive easily, clean the floor well and do not need to worry the wet floor because it would be dry soon. Like it!
This leaves streaks. I do not recommend.  Very unhappy with this purchase
Wish the water compartment and waste were bigger. They are very small. However I like it better than my Bissell.

I bough this in February 2021 and I have followed your instructions! I clean after use. I leave apart to dry properly after use. Then when I go to use it next time it will run for about 3 seconds and tells me to clean dirty water tank or debris channel even though the DWT is empty already. Now it’s telling me there’s a motor malfunction.

Used it for several months about once a week. Excellent job on almost all food and debris stuck on the floor. Only criticism is the capacity. I have to dump dirty water and fill tank twice each cleaning. Auto clean works well.

review_title: Where has this been all my life?
review_text: What normally takes me a half a day (between moving all the furniture, detail vacuuming, then mopping, then putting back the furniture) took less than an hour! SO. EASY.1 month update: I mop my kitchen at least every other day. My floors have never been cleaner. You will not regret this purchase!

review_title: I THOUGHT MY FLOORS WERE CLEAN
review_text: This thing is amazing. Buy it. I was using a steam mop and I thought my floors were clean!! This is the first use- look how dirty that water is!!! Super easy to use, charges quickly, lasts me through my whole house. Even does some of my thinner rugs, which is great! I really love this mop, 10/10 would recommend.

Tineco iFLOOR3 Cordless Wet Dry Vacuum Cleaner, Lightweight, One-Step Cleaning for Hard Floors was better than I expected. The amount of cleaning and vacuuming it does at the same time was great. It got all the pet hair as well. The bottle of cleaner that comes with the unit worked great as well. Only one cap full at a time. It moves easily from room to room as well. When I'm done I easily rinse out all the parts and put it back on it's docking station for next time.

Amazing product. Not for all type of hardfloor. It doesn’t performance at 100% on floors with small tiles (12inch X 12inch each tile).Limited use for large floors because of water capacity.Other than that we love it!

I’m in love with cleaning again!  Best vacmop ever. My floors are their original color again. Knew they were dirty, but had no idea they were as bad as they were. Took 30 min to clean about 1500 sq ft wood and tile floors. Everything about this vacmop is perfect. It even has a self cleaning cycle when it’s done.

review_title: Both Machine and Customer Service Broke
review_text: Within six months my machine broke. Attempted to call customer service regarding warranty and told basically I was dumb. Called back again a few months later as the machine is working even worse now and again customer service told me I was dumb and a liar. Unfortunately, I will be going back to my trusty mop and bucket that won’t tell me I’m dumb. This was a very expensive waste of time.

My husband bought me this as a surprise ans im not exaggerating when i say my floors have NEVER been cleaner.  I mop the floors once a week and have a little iRobot that vacuums but even after a week of a pet free home and being very conscious about my cleaning, i used this vacuum and it was disgusting how much it still cleaned up.  It doesn’t get as close to the baseboards as I’d like, but beggars can’t be choosers.  I literally clean my floors for fun now.  I get comments on how clean it is all the time.  WELL WORTH THE MONEY!

I have a horse farm and two German Shepard’s. Needless to say I could clean my floors everyday, this purchase will make that happen. I was apprehensive about the company’s recommendations about having to keep all the parts clean but it was very easy to do. I couldn’t believe what it picked up! The self cleaning mode is a great feature. I was able to do one very large room and two smaller ones before I ran out of battery time and refilled twice with cleaning solution and water. Truly very happy with this machine!
